46b4(1): skad ces gsoyod pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan ba dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' saN+Dald to// / dga' ze/ khyod kyis khye'u zla ba'i dpal 'di mthong ngam/ gsoyod pa bcom ldan
46b5(1): 'das bdag gis mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' se lad pa/ dga' bo khye'u zla ba'i dpal 'dis nga'i drung du dge ba'i che ba bskyed nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab
46b6(1): ste dga' bo khye'u 'di rim gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa yul shin tu rnam par dag pas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ de'i tshe khye'u zla ba'i dpal 'di yang 'jig rten gyi
46b7(1): khams der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa yul shi nad tu rnam par dag par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la nam mtsho'i bar du bkur bstir byed par 'gyur/ sti stang byed
46b8(1): par 'gyur/ rim 'gro byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / sku gdungs mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de ni der de bzhin gshegs pa
47a1(1): su mya pas 'das pa ded pa da pa yang nas na ba nga / ban de sa ca byed pa sus ga la bye nag na
47a2(1): gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tha ba'i dang la zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas gyi zhing yang de dang phra ba che'i da kyang de dang nyam/ nyan thos kyi dge kun 'do
47a3(1): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang de mnyam par 'gyur ro// / de nas 'jam dpal gno nur gyu da pa dang 'grogs te/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams gzhan nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir byin du pa'i byang chub sems
47a4(1): depa de dag gis/ bstand pa 'di thos nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsosad to// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa gnas ba den de bzhin gshegs pas nyid bya ma lags te
47a5(1): der ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs par bgyi myi 'tshal lo// de ni/ de'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa nas/ yongs su zind pa'i sems can rnams ni 'gro ba ngan pa'i 'jigs
47a6(1): ba 'amamyi khor ba'i 'jigs pa 'am/ bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'am mchis so// bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong 'dab 'am/ gnongs sam
47a7(1): gzhongs kyi phyogs sam/ gtsug lag 'ang ngam/ dgon pa gang na chos kyi rnam drangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs de yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa song pa ma lags/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang na chos
47a8(1): kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid brtson par blta bar bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su sbyang bar blta bar bgying // de skad
47a9(1): na brtson pa dang / som ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang 'dodags 'di da ces pa 'asapa to// de de bzhin do// rigs kyi da smras pa de bzhin// gangan chos kyinam grang byed par 'gyur ba
47a10(1): phyog pa de ni de bzhin gshenas pas byin pa yinan// de ci'i phyi zhin/ rigs kyi sradag sngon 'das pa'i dus na// de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdan gyis sung brtan par gyur nas/ sa'i phyog sa gang tungs rapal
47b1(1): shes rlo sa tho bar gyud pa der/ de bzhidi gshegs par datha ma pa yang pa/ yang rdzog sa pa'i bangs rgyam par me mdzan kyis ba zod pa tha pas byed nas/ rtse'u 'di ban 'a pa blangs myed pa nan tu zu
47b2(1): zhes bya ba di bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu srung bstan to// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma me mad des
47b3(1): dge slong gi dge 'dun sa/ dge slong dag khyed sus kyang sa'i phyogs 'di gad pas ma bcag cing/ de ci'i phyir zhed/ gang du khye'u 'dis rab pa bting zhing bzod pa thob pa de ni lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa'i mchod rten
47b4(1): yin no// yang sa'i phyonas 'dir mchod rten byed par du mo zhes de skad bka' ba sad pa dang / rigs kyi bu dag den bye ba phrag rgyad bcus bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs rtswadzo na pagyi bang bdag can
47b5(1): 'bro'o zhes 'phrin cig tu tshig smras so// de na khyim bdag lha/ bzangs zhes bya ba zhig 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa des kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa phyogs 'dir mchod rten bgyi bar spro'o zhes
47b6(1): smra ste/ rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs der khyim bdag sna bzangs zhes khya ba zhin/ mchod rten gyi rgyan du thams cad kyis brgya nad pa nig byas so// byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bsong ste phyind pa dang / 
47b7(1): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gisas phyogs dang / rin po che bdun gyis mchod rten bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsod nams ci cem zhig bgyis par 'gyis
47b8(1): de skad ces gsold pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis khyim bdag lnga bzangs la ya sa phyogs gang tu byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa'i la phyogs de na shing / 
47b9(1): rta'i 'khong mo tsam gyis ji snyed pa'i 'og tu chu'i phung po la thug gi bang drupa chen po de sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa yid te// khyim bdag gang gis rgyu'i phung po nas 'khor ba'i tshe yo bar du rin po che sna bdun byes bdang ste/ 
47b10(1): de bzhin gshegs pa sa phul ba bas gang khyod kyis mchod rten byas pa dang de bas bsod nams shinang du ma bzod kyi/ khyim bu ga dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ni ji ltar khye'u 'dings sung bsta pas de gzhin du 'di byang chub thos nas rkye
48a1(1): la lung bstan par 'gyur ro// zhes de skad ces bka' sachaya to// rigs kyi bu dag ji snyam du sems pa'i de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag lnga bzangs zhes bya ba de gzhan du byung pa snyam du de
48a2(1): sgang ma shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyim bdag gi bu dga' bstod pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid de'i mi de'i dus na khyim bdag sa bzangs zhes bya bar gyur te sha/ 'di yang ngas blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phung bstan
48a3(1): te/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bstan bzang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu dag dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam
48a4(1): dge bsnyen ma 'dug kyang rung 'greng yang rung he/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri 'am klog gam/ kha ton byed dam/ kha ton zhu 'am/ 'chang na 'og gi chu'i phung po nas pa'i phyogs de'i bar gyi rdul de thams cad
48a5(1): sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur par blta'o// de ci'i phyi/ ra zhe na/ chos 'di dag nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ chen po rnams kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi
48a6(1): bu dag khyed la bsgo'o// khyed kyi khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di stong gsum stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/ de bzhin
48a7(1): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la rgyun ma chad cing / las gzhan myi byed par nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'bul ba bas/ gang gis rgyal po ma skyes/ 
48a8(1): dgra'i le'u the tsom thams cad gcod par byed pa/ 'gyod pa thams cad seld par byed pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du stond pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzind tam
48a9(1): le nad tam/ klog gas/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'chad dam/ nyand tam/ mos par byed dam/ chung ngun dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ glegs pam du bris te 'chad na 'di ni de bas gis
48a10(1): bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ rigs kyi bu bdag gang gis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du tshul khrims bsrung zhing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / chog shes pa thams cad la dga' bar gyur/ 
48b1(1): las ga sa chos kyin pa grangs 'ang thos ma thag tu mgro par byed du/ 'deni pa don pas ded tu ma du 'phel po// sa kyi bdug gis bag dpa'ang/ ban da pa su pa bus kyi spu 'o
48b2(1): babyu de/ sem san papa sa kyis paca dru gang / dege bdun pa thod parkyen pa grangs zhis chas zod pa de sas da pa la 'dod napa kyi so mo des tu deb pa rgya mo/ 
48b3(1): rigs kyi bu dag gis bskad pa 'am/ bskusad pa'i sgras ma lus kyi bar du semams can thams cad la ston ma rmongs shing lus dang srog pa kyi lta bar bsnyen bkur byed pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam blangs 'di ga yid ches shing
48b4(1): the mom myi bskyed na/  brtson 'grus 'di de bas kyang khyad zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag gang gis bskasad pa 'am/ bskul pa'i lhag ma sa lus kyi mar du bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / mnyan par
48b5(1): bzhag pa la gnas pas gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rtogs shing nga sems ma zhum pa 'di ni de bas khyad par zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu dag bskal pa 'am/ bskabad pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du shes rab
48b6(1): kyis rtog cing / de'i tshul gyis rtog pa dang / ldan par gyur pa bas gang gis gnad tu dben pa rung bzhidi rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi rnam blangs 'di la nyan par byed/ mos par byed/ send par byed/ 
48b7(1): klog par byed kun chub byed khe tog du byed/ gzhan la rgya cher ston de par byed/ de bas 'di nyid bsod nams shi nad tu mang du 'phel lo// mur tu thams cad mkhyend pa 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro// de nas
48b8(1): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
48b9(1): gang dang gang tu spyod pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i 'angs rgyas kyi sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu chos byin pa grangs 'di bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 'dapa rigs kyi bud/ de'i phyir byed sangs rgyas
48b10(1): kyi zhing gang dang gab tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gis gang bar byas te/ 
49a1(1): ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing 'di skad kyang spra'o// kye ma'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yun ring du 'jam bu'i gling du gnas par gyur cig/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i chos kyi sgron ma yun ring du
49a2(1): 'bar bar gyur da cig/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu pa yang yun ring du gnas par gyur cig/ de la gnas nas 'dis bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa 'chad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis nin dang khrag gis
49a3(1): kyang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la sman yon thogs par myi nus na/ mchod pa gzhan gyis lta smos kyang rdzi 'tshal/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi lag tu mchi ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang sha dang khrag gis
49a4(1): kyang sman yon myi thogs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs palta bar 'tshal ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos de dag nyid la blta bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'tshal bas de dag nyid la mchod par
49a5(1): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston/ dad par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsold pa da / dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom
49a6(1): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor te/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la sa mchod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas myi snang bar gyur te/ bdag
49a7(1): bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'khod nas/ bdag bdag gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar/ de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar blangs pa bzhin du rgya cher bshad pa dang / der yang sems can
49a8(1): dpag tu myed pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' ba lad pa byams pa khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
49a9(1): 'di 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang myi rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig/ zung shig/ lhogs shig/ bkod cing/ de skad ces bka' bstsal pa
49a10(1): dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las kyang blangs te
49b1(1): kya sa na gyi gnas banini na pos zhes kyag 'di ge ba rtse ba yang ni / theg pachen pos gnas ngam shes po pa btabs / bso 'du stsa kyis skyes kyi rjid/ ros ma
49b2(1): nas kyis kyang som ldan 'das pa dang gsi ni rangs rgyas kyi sa bu dang / sang sa rgyas kyi byed kyi drabs kyis chos kyin ma grangs 'das bu 'ongs su rdzogs par babyor/ ded pa cos pa das kyis lnga'i dbang pobargya gyi
49b3(1): bka' sas lan pa ke 'u shi ka rgyal lo ma skyes dgra'i le'u the tsom thams cad gcod par byed pa/ 'gyod pa thams cad pa se med par byed pa dmas kyi bsgrib pa thams cad spyod par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyis
49b4(1): nyam pa nyid konod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bung shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ltar khyod gang gi min lnga dang lha ma yin gyi yul du 'dun/ ba de'i tshe ros kyin ba grangs 'dis soms shin ketsug gakhyod kyi/ tha
49b5(1): chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis bsams na/ lha rnams ni rgyas/ lA ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar re bar bya'o// ke'u shi ka khyod la bsgo'o//  kyis khong du chud par bya'o// klong dmapa/ grong khyer rab/ 
49b6(1): 'dab 'am gzhongs sam/ yul lam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang tu yang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na phyir rgol ba 'am/ dgra glan ka tshol zhing grags lta bas glags myi rnyed par 'gyur ro// de bas
49b7(1): na ke'u shi ka rgyal po'i pho brang du song yang rung rkun po'i nang du song yang rung // gtum po'i nang du song yang rung // dgra'i nang du song yang rung / phyi rol pa'i nang du song yang rung me dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / chu'i
49b8(1): nang du song yang rung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsam par bya'o// de ltar byas na klan ka tshol ba gang gis kyang glags kyi rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' saN+Dal dpa/ 
50a1(1): bom thams ca nachod par 'gyur ngo ro// de dag ni thams cad gsas par 'gyur ro// las kyi sgrib pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas thag par gyi nus par 'gyur ro// gang dag gis chos kyinam grangs 'di dris pa
50a2(1): bar bya ba de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thob par 'chi ba'i dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo 'di ni ma 'dres pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos yin te/ 'di ni thos ma thag tu the tsom thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 
50a3(1): dga' bo khyod la bsgre'o// khong du chud par bya'o// gang mtshams myed pa byed pas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'jug cing mos par byed na las de'i las kyi sgrib pa yod par nga myi smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas
50a4(1): gtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bdag mngon gsum du mchi ste/ gang / gi che na bdag 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas rgyal po ma skyes dgra
50a5(1): rab tu bas bcal cing mtshams ma mchis pa'i mnyam pa nyid bstan pa'i tshe kyi rnam grangs 'di sa shad pa den/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras mthu pa'i chos la bzod pa thob cing de'i 'gyod pa byung bar gyur pa de'i/ 6
50a6(1): tshe/ bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du gyur te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa thams cad kyi chos nyid ni gang rgyal po ma skyes dgras rtogs pa de nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo dag ni/ de ltar
50a7(1): chos rang bzhin gyis zhi ba la bdag dang bdag gis rnam par brtags nas lta ba 'byung bar bgyid cing / ji ltar rgyal po ma skyes dgras rtogs pa bzhin du mtshams myed par bgyid pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin de 'dra ba lags par
50a8(1): ni ma 'chal te/ phyi nad ci log gis byind ci log tu gyur cing / ma mchis pa la yongs su rtogs pas/ rdza btab pa rnams ni ma mchis bzhin du sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten/ 
50a9(1): du sdug bsngal bar gyur da te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa dag la ltung ba ma mchis/ ltung ba'i chos can ma lags so snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baN+Dal da pa/ legs so// 
50b1(1): sa / 'ang bzhin/ derked sprum pa gnan te/ sangs rgyas tsas 'du 'das rnams nga chub ni kyan pangs spyad//  na sa gan ba 'an
50b2(1): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par gra bcom ga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ci nas kyang phyema'i dus kyi ma dzin chos gi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba'i byin gyis brlab tugasod/ de na
50b3(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ba'i 'od de lta bu g.yas phyogs dang / g.yon phyogs nas btang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
50b4(1): sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byen kyis brlabs so zhes de skad kyi sna byung ngo // gangabazla chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par 'gyur ba di dag ni gas te rgyal mo macing rnams chen po'i ning du mchis par gyur byung rung sreg ni
50b5(1): bskal pa'i nang du mchis kyang rung ste/ sems can de dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par myi 'gyur ro// nga bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ dga' bo de bzhin no// ji skad
50b6(1): sgra byung ba bzhin te/ skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag gi phyirachos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i che la spyod par 'gyur/ ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe lha dang / myi'i skyes bu/ 
50b7(1): srog chags 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gi chos la chos kyi myig rdul byed cing dri ma dong bral bar rnam par dag go// srog chags 'bum phrag drug bcu ma rtsa brgyad dang ni blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ 
50b8(1): byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag sum bcu rtsa gsum ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// srog chags brgya stong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to// / stong gsum gyi hong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa
50b9(1): drug tu g.yen mo/ lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gying chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to// sim snyan brgya stong krol bar byed cing gang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs bstand pa de ni chos kyi
50b10(1): 'khojas paskod pa'i mchog yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'disas ni mu stegs can gzhan klan ka la spyod pa bdud kyi yul la gnas pa thams cad char gcad do//  / yang dag pa'i chom la mos pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi/ 
51a1(1): gsum de dgag phyir de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byan rgya 'de bzhag zhe ga dag nimi byag tu 'digs pa de dag ni yang dan pa'i cing chum bab
51a2(1): 'gyur ro// zhes de gad kyang snga'o// bcom ldan 'das dbyes shing de skad ces bka' 'al pa dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang 'dam dpas gnanang gyur pa pa sa nas
51a3(1): ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang 'od srung chen po dang / dga' bo dang / gadri'i bu dang / khye'u 'gas gyi bus sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang / zhwa dang byi dang
51a4(1): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyirdzas gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/ 1/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa gsald pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mngon
51a5(1): rgya gang skad du.a byas pa log nin na ma ma hA ya na su bod sa du'aphags pa ldan ras gzigs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdor/ sangs rgyas dang / 
51a6(1): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / 'di skad bdag rnags thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i 'ban bya nod kyi rung po'i ri ye/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / 
51a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' ma khad pa// blo bris rnam par dag pa
51b1(1): chu khrims sayangs su dag pas de bzhi ni gshegs pa 'ongs su dag par// gro sa nam par dag pas ting 'dzin yongs su dag ra// bzod pa yangs su dag pa dang / phan pa nang ma pa sangs su ge pan/ de na
51b2(1): gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su da dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag no// blogros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
51b3(1): yongs su dag go// zlogro pa rnam par dag pa dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa grol pa yongs su dag pa dang / 
51b4(1): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa'o// blo gros rnam par dag pas stobs yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par
51b5(1): dag pa myi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas yongasang su dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros
51b6(1): rnam par dag pas des de bzhin gshegs pa yongs sudan/ bas su ni/ bye teg dang / phreng ba dang / sa dang / 'dugs dang / rgya ca dang / bdan dang / rim po'i sgra dang / 
51b7(1): pa rnams kyis nyi gang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rto/ sa par myi nus so// de'i maba' ni theg pa gsum po sas theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan pas 'das pa'i sabar thug pas gtonas par
51b8(1): bsod nams kyi phung po phye ba'i mthar yang zad par bya myi nus so// ka de ci'i phyir zhe na / thogros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis chad skyed pa de bzhin du bzhin gshegs
51b9(1): sa son nus tham chad byed do// mtha'ams so// bsam gyis kyi khyab 'o//  mtshungs pa byed do// dpag tu byed do// grangs myed de// dpog gis kyi nga ngo // brjed du byed de/ thogs rnam pa rang// 
51b10(1): su zhin de bzhin gshegs pa da skar bzhugs te mamo zhing bzhes pa la ste nying byed pa dang /  bla mar byed pa dang / ri mong byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / brjed pa dang / bye ma'i gyi phyi ma dre lnga brgyam mas su zhig de bzhin gshegs/ 
52a1(1): pa pa ga rnam dang / rdzu kyis dang /  byung dang / da dang/ #
52a2(1): dad+ha gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal pa dang / phyag byed pa dang / hi hang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mer byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / gsol pa dang / bsngags pa dang / bsong ba byed pa
52a3(1): desapa/ yan yon lnga yongs su 'azung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / byung tu sangs rgyas bcom
52a4(1): ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa bskyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// de chos bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
52a5(1): ba hand pa 'dzind pa dang / de yang ji skad bstand pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nyen ra 'gyur ba dang / myurang tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur
52a6(1): che ba dang / bcas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yin yi byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
52a7(1): kyis byin khyim brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ thogros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos pani po de dag dang ldan na/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi sku'i bla rnams kyis byi dri bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis des
52a8(1): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' sa lad pa/ srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ byang chub tu ni sems bskyed pas// 'jig rten gyi ni mchod rtenas// su zhig bskor ba byed pa ni// tshe rabs dag ni
52b1(1): gnod kyin dang / phrin po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur// ngas de gang dag hanang ba'i/ phyi ma brgyad pa de dag spong / sangs rgyas byung bar ba mnges pa/ gsanyes par byed 'di sa bcin mdan ldan
52b2(1): gzugs ni phun gsum tshogs/ mchan kyis legs par brgyad pa dang / mthu' dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ de ni le 'acan du de kyi 'gyur/ de'i thug cing nor cher 'gyung / bsod nams ldan zhing jil
52b3(1): byed/ 'jig rten smon ma mnyes byas nas/ yang dang yang du sti bstang byed/ bdag myed stong pa'i chos thos na/ de ni chos la rmongs myi 'gyur/ myu ba tu dang pa thob 'gyur zhing // chos dod dri bzhin mkhas
52b4(1): gang 'gyur / tshong dbod khyim ba rgyas pa dang / thug po rnam bu skye bar 'byur / dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i 'dag por 'gyur/ gtoyo ba btang zhing me lnga byed/ 'das bu'i gli ba dgang yang rung / da pa
52b5(1): bya sa mjal// ded ni na pa kye/ pa nas pa / tshod rten bkod pa byas smra na/ skye lam yang / dang cer thags pa'i
53a1(1): babyid pa la/ bsdugs pa bslal pa bye ba // rdu pas da pa sra'igargya chub sems bskyed napa/ du ba'i rjod na byag
53a2(1): bskal pa bye bar yang / rnams kyang yong zhing 'bed myi 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten pa// mngon tu bskor pa byed pa ni/ bung po sngon po mangs 'dra'i/ rnam par 'ar pa ma
53a3(1): 'gyur/ mngon rten paskor ba byas nas/ de ni ris par rtag tu yang / mthun pa don kun thob 'byur zhing/ don byin rnams ni spangs pa ltar// mngon ted bskor pa byas na ni/ @
53a4(1): dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni le lo myed 'gyur zhing // rtag tu bag yod ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// mthu dang stobs dang mthu rtan la/ brtan zhing rnam par gnon
53a5(1): brtan dang // de ni myu ra tu mkhas par 'gyur// mye dang dug dang mtshond kyis ni// nams kyang 'chi dus byed myi 'gyur/  mkhas pa de ni rdzogs rdzogs su// zad par byas nas 'chi dus byed// 
53a6(1): mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khoradang / grong rdal rnams su longs 'apyod dang // gzugs kyi khyad par 'phags par 'gyur// byang chub dpyad pa pyod pa'i
53a7(1): de ni 'dod pa myi rtend cing // lus kyang gtsang la gos gtsang zhing / gtsang ma'i gos la gnas par 'gyur// / blo bros rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
53a8(1): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas/ dad pa skyes te pus mo gnyis ka'i lta bas la btsugs nas/ phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis
53a9(1): sku senas par brgyan pa de'i 'dra ba pa/ bdag gi sus kyang de 'dri bar gyur cig ces de lams pa bskyed na/ zlogros rnam par pa rnag pa bam darnams kyi phung po de'i mapa brjod par myi nus te/ zan byed
53a10(1): mas pa rjon pa pa cu chug gaganas pa'i byar// thab nams kyi phung ba den rgyas pa de nyid ni/ rgya byed ni dam/ zangs pa nyid da/ rang ba brgyab nyid dam/ yang dad par rdzogs pa'i mang sa rgya
53b1(1): 'dis snyed med/ de bzhin gshegs pa blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed nupa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya 'o// grod bye pa/ gzu laga' nga/ grong byed du 'jug kya dang / 'jas kyang rung / 
53b2(1): rlung / jug kyang cu / chos son kyang gang gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams na/ sems can d+hA dang / bu dang / gnod sbyi dang / drib dang / ska ma yin nas/ rnam pa N+DI ma/ 
53b3(1): ji 'am/ da lnga phye chen po'am/ myi 'am/ myi ma yin pa 'am/ sems can gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa shing ngam ri 'am/ khung bu 'am/ bu ga 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs
53b4(1): su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud/ kund tu 'dud pa gang yang myed de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dbyed de bzhin du ga rigs kyi bu de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram
53b5(1): yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khord tu rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud rab tu 'dud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'1tu
53b6(1): ya khad to// 'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes pos bskyed de/ sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni pus mo gnyis su 'jugs pa dang / 8su zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs rnams kun 'gro ba
53b7(1): de 'gro chen 'jig rten gsum po 'dud pa byed// mye rnams gtso bo rang 'byung gang du 'gro byed pa// de logs su ni mI dang shing dang sdong lcug dang / sman dang shing lo rnams dang 'bras bu 'dab ma dang / ya ma
53b8(1): dri ldan mye tog rnams ni 'dud par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rnams ni pum mo bcugs pa ni/ del gyi'i dbang po kun kyang 'dud par 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dbang dang bu dang rtswa'i rgyal po dang / 
53b9(1): tshangs pa'i dbang ze thams cad dang bar 'dud pa byed/ sam ldan 'das sa sus bcugs phyag byas na/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'ther los spur bar 'gyur / dper gyi mdog ldan mchan rnams
54a1(1): kyis ni go char 'gyur/ mthu che bla mar bya zhing thu la par dga' bar 'gyur// de'i yul na sems can gang dag gnas gyung pa/ de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems can dga' bar 'gyur/ 
54a2(1): de la sems can gang yang sdig pa myi bskyed de/ skye bo tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan mchod rten dag la bus bcugs phyag 'tshal ba/ de la 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal por rab tu
54a3(1): 'dud// swa dang klu dang myi dang lto 'phye chen po 'dud/ bskald pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyind thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/ gang che rgyal ba dam
54a4(1): ba 'byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba thong / 'dren pa gzhal yas rnams sa mchod pa byed par 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyur daces mos par bskyed napa ni/ 
54a5(1): bcom ldan 'jig rten rnams la bus bcugs phyag 'tshal ba// bskas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya grangs 'a gyur dan// de ni ring dpos phyi thogs byang chub mtshungs myed po'o// gang dag sangs rgyas
54a6(1): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la/ bskapad pa bye ba gzhal yas sti stang byed pa pas// gang zhig byi dus myi zad bskal pa 'di la ni/ mchod rten phyag 'tshal de'i bsod nams ches mang/ 6
54a7(1): / sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mchod pa byed gyu nga // byed pa dam pa spyod nas khyad par brnyes gyur so// myi'i khyu mchog de la 'dir ni mchod byas na// rnam par smind pa dam pa mtshungs
54a8(1): myed rang bzhin 'gyur// kyang chub tu ni sems pa snro te// mye tog phreng ba byas nas su/ mchod nyin nams su 'gyum // do ni rnams kyang 'phongs kyi 'gyur// kyi'i gnas nas gi 'a baman
54a9(1): bras bcu pa gsum du ni 'gro bar 'gyung // de ni rtson ldamanas kyi// gnas byed 'ang thob par 'gyur/ tshan te 'greng ba di dusan/ 'ang bcas dang dang 'ang bame pa pa// rnam sa/ 
54a10(1): mos bstend pa rnams// sum bcu gsum du spyod par 'jung // yan lag brgyad stan chu gang zhing // gser gyi bye ma dam gyu pa// bye 'u rgya dang shes dag gis// sna'i rdzing bu thob par 'gyur/ 
54b1(1): ne me zhwa dga' phamasapa/ ma'as pa'i ba chad rdzobs par zad/ 'i 'jig rten ni sa // byed 'angs kyad ldan du 'gyur// dan+de ba'i rdzu bden / 
54b2(1): yod gyur nas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byas nas/ rkang gnyis mchog pa mchod pa byed/ 'amachod rten 'phreng ba dbul byed pa// de ni 'dod chags kyi 'phrogs shing // zhe sdang gis kyang 'phrogs kyi
54b3(1): 'gyur// de ni rnams kyang rmongs myi 'gyur// rkang gnyis mchog la mchod byas na// de ni rje rabs thams cad na/ chags pa byed cing zhe sdang byed// brkam pa myed cing dbang po bsdams// mchod
54b4(1): rten 'breng ba dbul byed pa/ tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams su khrag khrig dag ni brgya 'grangs pa// kun tu bkur bsti byas par 'gyur// mchod rten 'bred pa 'bul byed pa// de ni 'khor los sbyar bar 'gyur/ 
54b5(1): brgya byid lnga'i dbang phyug 'gyur/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs pa ra 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la// dang gyi 'dun ba phul byas na/ lnga dag dang ni byi rnams kyi// don rnams sa
54b6(1): cad rtsub par 'gyur// dma' ba'i rigs ni rnams spangs te/ deng ni deng skye 'gyur ma yin/ phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug der 'gyur ro// gzugs dang don dang longs
54b7(1): byang dang / 'dog dang de 'byor pa dang / kun tu thag pa dang lda par 'gyur/ de mi rabs dran 'gyur zhing / 'dod chags kyis kyang 'phrogs kyi 'gyur/ 'dod pa rnams kyi skyon shes shing / 
54b8(1): rangs par byed pa byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byas na// gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang / ro rnams kyis kyang kyi rmugs shing // sdig pa'i las ni byed kyi 'thung // rnam par 'drenadu
54b9(1): pa mchod byed na// de ni spos dang bye tog gis// nams kyang 'bregs par gyi 'gyur zhing // dran ldan shes rab ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs sa su mchod pa// de'i nor gyi phung pos/ rgyam
54b10(1): chom ca nga// byed chu rkyen gyi 'byur// 'jig rte mnan pa'i min rten la// dang kyi 'dul ba su 'dus la// den ben pa dang bya dang // gang ba druganar gyi 'byung/ 'dig rted rnam
55a1(1): ma mtshad byed// me rabs dag ni rnams cad du/ mya ngan byed ci ci gnod myed dang / 'a'ajam sbyang ba 'byod chen 'gyur// 'dren pa mcho pa byas na ni// rkang pa lag pa gnyen
55a2(1): ka k+ka 'gyur zhing / lan la garnam par dag 'gyung la/ gzugs dpa 'a dog ldan par 'gyur/ sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/ byang chub khyad ci khyad par byed// gang dag 'jig rten ba nanan/ 
55a3(1): rkang gnyis mchog rnams mthong bar 'gyur// bskal na pa bye ba snong rnams dang / khrag khrig dag ni brgya 'grangs par// mcho cing bde la shes rab ldan// byang chub dam pa 'chang rgya yang // 'a/ 
55a4(1): rten mgon pa skyob pa la/ 'phreng ba'i khang pa byas nas ni// de ni g.yog 'khor myi 'byed cing // rgyal po 'byedad pa chen por 'gyur// 'phags pa rnams kyis gang spangs pa// sdig pa'i las ni spong
55a5(1): bar byed/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i// dge ba'id las rnams bstend par byed/ lha 'am 'on te klu rnams sam// 'jig rten dgan gang mkhas pa// de dag dga' zhing mgu bar
55a6(1): 'byung / hi heng byas shing bsngags par 'gyur/ brtend de ni gar skyes par// bsod nams gzi brjid shan tu brji/ yul 'khor dag dang grong byer dang / rigs der nyi stang byas par
55a7(1): 'gyur/ sangs rgyas gzhan gis myi thub pa/ rkang gnyis mchogs su mchod pa// de dag mthu stobs che ba dang // / g.yog 'khor chen pos mdzes par 'gyur// byang chub tu ni sems bsngos te
55a8(1): 'breng ba'i gtsug laga'ang byas na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang bsngags pa'i/ 'byed pa dag ni des zon 'o// de ni 'bed dang nang pa dang // sman dang sazungs kyi 'asrung rnams/ gang dang ga
55a9(1): skyes par yang / mtshand rnams kyis ni brgyanang par 'gyur// sems can dbul po rnams mthong na// de ni nor gyis sdud par byed// de ni nor dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de ni byang chub pyad pa spyod/ 
55a10(1): blos chen tham sa 'di kun/ yongs su btang ba byas nas kyang // dman pa'i sems bu kyi 'byung zhing / de ni nams kyang 'brangs rgya 'gyur// gde dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa// de dag bu dang bu mo dang / 
55b1(1): ba'i// swA yis zad par bya bar nus// de dag yon tan zad rgya
55b2(1): tshugs rnas// denyi pa gru phras/  kyi pa ldan /  ga tha / na na rtse gas dang /  ga
56a1(1): dmyal ba'i sa ni dkon pa yin// che rabs bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni bzang po rnams kyi mthong // sangs rgyas sras po spyob nas
56a2(1): gdod pa dag byes gyur da / zhal gta 'a shes pa 'o// shid du gdug pa'i srul du ste// don kres de sgom pas nyed// sdig pa'i sam rnams byed par 'gyung// de A rgyu kyi rnyed / 
56a3(1): nams kyang 'drangs pa za gyi myong // shri 'phos shin tu 'jig rten du// de ni rtag par rtun du brdung // dge slong dag la gnod byas pas// nams kyang skyabs ni rnyed myi 'gyur// de nis shi 'phos dus byas te/ 
56a4(1): phyi'i lus ni thob gyung da nas/ blo ngan de ni dmus pong 'gyur// gnod sems ldan zhing sdom pa myed// de ni nyes par spras byas te/ 'phags pa rnams la bsku rang btab pas// myi'i nang nas shi 'bon
56b1(1): nang// ngan sado nas myurang tu 'gro// / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ 4/ ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// bskal pa bye ba song dag d+hA// nams kyang sangs rgyas mthong gyi 'gyur// rdzogs
56b2(1): sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams pa/ gang zhig tshim pazhin zung pa// de ni ngan 'gro kun 'das te/ rdzu tu dpa 'gro bar 'gyur/ blag na chen ldan pa rgyu// slo ldan gi zhis
56b3(1): ba byed// dran dang ldan zhing shes rab ldan// bde zhing ngo ma khrel ltas ldan// gang tu 'jig rten rnams kyi skyon// yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pa// sangs rgyas mchod rten mthong nas ni/ yang nas
56b4(1): du sti nying byed// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// 'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos gyur nas/ sangs rgyas sras po rnams pa ni// su zhin gyi phyir dang kyi byed// gang ga'i sangs rgyas stong rnamam dang // brgya
56b5(1): dang bye ba bgrangs dgas/ bskasad pa gang 'ga'i bye ma snyed// de snyed bskald par bkur ba bas/ 'jig rten mngon gyis gsungs pa'i// dam chos 'jig che gang zhig gis/ nyin dang mtshan
56b6(1): dra'adzin byed pa ga deni nams kyang par 'dags kyi ma 'dzin du pa na chos 'dzin pa/ ldan gyi sangs rgyas pa ba cid dang / sangs rgyas seshes pa gan la// bde'adu
56b7(1): mchod pa byas// dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe// bston pa'i bstand pa srung byed pa// bstad pa bye ba stong rnams su// de ni rnams kyang gud myi 'gyur// lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni nang
56b8(1): khyim btab myi 'gyur/ de ni yid du myi 'ong bas/ nams kyang 'phrogs par myi 'gyur ro// stod pa'i bstan gasrung byas na/ bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // des kyang gsapa dang mnyen pa dang / 
56b9(1): sems can rnams la byams sems 'gyur// 'jig me rgyal ba mchog ni chos bzung ba/ bde dang dga' bo ba mdzod ni ma por 'gyur/ sngon gyi mi 'gro bya ba thob 'gyur zhing / kyi 'om brgyad pa ma lus pas/ 
56b10(1): bang tha~Mng // 'jig mo rgyal pa mchog gi chos bzung bas// dbe na nam mkha' skar mas yongs gang snar/ rag tu ma tham gyis gcer byas pa dang / rab tu ci snyan pani 'ang dbyangs ldan 'gyur// 'din 'a rgya
57a1(1): ga gco 'azung bas// ga na de na kyi nga krugs/ sa ma de semams par gyung//  rdzu na/ 
57a2(1): bzung bas// mthu dang stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan// myi dmanas rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu// sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la bsnyen bkur byed/ 'jig che rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mchom
57a3(1): tu rab mdzes gzugs ldan shes rab ldan// myi'i 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyur// rgyal po mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig ce rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/ mchog tu gzugs mdzes
57a4(1): sdug pa dang / skyes pa bud myed lha rnams dka' ba dang // bde zhing mkhas la bsngags shing shes rab ldan// stonod pa'i stobs bcu mnga' ba lha'i lhas// gang gi mdun tu mdo' 'di rab bshad pa/ 
57a5(1): myi de lag tu mdo'i sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dus kyi chen thob par// 'gyur// gang zhig stond pa myi mchog gzugs byed pa// na ras 'dri mig ngos 'dri 'am gser las byas// de'i chos kyi khyad par
57a6(1): gang yin pa// de dag sa sus rab tu gnad pas nyon// de ni lta byin 'ong bar gzhan myi 'gyur// sbyar bar myi 'gyur yan lag kyi sdug phyin// de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing la dog ldan/ 
57a7(1): sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur// lus ni rnam par dag cing khyad par 'thob// spobs pa thob cing sgra snyan yid du 'ong // shes bzhin ldan zhing 'jig rten kun gyi tshe// de mthong sems can ba
57a8(1): zhing dga' bar 'gyur// sdig byed myi 'gyur zhe sdang byed sems ldan// g.yo'i skyed kyi chu rgyal po'i phrug myi byed// mthu' dang ldan dbang cher grags par 'gyur// byams la gnas shing myi man sems dang
57a9(1): ldan// 'drend pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// de ni mchog 'gyur skye bo mang mchod 'os// blo ldan drug cing de nyid rgya cher ldan// dbang ldan 'a' lom spyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// 'dren pa'i sku
57a10(1): gzugs rab tu mdzes byas la/ lha'i dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pas/ spun po'i thom na dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur// bdag po srun po zom na rgyal srid stond// de ni dran dang blobros kyi ldan byed/ 
57b1(1): na rtogs sos shes rab chang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten kun nas dbugs byin pab 'gyur te// 'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dbyas pa spangs/ sems can snying po mtshungs myed mchod byas na/ dud 'gro'i skye gshini rje'i
57b2(1): yul myi 'gro/ ngan 'gro gsum po des ni rab tu spangs// bdag der phyis myi skye bar shes par 'gyur// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// dpal ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi sgrar 'gyur to// byi dman dan/ 
57b3(1): ba'i snyems kyis sangs rgyas mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi stan da la dad par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dbang thob tshangs par 'gyur// yid 'ong shin tu mdzes pa'i spos dad can// 'dzam bu'i chu klung gsera'o
57b4(1): byed dga' 'gyur ba'i// gzhal myed khang mchog lta sdug thob par 'gyur// de ni ded dpon stobs bcu ldan pa po// sems can snying po mtshungs 'dra myed pa thob/ kha dog mtha' yas 'jig rten kun na gsal/ 
57b5(1): gser steng rin cen be dur+ya dang mtshungs// su zhig dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog blangs// dang skyes 'jig rten mgon la char du gto/ de ni myi'i 'jig rten bsod nams ldan// rgyal srid gnas nas rgyal
57b6(1): ba mchog thob 'byung // mya ngan snyam zhim pa pa 'dring ldan lus / yan lag legs gnas mtshungs myed thob par 'gyur// skye 'i mang pos lta ba'i'om yin te/ dbul pa dgra' pa 'dod pa spong/ 
57b7(1): par 'gyur / kyang ba nam par myod pa 'dod pa la// ngan srugs thung ltar smad par shes par 'gyur/ mdas khyod dge bltung bar 'phags pa spyod/ dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu myod par 'gyur// kyang sa
57b8(1): rnam par byed na/ bskalang pa mtha' yas mang du de lanas/ rab mdzes ub pal gsung ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de'i lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing // can dang sna bung dri zhib dag kyang 'byung // phyung ba rnam pa
57b9(1): khyed zla pa dang / sadri khyor gyi gti zug gdang byi // na pan bskyed pa'i sems kyi 'dugs byin nyid/ ngagayod sgra nas rgyal phreng pan/ gangs rgya ba mya ngan 'das par// de nishes papa
57b10(1): dag chos kyang 'dzind/ pyod can dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pasbyin// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bres mchod/ rgyal ba mchog gi bstand pa 'jig dus te/ rab tu dga' ba'i ston pa'i chos tshul 'dzin / 
58a1(1): de chos mchog 'dzes pa de spyad nas/ gnon pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gzhar gyi 'gyur// gas te sems can thams cad sangs rgyas zhing / nyon mongs byed pa gser mdog gonas bcur gyur// 
58a2(1): de dag bsta da pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du/ rgyal ba mchog la mchod pa'i sngags brjod nus/ 'jig rten kun tu sdig pa'i las spangs te/ dga' ba'i sems kyis mchog gi las byas shing / rlabs ched
58a3(1): spyod che don ni legs byas nas/ 'jig rten mthu chen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// gang gis spos cu ba yungs 'bru tsam blangs te/ bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bdug byed pa// 'di'i phan yon
58a4(1): brjod kyis sems dang zhing rdul dang dri ma spongs la mnyand par gyis// de ni bsod nams ldan zhing phyogs kun rgyu// nad byed gyur cing blo rtang pag yod la/ spang ba rnam par spyod che bya ngan 'dul/ 
58a5(1): skye bo mang po dka' zhing yid du 'ong / rgyal po thob nas rgyal ba mtsho/ dag bkur 'gyur// mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor los sgyur 'gyur/ ra te/ gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi go cha can/ 'jig
58a6(1): rten kun na yid 'ong dri ldan thob dag de la yid kyi 'de dang sdug bsnga byed/ gyur pa khyod kyi 'angs spyod nyams kyi 'gyur// phyag kyi nod ldan mdzod 'i rab tu mang / mya ngan myed gyur nga 'jig rted
58a7(1): kun tu rgyu/ skye bo mang po sngags te de la dri/ rgyal ba mchog gi snyand pa khyad 'phags chos/ tshig rab brjod cing the tsom seld par byed/ chos yid bde ba srung yang smra bar byed/ sdig pa'i las
58a8(1): phyi'i 'dzin pa zugs na/  kyi spyod// khyo do su byed bad/ ba rtenan masul shA ga pa/ deb na
58b1(1): rgyu na/ sbyi man sems kyis byang chub badrangs myed pas/ semasas bye ba zhag zhig brdzul pa mas// byag byed pa de zhes mchog pad cing //  tshus
58b2(1): dang / zas kyi gyu ma A / ma nas na/  nan rje //  nas / rna 'gas da sa gang da/ 
58b3(1): pag sude sus shin du bde/ gang nani gos kyis bkyim ldan mad/  rten dang // 'dren pa mtshungs byed rnams la mdzod byed de// de lta drang batshungs pa byed pa'i sus thob ste// sum cu cha pa
58b4(1): mtshan gyi mye ton rgyas// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris/ byas na// lag this nas nis mu tig 'phreng mdzes pa// sA/ 6/ tshogs dag dang seng ge'i 'phreng ba dang // gser sku rab
58b5(1): mdzes bskal pa mtha' yas 'byung / bcom ldan mchod rten zhes kyis dkris byas na// lnga 'am thu 'am myi 'am lto 'phye che/ su yang de sam dang bskyed myi byed// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di ston
58b6(1): bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// stong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil gnon te/ 'jam srung gseb gyis gser ni bris mnan bzhin// skye dgu'i don ni dpag tu byed pa byed/ gal te rid cen ran
58b7(1): mchog sde brgyan gyis// stong gi shing kun rab tu bkang ba'i// de 'dra'i dpal 'di da pang b+ha m+b+hi rgyus/ rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos cig phul btsun/ nong bu drin cen zla ba'i 'ad rnams kyis/ bye ba
58b8(1): khrag brgya stong zhing bkang ba/ de 'dra'i dpal ni zad par bya myi nus/ rgyal ba'i mchod rten shes cig phul brtson/ 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mes bskyed de/ bcom ldan mchod rton bu dan phul
58b9(1): byas na/ de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur// byang chub pyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod// bcom ldan mchod rtem pa dan phul byas na// de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur// dag cing mchog ni
59a1(1): dang // du gu la dang ka shi ba rnams dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyang rnyed par 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling rigs mchog dam pa gang // phyag cin pa nyid bdag dab na ma ba// de dag tu ni rtag tu de ste ste/ 
59a2(1): dman zhing mchog tu dngul ba rnam par spangs/ de la sems can su yang phrag dog myed// sems can gnod par sems pa gzhar myi 'byung // gzhan gyi sdig pa'i las la de smod de// rtag tu bag yang tshul khrims
59a3(1): rnam par 'gyur// 'dzind pa myed cing ser sna myed par 'ong // gtong ba rab btang mya ngan myed pa thob// de ni srog phyir gzhan la sbyin myi byed// 'phongs pa myed byed rtag tu bag yod 'gyur// sangs rgyas sto/ 
59a4(1): bcu ded dpon mthong nas ni/ dga' ba'i sems kyis gdugs dang bdan dang // mar me rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchon/ byang chub 'byod mchod de ni rtag par spyod/ phyi'i 'jig rten ma
59a5(1): mang bsnyen bcur byed// sna dang lnga'i dag dang phyi'i gzo// mi 'dra smos mchog bstan sdug pa dang / ni bu shes 'dra hA tshigs ldan bzon// rirab me mong lda ra rab tugasapa/ 
59a6(1): sgra kun slob mar gyur nas mngon tu 'dud// chos kyis de dag yid bde bskyed par byed// de sa dang mchog gsal pa thob par 'gyur// de nas mye'i 'jig rten du// rgyal po dam pa stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur/ 
59a7(1): des sems can su yang sdig tu byed/ skye bo mang po dga' nang yod 'ob 'gyur// nus gsas sems ca mchogs rgyal mtshan bus// rang ba gyi thogs nor yang rnyed par 'gyur/ shes rab ma
59a8(1): yas mdzod mying mang ldan 'od // sems chung myi 'byur dman pa'i sems kyi 'gyur// longs khyod rnyed nas bged ni bdag kyang khyod// de ni 'jigs byed med kyi de ba skyed// rgyas po dga'ad ga klong khye yus
59a9(1): 'khor 'ged/ de la sems can su yang sngog kyi byed// gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa mdzod mnga' zhing / khyim bdag rin cen sna tshogs lus brgyand 'gyur// rgyal po'i bu 'am de bzhin blonam por 'ong / rgyas
59b1(1): bong gyu ra na stobs ldan rdzib skyed/  brtas pa'i rigs dpa' thams cad yongs su spyod/ longs spyod byud 'phags rigs mchog brnyes nas ni/ 
59b2(1): sun// drin sa ba rbang te srid pa'i mi me ra// sangs rgyas zheng de 'angam thu g.ye gas kyang / de 'du da ya bad par tha ldan yod rten ma medul byab na// de'i su 'a'i
59b3(1): mdog ngan mod kyi 'thugazugs chog pa zhing lag pa byung ba 'ad+ma/ sdang bathabangs pa'i rkyen bya \u0f7f/ sa te rgyal ba dam pabyung snanan// de bzhin gshegs nams dang kyi bar 'gyu/ 
59b4(1): nye dung 'byung rdzam sa na bu yang 'gyur// de ni yi ges ru po gyu sa te was thig pa rgya stong sangs rgyas zhing // lungs 'brung ga gis byang bur dang rdzun pa// bablang ba dang doganapa zhing brjo pa
59b5(1): drus// bde gshegs sar me cig sas des byed// sangs rgyas dam pa mtshungs byed sbyin pa'i gnas// spyod pa mchog kyang byung bar brnyes gyur dpa// rkyem che de la brjod pa 'di byas pa// rnam par hU~M/ 
60a1(1): bams gnas yas 'gyur/ gal te myi mjed 'jig rten khams 'di kun// nor bu rin chen be dU r+yas blang ba// zad par byanus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ mar me cig phus dpal de za
60a2(1): kyi 'gyur// rag pa nas kyi mad 'dige rten 'ams// 'ganas srid pa'i ma ma'i ba gas// ga por bya rgyas sangs rgyas pa sbyin pa// mang po cin bus dpa den N+DI // sa
60a3(1): rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan dan gyis// 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo bar gang bar// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me tsog dul dpas de zad myi 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i sgra
60a4(1): ras kyis// gos kyis sangs rgyas zhing stong gang gyur dpa/ zad par bya nas sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me cig phul dpal de zad kyi 'gyur// klu dang lnga sbyin gyi dang sti 'bye che// lnga'i lha rdzas na/ 
60a5(1): bu rin chen mang // zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/ te dmar me cig phul dpal de zad myi 'gyur// lha'i 'jig rten mo/  pa lha'i spros// de dag myi mjed 'jig rten 'di kun gang gyur/ 
60a6(1): / zang par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mang matsanabu med papa de zad kyi 'gyur/ gzugs dang phyogs 'tshams chad ni shes par nus// nam mkha'i khams 'di tshad kyang / 
60a7(1): par nus/ sangs rgyas brjod nas pe cin phus pa// de 'dra 'a bal de zad par bya ma nus// sangs rgyas dam pa myi mchog bzung pa'ichi// 'dren pa'i mtshungs pa skyed pa dang byas te/ na pas
60a8(1): rgyal te zed kyi 'bab dra// me tog ma le ga'i gdugs ni bcom ldad bul// des nisam mdzes dam pa zhus byas pas// skan bang brgya byin du ni lan 'bras rgyud// 'din rted su turangs pa med// 
60a9(1): rgyu// rnal ba'i 'od na sa ni gzugs smraldanapa// dazang pas sbyang ba'i gyis tha skabs ldan 'arjed// stong ldan na me dbang bya nga gyu te/ na chen re tu 'arjes ma da dper bya / 
60a10(1): khyim bdag tu slo rnams ldan par gyur / 'di gshegs kyi mchog bye ba nyi shud do// ngas ni nyis byas panams pan papa' ma/ rgya mchog dgas tha mang sti steng byas// de dag gtsug lag 'ang sa sdom kyi
60b1(1): 'byung/ ga ro gyi sa 'jig brtan phrag// theg mang dag rten 'je di 'ang // dbe rji me byung nA/ sgra skad ldan sag bye dpa byed 'byed/ com ldan par sten ma po sa bya ni// 
61a1(1): da brgya // yar bsnas pad kyang 'phags sus pas // yongasas mtshad kyis go car byas par 'gyur/ sa ldan ldan 'amasems cad rted bye pa//  nga byu 'banas ba mangs pa'i/ 
61a2(1): byed lang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan thob// de ni de la zhang yang sbed kyi bskyed/ bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i 'tshan nyen byags// mi 'ang dri ldan ma chos tu bas sdug pa'i// lnga'i du sa bye ba steng thob cing / de ni de ba nam
61a3(1): byang chags kyi bskyed// bcom ldan kya na 'das pa'i 'tshod rten byag sa// 'askyed pam ma mchog yod pa'i 'i// yan pas brgyad ldad chu tshangs 'gyu sa// bye ton chung ba las ni byam pa // 
61a4(1): sngam mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// de'i g.yog 'khor rtag tu mthun 'gyur zhing // myi dman sems nan sA'i sna yang thoT// lha po rnams kyi glu dbyangs sgra snyan thob// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ 
61b1(1): 'a te sud du skyes pa dag nyid kyi zhin ma 'ang ma dang grang byas de// rtswa'i las da bangs rgyam mazeng ba / ma can byang nga 'al pa'is rten bya sa// de'i rnas snang pa sa
61b2(1): rgyas ga rdzug pa /  pa bya sa thu /  rdzun 'as na@ napa pa 'ad/ 
61b3(1): rgyaman pa btu ba dang / de dag pa dang na tan chos kyang / bdes rten ma ma sbyi de lta 'gyur mi te/ mas pa 'a nas patshad rte na skyes babad pa'i// de med pa dag se
61b4(1): ba drinas pa dang ba'i sems kyis nyod/ mabu chen skyes bu ngas btung 'bags pa// rgyal ba dam pa ma 'angs dus dmathong // de dag batshed pa dam pa mtshon nim mchod// de'i na gas sa bdam pas/

61b7(1): tad tu thob pa'ang bar byed pa de// rgyal ba dbyas kyi dru du pabs / rnangs par 'gyung ba 'di yinin/ 'di dang byab dang da 'byor ma // byang chub sems dpa gang 'di

62a1(1): bsngags pa brjod kyang mtha' mar byand kyi nus// dri zhim yid 'ong spos kyis chog bzhin// sangs rgyas mchod rten rnams sa su srung ba// de mi 'thob rnyed 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de nis 'dir snyi
62a2(1): po blangs par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos ni phul byas na// bcom ldan 'das kyi stanang pa 'jig 'gyur tshe// 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar myi 'gyur zhing // de ni de che mtho' ris bdag por 'gyur// rgyas
62a3(1): ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// dri myi zhi ma dang myi gtsang spang pa rnams// rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung por gnas// de ni rtag tu tshangs spyong mchog 'di pyod// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul

62a7(1): sus dz+ha// de bzhi gshenas dge ba'aza par 'byung // rgyas tho brjod rten pos rgyag tshus byas na// rgyas pa stongs ldan 'a'adams brgya bang 'jur// na tsho dpon gyim bdag pa med dmas na/ 
62a8(1): rje 'od badzad pangs rgya bu yang babyung / da'i dasgos pas kyi dkras phrin pa skyes te// com ldan pa sbyin do byeng 'drug// de'i rgyas po mtshan byin yang/ chu me pa pam las smra
62a9(1): brji zang pa pa sanas spang sa/  rgyas padud byed 'is gang ba'i/ bstan bdas rkyen mams ldag pa// drab snga rigs drugs sa// rgya pacha pa dgangs par mdzod/

62b2(1): gso ldan gaman can gnas kyi 'thur/ sems can gyingan thamachog ldan pa dang / phan byed byams sems ldan pa den gnas/ shi 'phos pag yang de re sar 'bru nye dag nag dang 'ani ba sngo

63a3(1): sang bas mchod 'os blta 'os 'gyur// des rgyal po gnod par sems kyi 'gyur // bcom ldan mchod rten dmas snga ba sa myos// mye tog sus bskam ze phyag byas na// ngan seng sa'i lam ngan pamam
63a4(1): cad gcod// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phung por gnas// mchod rten me ton rnyis pa su byas pa// bag yod mya ngan rnams dang spyon rnams spong // na nams dus ma sus rnam par spong // bskul

63b7(1): khrag dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyor phyag 'tshal ba/ sbyin dang snyand par smra dang don khyod dang / don mthun pa dag skye bo mang la byed// pyod cing brgyad la khro ba'i dngos kyi skye/ sangs rgyas mchod rten pal
63b8(1): sbyang phyag 'chal ba/ mtho ris 'jig rten gnas shing lnga dbang 'gyung // phyir gyur na yang phyi'i rgyal por 'gyur// de ni gzhan yang yongs su nyams kyi 'gyung // sangs rgyas mchod rten pal sbyar phyag 'tshal pa/ 
64a1(1): de ni gzhar yang ngam song myis myi ltung // 'jig rten 'jig de rtag tu 'dod pa spong // rin cen ni phyug cing mdzod mang 'gyur// yon tan ldan la tshig cig tu sprob// de ni byi rigs bsngags la
64a2(1): grags pa ga nas gang bar mgyud da pa de bar khang ba'i seM gzugs pa'i phyogs cas yang byed do// de nas bces ldan 'das dgos shing sabye pa na du/ ting nge dzi dems shes te zheng sa nas kyang
64a3(1): la lan gsum gzinas so// 'khong la gzigs nas kyang seng ge'i bsgyings pa chen po lan gsum mdzad do// bsgyings nas kyang sngags kyi daphung tha lan gsum byung ngo // sngags kyi dbang po lan gsum thungs
64a4(1): kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos lan gsum khyab par mdzad do// stong gsum gyi sto/  chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sngags kyi dbang pos lan gsum khyab
64a5(1): bar mdzad cing rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba des khyab par mad/ dzad nas yang rnam par gzigs so// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom
64a6(1): ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dod par gyud to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' saya ba/ byi 'pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa ring bar
64a7(1): gyi thogs par yongs su mya las 'das par 'gyur gyis 'di ni khyed de bzhin gshegs la yongs su dri ba'i dus yin no// 'di ni chod yin no// khyed gang su dag chos sa the tsom yod pa de dag de bzhin gshes
64a8(1): pa la yongs su ma zhus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon gsum du bzhugs pa'i tshe/ bdag cag gis ma zhus pa ga la srid ces phyis 'gyod par gyu rad ta re re/ de skad ces bka' sa lang pa dang / byang chub sos/ 
64a9(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid dus mkhyend pa tshod mkhyen pa/ rand pa mkhyen pa/ 
64b1(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa 'di ldan ring na garnam par 'gyur ba d+he/  bung ras shegs par bstan tug nga/ dem pa dri nga chug pan gan ga ya sa tu rnaM ze cwa/ 
64b2(1): ma'i gsag 'al dang ldan pa/ ma ldan 'das rkyen pams men pa'i byag 'as te/ mam kya na/ sam ldan 'as pa 'di sa sa to//  ma
64b3(1): pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyi sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs na de skye bo zang pos sman pa dang / skye bo
64b4(1): mang po la bde ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsku dang pa 'a yang yung ring du gnas par 'gyural pa'i slad du/ bcom sa 'a das kyis kyang bstand tugaso pa zhes gam 'denas kyang / co co ldan
64b5(1): cig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' brtsald pa/ gyi 'pham pa 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
64b6(1): nga rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangan me ba das pa la me meng bsku la zhis mad chos kyi nam blangs 'di sa gsungs pa'i phyi thugasas// mangs pa'i nus na de bzhi gshegs 'byung ba dang
64b7(1): chob kyi rnam grangs 'di gsung bar myi 'byung ba gang yang kyi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zhig chos 'dis sbyang ba ma byas par chos ston pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsru pa 'debs pa yin/ 
64b8(1): des sa ga do// phung sho gsum las cang zugs pa de yang na sa se san dbya nga / byams pa di na gis kyi
65a1(1): sa/ de yang ma las kyi da da sa /  nga na di dus skye
65a2(1): byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byeng chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / byangs pagang tshu pa de bzhin gshenas pa se nad pa myed pa yongs sra mya ngan pas 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshes
65a3(1): bal 'gyul pa 'am/ maco 'am/ bsnyen par gsung gis nyes dA bar gsungs pa 'am/ nyes par dgengs pa 'am/ 'phrin las rnams kyi brgyad kyi las bshad zin dkyis/ khyod kyang spobs pa/ 
65a4(1): kyis ga ts+tsha sbyin can byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi bdud pa dang / de da ces rnas pa dang / bdud sdin can gyisa'i bu mtshan pa'adas la 'di gad ces smras so// khA'iH
65a5(1): nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa su yang dag thum yin ma/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ de ste ste/ nas 'byer kyang ba rnam bde thol ba 'dod cing 'a'ang bas bsgrub pa rnams la bskyed pa dang / 
65a6(1): bskyen pa dang / bzhen 'dur byed pa ni bdud kyi las ming pa nyid la oM sang rtog cing / sems can mas par 'dor ba yang bdud kyi las so// 'dus ma byas las me rtog cing 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rgya bas/ 
65a7(1): yongs su spro ba yang bdud kyi las so// bsam gtan bskyed cing thamam gtan sa sa rnam par ldon pa'i tshim pa yang bdud kyisas so// ches stond byam chos nyand pa rnams snying rje chen po kyi bskyed
65a8(1): pa ni nga bdud kyilas so// yon tan dang ldan pa dang sbyin gnas chos zhing tshul khrims 'das pa rnams la cwob yang bdud kyilas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam snyend cing theg pa tshonan/ 
65b1(1): yang ya ma pa nas sa sun mdas nadu pa yang / blang chu se ba gas pa kyi sa rgyu
65b2(1): dud kyil so// rab tu men pa'i bsngag sa brjod kyang sems can gyi bstan pa rnams mad par spyor ba sang bdud gyis s+ho// dge ba'i na migs kyang byung chub
65b3(1): tu byed pa sa na / namapa phyin pa khyod dang lda pa nas kyad bums can rnams stug 'byi sa /  na pa d+hI drang /  'dis
66a1(1): byung byin// byang chub sems dpa 'ag dag bdud kyis pa 'di rnams thos shing / thas nas kyang rnam par 'a bde ga kyang chub yongs su smi par byed pa'i chos nyi chu bo za bar 'gyur ro/ 
66a2(1): nyi mu gang zhen 'dis ste byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 'khor ba yongs su gyi sto ba dang / dge pa'i ba shes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par byed pa dang
66a3(1): rol tu phyin pa rnams nyand pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang / bskasad pa mnyam pa dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i shes pa dang / 
66a4(1): ma thos pa nyand pa dang / tshe rabs che rabs su byang chub kyi sems dang mngon tu gyur pa dang / rtag tu rgyun gyi chad pa rab tu byung ba rnyed pa dang / das baphun sum tshogs pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rdzas/ 
66a5(1): sgrub pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pas sems can sdud/ cing yongs su 'dzind pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzind pa dang /  g.yo'i myed cing sgyu myed pa dang / 'phags pani
66a6(1): dngom po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can thams casal khrong khro ba myed pa ste/ byang chub yongs su spyi nang par byed par pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu
66a7(1): mtshan bzangs kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni/ sdig can khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bdud kyis smras pa/ 
66a8(1): lnga'i bu mtshan bzangs 'di la kho bo rnyed pa ci zhig legs par rnyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ myi gang 'byung po babs pas bstand pas/ de ni myi de'i 'gyur ba ma yin gyi de ni 'byung po de'i
66a9(1): 'gyur bar blta'o// lnga'i bu de bzhin du khe bo yang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs nas ho nad kyi 'di kho bo'i skyes bu'i rtsal du myi lta'o// / lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can khyod sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang
66a10(1): ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khris 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing chos stonang pas dga' bar ma gyur da tam/ bdud kyis spras pa/ khyed kyis ni kho bo brgya na par mthong ba lta na/ kho bos ni/

66b3(1): na/ de dag la 'khrug pa myed/ khro ba myed pa'i phyir ro// gang dag 'khrug cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod par gsol dgos so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ji 'du
66b4(1): bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa sems
66b5(1): kyis sdug pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams da la myi sbu bas g.yo'i myed pa'i bzod pa dang / dbul zhing da'aphongs pa yongs su skyob pa snying brtse zhing snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang /

66b8(1): cad rjes su srung ngo byed pa yang myed la/ myi mthun pa yang myed pa'i bzod pa dang / myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ skye ba myed cing 'byung ba myed pa'i bzod pa nye/ sna'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub

67a9(1): dbas sangs rgyas kyi mdang pa gang nas par /  ma dpas kyis smras pa/ kwa'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdangapa ni sems can thams sad kyi nyin mongs pa rnams su bcal par byan// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

70a5(1): shes pa bang min pa de la 'don pa gang yang byed/ sa bsngal kyi ste ba shes pa bdu lan bye la yam gang ya byed pa de garang dge slong nus bzhin thon pa rnams na yang smyed ba kyi byed/ kunan par tu byed/ de/ 
70a6(1): bar myi byed do// gangs skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / gnas pa byed pa de 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa bsgom pa ste/ lha'i bu de ltar du
70a7(1): dge slong lhag pa'i ngargyal myed pa yin no// de nas bdung sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid myi bde ste// gdong mchims grang zhing mchims brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so// gangan chos kyi
70b1(1): ram grangs 'di yod pa de bdud rnams kyi skabs byed do// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag gis bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas/ bdud sbyin
70b2(1): can sdug bsngal zhing yad kyi de ste/ yid la gcags pa'ide de bzhin du gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos byangs dpal gzho nung gyungs pas 'di skad ces snas so// 'dam dpas
70b3(1): byad kyis bshad pa'i don ji skang bdag gis shes pa star na/ de drug skrag pa'i nga rgyal myed pa'i tshul bab me 'di tham nas spong ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byed do// sten pa rdzogs pa myed do//

70b5(1): gang ngag ldag pa'i brgyal myed pa'i chul mchog tu zab pa ste/ da thos nas kyi sdug kyi dang gal dang bar bya 'gyur zhing / sa par 'gyur ba de dge rnam par grol bar nyid du rig par bya'o// 
70b6(1): de' ma dpa rnam par 'phrus pa'i'i bu zhes bya bar zung gi/ bdung 'chul ba'i mi rtse zhes bya dang yang rung bshe/ bcos stan 'das kyis de sa bes paga'i sas nas/ khang mdapa' gagadung gyung pa dang / 
71a1(1): ga'i rje 'di ma ba dang / mabs pa dadang ldan pa'i 'i de ga dang / kAdang / gyi dag ma na dang / dri ny-i pas pa'i yi bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
71a2(1): 'do pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag mas/ 'di sa / bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig nu/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i 'bar bya nod kyi phung po'i ris
71a3(1): yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin nas pa de ste dus/ stong gsum gyi nyang chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'di dang gyi rdzu khris pas brgyad pa dang / zag za gyis brgyad kyis 'dug pa
71a4(1): bdug pa dang / phyi tog sil mas chasad par bkram pa dang / pad ma 'dab ma stong phrag brgya pas khebs par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin de pa snyoms par bzhugs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
71a5(1): khams 'din tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong ji snyed med pa de dag re re zhing yang gsog 'khor bye ba brag stong dang / bcom ldan 'das gal gdong nas byind pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bom phyag 'tshal te/ 
71b1(1): ma za srud nas/ bcom ldan 'das sa byag 'jal ning phyogs gcig tu 'dod par gyur to// stong dasum kyi ga po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'din gnas gcing ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang byug rnams dang / 
71b2(1): dbang drug car po rnams dang / lha'i dbang po rnams dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod kyid byi bang po rnams dang / rnam yin gyi bang po rnams dang / rnam sa la sting gyi dbang po rnam pa dang / byi lamadri

72b2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo'i chos kyi rnam blangs 'di ma gsungs pa de myi bzhugs so// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin

72b6(1): khar byas la/ de nas bdag gis chos snyand par bya'o// mas pa phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i cho su bsdu ba 'di khyod kyi las yin gyis sems shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
72b7(1): bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin zhes gso pad to// bcom ldan 'das kyis nyand to// desang bcom ldan 'das kyis bya bachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bos te bka' sayan to//

72b9(1): mas 'das par 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'brusad pa 'am/ btso 'am/ bsnyel ba 'am/ gsung gis nyes par gsungs pa 'am/ nyes par dgongs pa 'am/ 'phrin las nyes par mdzad pa cis

73a1(1): dang / ka gi nub me de bzhin gshegs pa 'i nad pa myed par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas gang ci gsungs pa de dag thams cad yang nag pa de kho na/ de bzhin te/ gzhan du ma
73a2(1): anan/ 'dil kyi blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa kyi shes shing 'od tu chud ba nga'i ldem pa'i rig la 'di mi rung ngo // 'di ni gyi rung ngo zhes zer te/ de lta bu de dag tsha dam pa'i chos spong ba yin te/

73a6(1): bdeb/ ma grags pa rigs dman pa ye byad la yongs su chags pa/ chos ma bde bar gnas pa'i zas thams cad dang bral ba / ting nge 'dzin kyi zas las shin tu ring zhing rnam par ring ba/ spu dang g.yo nga la gnas/ 
73a7(1): ba dag gzhan dag tu smra zhing gzhan du byed de/ de dag myi shes bzhin du nged ni shes pa dang ldan no zhes zeramyi mkhas bzhin du ded mkhas so zhes zer te/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa la gnas pas/ 
73a8(1): thugs rje chen po dang 'bas mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsnyel ba myi mnga' ba la gnas te mos pas gzung ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la byang chub bstand pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig 'di skad du gang

74a1(1): des 'o lda me rgyabrag 'acur semasas narnams la chos stod to// de'i gsung rab sa dge slong 'jom sangs su dgu pa zhes bya bcom smras pa gtam 'chogs nga/ byas ma thos
74a2(1): dag par gnod pa/ skye bo mang thos yang dras par 'dzin tu 'dug pa/ skye momang po la yang dag pal sa theng bstod pa/ skye bo mang pos yang dag par dag par byed pa byung nga/ des de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma byed pa'i

74a10(1): tha la mkhas pa ma yin te/ de skye bo de dag sa chos thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes stong pa nyid kyis 'doms shing stong pa nyid kyis rjes su bstan to// gangangs chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshe/

74b3(1): nga ni tshangs par spyod nas sun ring du yin gyi de ni gas bu ste/ bsnyend pa rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa yin gyis de ltar yid ches par ma byed cig ces zer te/ dge de ni pag yod pa yin te/ dge slong mtho ba yongs su da
