75a9(1): sems dpa' dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na sems kyis gzhan bas sa par gyi bya ste/ bdag cag gis mchod rten nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong // bdag cag gi mdun na sangs rgyas bzhugs so snyam du
75b1(1): bsams so// rigs kyi bu dag gal te byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' mchod rten gyi sdug shes sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa ma gtogs par 'du shes gzhan bskyed par gyi bya'o// 
75b2(1): gzhan du gyur na byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid la ma byung bar 'gyur ro// de la dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa gyi 'khrugs pas thugs dam pazhes pa gal te bdag gis sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
75b3(1): mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ma bskyed na/ ngas 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu skyed pa rnams na/ gang dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bslus par gyur cig ces bya ba yin no// 
75b4(1): rigs kyi bu dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la gang su dag gzungs thob pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu
75b5(1): dag de ltar na/ 'di la su chos smra ba la myi snyan par brjod pa de/ dngas ni de bzhin gshegs pa spangs par 'gyur ro// rigs / kyi bu dag gang su zhig sems can dag ji skar mos pa'i mos pa bzhin du/ narba hA
75b6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos stond pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthul yin no// 'khor gang tu byang chub sem sa dpa'i theg pa la dga' zhing spu zhes byed dam/ mchim lan 'ga'
75b7(1): zhig thog pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur shes par bya ba yin na/ de la myi blun po byang chub sems dpa' ma yin par byang chub sems dpar las che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byind par gyur/ 
75b8(1): ba chos sub/ tshul 'chos pa/ chog rid pa la spyod pa de dag la cig 'di skad ces 'di lta zhig cigs zhes zer ro// byams pa ngas byang chub kyi byed pa na bdag nyid kyis gang tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa
75b9(1): ni rang gi lus yongs su btang ba dang / chung ma yongs su btang ba dang / bu dang bu mo yongs su btang ba dang / rgyal srid yongs su btang btang bas nyos shing byams pa legs par bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa cig
75b10(1): ni byir 'dam bu'i gling byin te nyes par ngas mngon par dran na/ de dag ni nyid pa dang bkur ba sti srung zhing sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar gan du 'gro bar sems so// gyi 'jam ba dam pa'i chos kyi chub 'di 'thung bar yang
76a1(1): 'byor da ldan pas nus kyi/ myi ldan pas ma yin no// myi 'pham pa dus mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis chos gang bstand pa de la de dag 'di skad
76a2(1): de ni sung mnod par bya ba ma yin no zhes zer te/ sems can de dag 'byung ba ma yin pa'i nyes pa chen po tso tsam dang ldan pa la ltos/ byi 'pham pa dge slong chos des rnam par 'thag pa'i mdo'i sdong bstan te/ 
76a3(1): bsam gtan bzhi pa bskyed kyang de lta bu'i gnas su gyur da nagang phyogs tsam 'am/ cha tsam la reg par/ rnam par 'thag pa 'dzind pa'i dge slong rnams la mngon par myi dga' zhing rnam par 'thag pa la skyon/ 
76a4(1): 'dogs pa lta ji smras te/ de dag ni chos smra ba'i dge slong la bskur pa 'debs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos spong ba yin/ rlom sems chen pos bsku rang pa 'debs pa yin te/ sems can dmyal bar skye
76a5(1): ba de dag la ni legs so zhes bya bar dmyi smra'o// de ci'i phyiran/ gang dag chos smra ba la rnam par spong ba de dag ni sangs rgyas la rnam par smod pa yin/ chos la rnam par smod pa/ 
76a6(1): ra no// gang gcom smrab la rim gri byed pa de dag sa pa ma gro med pa yin no// sa smrabs kyidepa de na pa de ga shes rgyas mthong ba kyi
76a7(1): yin/ sangs rgyas la myi snyand par brjod pa yin no// gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas btang ba yin te/ ji snyed du khong khro ba'i
76a8(1): sems bskyed par byed pa de snyed kyi bska lad par sems can dmyal bar go ma bgo dgos so// ci tsam du 'ong khro ba'i myig blta ba de srid du lo ba'i skye mched thob par 'gyur ro// citsa pa du phyi snyan par brjod pa de
76a9(1): srid du lce'i skye mched myed pa thob par 'gyur ro// myi 'pham pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod sems bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song du 'gro bar lo lnga sdu 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu gzhan ni ngas
76a10(1): ma mthong ngo // phyi 'amam pa sems can gyi 'du shes dang / chos kyi 'du shes la gnas pa rnams la nims mngon par 'du byed pa yod de kyi dmyigs pa la byed do// ga byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos ma dad du
76b1(1): 'byed cing stond pa de dag ni spros pa la gnas pa yin no// myi 'pham pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa drug yang dag par bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyir yin na/ de la yang myi thun po
76b2(1): de dag de skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kho na la byang chub sems dpa'as bslab par bya'o// zhes zer zhing pha rol tu phyind pa lhag ma rnams la su nad 'byind pa'o// myi 'bam pa 'di ji snyam
76b3(1): du sems ko shi ka'i rgyal po gang yin pas mgo byind par gyurd pa de chal ba'i shes rab yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' saH la dang / myi 'pham pa ngas pha rol
76b4(1): tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo' gang dag bstand pa de dag ci byang chub thob par 'gyur ba ma yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub thob par 'gyur lags so// bka' sa lad pa/ kyi lam pa khyod
76b5(1): kyis bskal pa drug bcur sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la pyad/ @skal pa drug bcur tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad/ bskasad pa drug bcur bzod pa'i ro lad tu phyind pa la s+yad
76b6(1): bskal pa drug bcur brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad/ bskal pa drug bcur bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la pyadade la myi blun po dag 'di skad du 'di lta ste myi dmyigs pa'i tshug
76b7(1): cig pus byang chub thob po zhes zer te/ de dag ni dpyod pa yongs su ma dag pa yin/ tshig tsam gyis dag par sems shing bsgrub pa snying por byed pa yin/ ngag gi las lhur lend pa nan tan las ring ba yin te// 
76b8(1): drug dog can du gyur na la/ chags par gnas pa nye bul gdu ba yin no// kyi 'bum pa yang mgo byin pas dga' ba tsam du 'khod los smyung ba'i rgyal srid thob pas ni ma san no// des kyi thun po zang 'di sem
76b9(1): byed pa de dag gzhan gyi gyis rnams bu da nas/ 'di skad du byang chub tu ni di ltar chud do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nye/ 'dzin // gzhan ni la ma yin no// chos kyi tshum nong las
76b10(1): thamal mer gyis kyang shes mo zhes zer te/ de dag rnyed pa dang / bkur ba sti'i phyir chos smra ba dag las mnar sems mang po 'byung ngo // myi 'bam bu mtsho la tsam gyi mye de dag ni bas lang pa brgyas kyang 'dun
77a1(1): pa'i babod pa thob parang myi sman/ byang chub lta smos kyang ji dgos te/ myi 'pham pa g.yo'i dang ldan pa sa byang chub byed do// dran don can sa byed do// rim 'gro byed pa sa byed do// yang dang
77a2(1): ges pa myed pa la myed do// khyim sund par byed pa la myed do// gnyis su spyod pa la myed do// myi 'pham 'gyi blun po de dag la ni babs ches mkhas par 'am ches shing nyan thos kyi chos sem/ rang sangs rgyas
77a3(1): kyi chos gang yin pa'i chos de ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no// zhes zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' la pa/ rab 'byor de gnyis su spyod pa la shes
77a4(1): rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa yod med/ gsol pa/ btsota ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bka' sa langad pa/ rab la byi da myi gnas pa la byang chub yod mdza/ sa 'ad pa/ bco
77a5(1): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bka' sa khad pa/ rab 'byor da sros pa myed pa la byang chub yod mod/ gsold/ pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bka'
77a6(1): pa / rab 'byor da nye du la gdu ba'i phyir ngo tsha myed pa 'di dag sa 'di lta ste/ dbul por 'gyur ba de las kyi rnam par spyan dpe ci tsam yongs su bzung bar sems pa la ltos/ myi 'pham pa
77a7(1): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa chos thams cad nyan thos kyi chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi
77a8(1): chos so yin no zhes sdug par myi bya/ mngon par zhend par myi bya'o// chos thams cad so so'i skye bo'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad so so'i skye bo'i chos ma yin no zhes skrag par myi
77a9(1): 'o// chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi rgyan// chos thams cad rnam par byang ba'i chos
77a10(1): so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad rnam par byang ba myed pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad nye bar lend pa'i chos spro skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad nye bar lend pa myed pa'i
77b1(1): chos thams cad srid pa myed pa'i chos so zhes skrag par gyi bya'o// 
77b2(1): chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad bya ba dang bcas pa'i chos zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad bya ba myed pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad gsar pa'i chos so zhes
77b3(1): skrag par myi phyin/ chos thams cad gsar pa ma yin pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad srid na ba'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad sems kyi chol so zhes sbag
77b4(1): par myi bya'o// chos thams cad sems myed pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad sems pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi'o// chos thams cad sems pa myed pa'i chos so zhes skrag
77b5(1): par myi bya'o// chos thams cad las kyi chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad pas myed pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad rnam par sbyind pa myed pa'i chos po zhes blag
77b6(1): bar myi bya'o// chos thams cad rnam par smyind pa myed pa/ de'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad bzod pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad bzod pa
77b7(1): byed pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos thams cad tha rad pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myi bya'o// chos tha mas cad ba da pa myed pa'i chos so zhes skrag par myed pa'o// 
77b8(1): chos thams cad rnal 'byor kyi chom mo zhes skrag par gyi bya'o// chos thams cad rnal 'byor pa myed pa'i chos so zhes sdug par skye bya'o// chos thams cad 'phags pa'i chos so zhes sdug par myi bya'o// chos
77b9(1): thams cad 'phags pa myed pa'i chol so zhes sdug par phyi bya'o// chos thams cad sems can gyi tshim mo zhes skrag par gyi byar// chos thams cad sems can byed pa'i chos mo zhes sdug par gyi bya'o// chos bams cad
77b10(1): bzung ba byed pa'o zhes skrag par gyi bya'o// chos thams padagazung du byed pa ni chos so zhes skrag par bya bya'o// chos thams cad bden pa'i ma po zhes sdug par gyi bya'o// chos thams cad bden pa skyed pa'i chom po nyes ldan
77b11(1): zla gyi bya'o// chom thams cad tshul bzhin gyi chos so zhes skrag par gyi bya'o// chos thams cad nul bzhin byed pa'i tshis po zhes spag par gyi bya'o// chos bams cad brtan pa'i chos so zhes smag par gyi bya'o// rem pas sa
78a1(1): ma pams ma ba 'i spyan tu sa byen kyang ma na par med pas 'dzin rten ma chos kyi bdod to// byang chub sem pa dang nags la tsus nas k+Sh+mI d+hA 'i rang byu dang / dus dang / sa kyi ga
78a2(1): basbed pa'i phying ngam de bzhin nyi rnam par 'grug pa byed/ chem nams gas las byas/ bsan pas byas// kyi 'bab par sa gling bani bachen po'i 'dig rnyed kyi layang 'di ba sa myi ci gang ban du ma ban/ 
78a3(1): pa'i te/ sems can rnams 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag 'on la son toms mo// de bzhin du spyad te gling bzhi sa gnyis dang / de bzhin du steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su
78a4(1): chos bstand pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams 'di snyam du/ de ni dan gshegs pa ni bdag kho na la chos stond to// 'di ni de bzhin pa shegs pa'i chos ston to// 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa skyes so// 
78a5(1): 'dir chos kyi 'a'ong sa bdang // chos kyi 'a'ajol tsha gar rdzo/ stodo to snyam 'o// kyi 'pham pa del bdi bzas 'di garten gyi 'ams mtha' sras bu byed pa dag tu ma dro'i dus kyi ze'achom// ca
78a6(1): stod cing de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// nyi ma gur gyi dus kyi tshe'ang de sngar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad do// chos thams cad dang / sems can
78a7(1): thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan thogs pa myi mnga' bar gzigs pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis
78a8(1): gyi khyab cing chad byed pa dag la de dag 'di ltar chos spong ba la gnas pas byang chub sems dpas 'dis sgrub par bya'o// 'di la ni bslab par myi bya'o zhes zer te/ gang su dag chos spong bar gnas pa de dag ni sangs rgyas
78a9(1): la bskur da pa 'debs par gnas pa yin/ gang dag sangs rgyas la bskurd pa 'debs par gnas pa de dag ni 'di lta ste ngam song gyi gas pesa'i sa la gnas pa yin te/ dre dag ni chos kyis 'phongs par gyur pa la gnas pa yin no// 
78b1(1): kyi las la ba de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa lags mkhas pas bstand pa'i chos la bdag srung bar bya'o// de nas 'jas dpal gno nang byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi phung za yang dam grub dang / khrang
78b2(1): chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu 'thos pa rnam las nges pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' shi dadu rgya rnam par nges pa'i sems pagro pa'i rdo gros da/ 
78b3(1): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab spobs pa smra dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs bral yang dag gsal byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khengs
78b4(1): myed gangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i cho ga sems pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che dang / 
78b5(1): bya rgyam sems dpa' pa byu bas blang po che dang / rgyam sas sa gas brjod dbyas kyi spyang byag dang / snang sa rab bribs las na pa dang/ 
78b6(1): byang chub sems dpa' ba rtsom pa myi gtod pa gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan brgyad stong brgya da dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi ye shes pa
78b7(1): rmongs pa byed par sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa'i grags pa'i glog gi rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis phan gdags sems dang / byang chub sems dpal sangs
78b8(1): rgyas kyi yul dang ma bral ba gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan gyis brgyand pa'i gzi' brjid kyis brtu lang nas rnam par gnond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten kun gyis mchog grags
78b9(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi shu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa re de lta lags te// bdag cag
78b10(1): rkyang shar da phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung drug bcu'i bye ma snyed du mchi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ thams cad na yang bcom ldan 'das nyid chos
79a1(1): stond pa mdzad do// de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su mchis na yang / de bzhin du sems can rnamams chos stonong pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de dag tu barba/ 
79a2(1): cag gis gdugs bdun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu ba bgyis ma/ sangs rgyas gzham ma mthong nas/ slar 'dir chos nyand tu mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jab dpas gzho nur gyur dgas bkal
79a3(1): lang pa 'jam dpal ltos de bzhim gshegs pa'i yul dang / ye shes ni de ltar chad byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni de ltar bsam gyis kyi khya/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams kyis
79a4(1): gyi mnyam la dang mnyam na/ 'jam dpal de la skyes bu blun pong de dag 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhi ra grashegs pa'i phyir myong ba ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes
79a5(1): zer ro// 'jas dpa' 'di sa ste/ byang chub semasad pa'i pyod pa ni radag tu byed pa'i myod 'a'o// 'di lta de bya / rgyub sems dpa myod pa ni mthas ba byed pa'o// 'di sa
79a6(1): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni/ yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa'i spyod pa'o// 'di lta ste byang chub sems raba'i dpyod pa myi 'dod ba'i spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i 'apyong ba ni dam bcas pa
79a7(1): la brtan zhing / lhag pa'i las ma pa yongs su dag pa'i spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni gzhan la phan gdags pas yongs su pyod pa'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod
79a8(1): yongs su dag pa 'di lta bu ni nga'i chos pa yin na/ de'i tshe mthong nganan par 'gyur ngo ro// 'das dpa' de ska bas na skyes sungs pa 'i nyi shu'i skyed thams cad kyis kyang nga'i byang rgyang sa sang ba grangs myed pa byo
79a9(1): yang dag par bsgrub pa thabs mkhas pas bstanang pa 'di gzhan gis shes par 'gyur pa mchos yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te// bag yod par bya'o// dam bcas pa la brtan par bya'o// khong khro
79a10(1): byed pa'i sems su bya'o// sems can dag 'di lta ste chos spong ba'i gsades chen por myi ltung bar bya'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gyis gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das chos spong ba zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ 
79b1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i bka' la la ni bzang bar 'du shes/ la la la ni ngan par 'du shes pa de ni spong ba'o// gang chos spong ba des
79b2(1): chos spangs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sku rad pa 'debs pa yin// dge 'dun la ran tu brjod pa yin no// 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni myi rigs pa'o zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no// 'di ni byang chub
79b3(1): sems dpa' sems kyi ched du gsungs pa'o// 'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi ched du gsungs pa'o zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab
79b4(1): ba ma yin no zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no// spobs pa yod do zhe'am spobs pa byed do zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no// chos ni chos ma yin par stond to zer na chos spong ba yin no// sangs rgyas 'byung ba/ 
79b5(1): byed par yang gzung ba po banis zed na chos spong ba yin no// gzungs thob pa ni yongs su garngub pa ma yin no// zhes zer na chos da spong ba yin no// chos smra ba nyes par khyad pa dang ldan no zhes red tha
79b6(1): rnam spong ba yin no// chos smra ba bsgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin no zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no// bag byedabs theng na chos spong ba yin no// snod lam gyis phreng na chos sto/ 
79b7(1): da pa chus drims nyam mi pa byeng ces thos pa da// thebs pas thob tu phyi zhes me nyis zhide/ snang ba gas pa ma pa gang ni nas pad ces sum zhin// 
80a1(1): 'di ni rigs 'di ni myi rigs so zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no// 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa dang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ 
80a2(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu' yin no// 'jam dpal ngas ni nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa gang ji snyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'
80a3(1): las byung bar 'gyur bar smon lam legs par btab pa yin no// 'jam dpal ngas ni byang chub tu yang smon lam legs par btab pa yin na/ 'di ltar myi blun po de dag ngan song du 'gro bar bdud kyis byind kyis brlabs pa'i
80a4(1): phyir de la yang skyon 'dogs par sems so// de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i chos smra ba de dag la ang skyon 'dogs par sems so// rnyed pa'i phyir khyim srung ba'i gnas pa yin de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung
80a5(1): ba'i phyir gnas pa yin/ rigs la 'du bas bram ze dang khyim bdag rna/ rnams la smra ba ni 'di skad khyod kyis legs par smras so// khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' legs par rtogs so zhes zer
80a6(1): phyogs kyi yang phyogs cig smral pas rjes su yi rang ba bzhis de dag chos sbyong bar gyur pas// 'dis skyed na seng chen poda'i gro bar 'gro bar mtshungs par 'gyur ro// 'dam dpal mngon / ca
80a7(1): bar zhend pa la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'o zhes nga myi smra'o// khyim la chags pa 'pho ba rnam par dag pa'o zhes nga myi smra'o// gnyis su bstond pa rnams chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las las grol bar
80a8(1): dkyi sgra'o// gcig tu bstond pa rnams ngan song las grol b.rang myi smra'o// smra ba dga' ba rnams yongs su dag pa'o zhes dmyi smra'o// 'jam dpal ngas ni gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa de snyed kyi chos kyi
80a9(1): sgo rnams myi dmyigs pas tshul gyis bstand te/ 'jam dpal ngas ni stong pa nyid la mos pa rnams lnga gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa de snyed kyi chos kyi sgo rnams bstand to// ngas ni sems can du 'du shes pas
80a10(1): de byed du chos kyi sgo rnams bstan to// ngas nis can ma myed pa'i sgo nas de snyed kyi chos kyi sgo rnams bstan to// ngas ni rnam par rtog pa'i sgo nas de snyed kyi sgo rnams bstanang to// rab ni smon pa skyed pa
80b1(1): nim #/ pa sngon pa myed marnam sa nas gyu te// nga gan sa da nam sa
80b2(1): byed pa'o skanas de snyed kyims kyi na rnams bgyud to// ras de 'dug pas skyed dang / ldog pa de snyed dang/ ngas mi med pas de byed / byed dupa de byed dang / dus phyi chus skye 'i
80b3(1): 'dus ma byas kyis de snyed dang / ngas ni drab bas de snyed dang / drang ba skyed pas de sbed dang / ras ni gsang zas de snyed dang / ngas ni gsang ba myed pas de snyed dang / ngas ni 'khong ba'i sgo de skyed
80b4(1): ras ni mya ngam mas 'das pa'i di snyed dang / ngas ni 'jig rten pa'i de snyed dang / ngas ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i di sted dang / ngas ni 'dod pags kyi ni 'di snyed dang / ngas rini da ge na 'de nyid
80b5(1): sa ni ti mus pa na di snyed dang / bang ma dpal ngas ringag ni bye/ pa'i snye pa srung ba'i nas chos kyi ga rnams bstan te/ gang ma dpa' thams cad kyang 'dzin de/ byinas pa'i chung rjen/ 
80b6(1): zas 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das gal te sa 'dzin ka sdig pa'i grogs pa'i dbang gis chos spong 'di lta bu 'di bgyis par gyur da// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe 'di la ji ltung bar ni rje
80b7(1): 'thung de skad ces gsoyod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dngas gno dur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' sa la to// 'jam dpal gas te lo bdun gyi gar du byin cig ci dus gsum du nyes par ngag
80b8(1): gas na/ de'i 'og tu byed bar 'gyur te/ phyi nang chad nyung na bskald pa bcus bzod pa bob par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig chos kyi rnam
80b9(1): phreng ba 'di sa bzung ma blangs par sman/ chos kyil 'bongs par 'gyur ba'i las ma sbam par ga dad par gnad tu dku'o// de lta bar byang chub sems dpa'as 'dis bslabs nas phyis chos bstand par byas te de nga
81a1(1): kan des sbas par myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa nyid bzhi khong du chud par byas tebazhi gang zhe na/ sems can mnyam pa nyid dang / chos mnyam pa nyid dang / byang chub
81a2(1): mnyam pa nyid dang / lhag mthong mnyam pa nyid de/ mnyam pa nyid bzhi po de dag byang chub sems dpa'as khong du chud par bya'o// gang zhig mnyam pa nyid bzhi po de dag khong du chud par smra na ji smra yang de bdag smras par bya
81a3(1): 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yang chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ma smras par tha dad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba
81a4(1): byed pa'i sems dang shes pas mos nas chos smra ba rnams la 'gal bar myi byed pa dang / pha rol da myi spong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa thams cad la gus pa yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ rigs
81a5(1): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ma sbas par ba dad par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis bskald pa gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna bdun
81a6(1): gyis brgyadan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang 'ga'i klung gi khyim snyed la nyin cig bzhin 'bul ba dul ba phul bas/ gang ni ga gis rnam par 'bag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo'i tshis kyi rnam
81a7(1): grangs 'di bros shing thegs pas du byas te pha ma lan gsum grags na 'di ni de bas bsod nams kyi phung po ches khang du skyes par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rnam par 'bas pa thams cad
81a8(1): bathus pa'i mdol 'di bslabs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab de byed do// chos kyi nas grangs 'du
81a9(1): 'i byang mams rgya rgya dran par bya to// gangan sum kyi ga chen po'i 'dzin rten gyi zhamasu 'do'i sems can bye ba rtag thig brgyad stong gag drug sus chos byin ma grangs 'di ga bde rangam byang chu stsa mo la dzer
81b1(1): thazags nas de dag thams cad brgyad bcur 'khor bar 'khor nas/ thams cad bas sang pa bskalang pa brgyad bcus than byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog sa par 'chang rgya bar 'gyuraro// 
81b2(1): byang chub sesas dpa' ga na gyi lasgru ni chos kyinas pa sa 'a ma ni tha / lan me seM nasas pam rgyas pa 'o// 'ang ba dang de sa byo ma pa ba
81b3(1): la bslabs te/ phyi ma'i dus na chos bzung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar khyed ma smras par tha dad par 'gyur ro// de nas chos smra ba nyi shu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gse med to// bcom ldan 'das
81b4(1): chos kyi rje chos kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' saN+Da' da ba de bzhin du bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' legs par rab tu
81b5(1): bsgrub par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' ba saHla nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang
81b6(1): lnga dang / myi dang ga lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngonapar bstod do// 'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa thams cad
81b7(1): bsdus b+hA zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'/ rdzog s+ho/ rgya gar gi mkhan po 'dzin myi tra dang mu ne bar me dang zhu chen gyi lo che ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te
81b8(1): skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la bab pa// sa/ 
81b9(1): thaphas rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i mi 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstand pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdang / rnamam cad 'byed pal thus 'amabya'o//  'di ga bdag gis 'os pa'i dus cig na sa bcom ldan 'das/ 
82a1(1): chu bo chen po'i klung ne ra 'dza ma'i 'gram na/ 'phags pa'i saspyad ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun steng/ 
82a2(1): ka/ dang / rab 'byoran dang / sha ri'i bu dang / me'u 'gal gi bu la sogs pa/ nyan thos chen po thams cad dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang
82a3(1): rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis bskord cing mdun tu bdar te/ zhal zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ 'khor kyi dkyil 'khor de dag chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis tshim par byas
82a4(1): bskul du/ bzeng bstod/ yang dag par dka' bar byas te/ 'khor da gyi dkyil 'khor dang / thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sru lad pa chen pos grong khyer chen po ser sbyar gshegs te ba ra na so
82a5(1): shing ma 'dra srung ba'i 'tshal na bzhugs so// de nas de'i che nas cher g.yos par gyur nas/ seng ge'i khri chen por rin po che sna bdun las byas pa 'phang du dpag tshad cig tsam zheng hUM
82a6(1): dpag tshad phyed tsam gyis legs par spras pa/ shi nad tu dga' ba ra byas pa/ yid du 'ong ba dar gyi chun pos btags shing byangs pa/ lnga'i na bza' brgya stong du ma bting ba/ lha'i me tog gi chun po
82a7(1): bye ba du pa byangs pa/ lha'i dri dang ldan pa kha dog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i phra ba las bskyed pa/ de mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ 
82a8(1): ba zhig 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa khyan ras gzinag/ 
82a9(1): kyi nga thun dang / sngag na rdorjes bka' sa 'dab/ gaphags pa stan dag gas dang rgyag khyod padas/ kyi da kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams gzhang dag na
82a10(1): 'dus par 'gyur ba'i sems can snyigs ma'i rang bzhin can/ ma dad pa sdig pa pyod pa nyen mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag gis sgribs pa/ mar myi shes pa par gyi shes pa/ dge sbyong du myi 'dzin pa/ 
82b1(1): tham ze kyi 'dzid pa sam sa ma pa mnapa/ de dag thams lag rje sa rdzas yu / nyid yin
82b2(1): ba dang / yang dag par 'thul bar 'byar pa zhes bya ba 'atod nge 'dzin ma snyams pa sa so/ ting nge 'dzid de'i 'thus pa len pa 'di rnas pa cugatugaso/ btugasos/ ya dad bangs tuma'om/ 
82b3(1): dems sa pam me da dum 'gyur ro//  ma kyi na kyims sngon da pa ste/  pa yi

82b5(1): namang dang // nyon ma mchog par rtag tu 'khor ban/ mtsho ba mtshungs pa ni sdug kyi 'byung/ da dang gag sa dang blud byed rtags kyin// rtag tu thug smra ma'i sa ma dang ldan// batha na padum
82b6(1): bde ba myong nas kyang / phyis kyang sdug bsngal rjes su thob par 'gyur// rnam par slu bar gyur pa 'di la ltos// 'dis mar gyu da pa yang chu ba sar gyung // 'di'i ga dag yongs su zos nas kyang
82b7(1): mkhas pa dag myi shes dga' bar 'dzind// srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye ba dag/ myis ni ma myed la skrag pa myed// myi rnams kyis ni dam pa'i chos 'chad kyis// bde bar gshegs pa mchod par 'dod
82b8(1): rnams dang / myi 'dul 'khor los sgyur ba de mthong nas// ting 'dzin zhi bsgom pa thob 'gyur gyis/ de phyir sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gyi gang rnams/ skrag par gyis la tha rad pa 'dod par byos/ byi nas
83a1(1): nga // dge slong dge can d+ha rngu 'gyus ra/ byang chub sems dpa' kyi che rdzu 'phru // sems rgyu phyi ma 'as pa rgyang byadang /  sa byes pa sus spyod/ 
83a2(1): gis btas de tshan ni ldan pas gzinyis kyi dang gyug no// gang dag rgyas rgyanas les 'gying su gyun / yangs kyisarjes larim ze kyi byed pa// lagan rdo rje ma zhen ce sem pa tsha
83a3(1): ga tub zer mtsha ba rig pa byed// de'i gzugs de yangashi ge 'gru // bas 'des bye bar de bshad kyingo hA/ 'dzidi 'du gshenas mngon par byed/ hrI
83a4(1): 'breng ba gos mchog rgyan khyer la/ 'drend pa 'di sa mchod pa byis// sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur bar ba dkon no// 'a pad phyir bskal pa bye ba mang por yang / rtag tu sdug bsngal po
83a5(1): cing 'phong par 'gyur// mkhas pas rtag tu tha rad par 'dod par gyis// myi mchog sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa byos// bu dang bu mo de bzhin gnyen rnams dang / pham tshungs bshes mang skye bo rnams
83a6(1): thams cad sgyu ma 'dra bar don myed de/ rtag par gzhan dang gzhan du skye bar 'gyur// de ltar gser dang rdul yang glog dang 'dra// 'di la snying po 'ga' yang snang ba myed// byang chub go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 
83a7(1): phyi rnams 'drend pa la ni mchod pa byos// de nas de'i tshe na 'od zer las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas/ bskul pa cig nas cig tu rgyud pa 'dis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spras gang bar gyur/ 
83a8(1): nas sems can thams cad la bskul par gyur te/ sems can gang dag log par lta ba de dag ni/ yang dag pa'i lta ba la bgod par gyur// gang nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang khengs pa rnams dang / 'gying pa de

83b2(1): bar le nad pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos brgyad la gnas pa de dag thams cad lus dang yid kyi 'apyod pa rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnas par gyur/ thams cad
83b3(1): kyang dgod pa dang / ku re dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / 'dod pa dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / chags pa yongs su spangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bstond pa dang / bsnyen du
83b4(1): bkur bya ba la spro bar gyur da/ thams cad kyang chos nyand 'dod par gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / byi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po

83b7(1): sil snyan dang / dar gyi chun po sna tshogs thogs te/ grong khyer chen po ba ran se zhes bya ba gang na ba dang / a 'bra srung ba mo'o 'tshal gang na ba/ der dong nas/ bdag bdag gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i rtsa bas de

83b10(1): 'bras bu'i shing dang / sras kyi shing dang / rin po che'i gang dang / dpag bsams kyi shing dang / shes kyi gang rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/ gA'i seng ge'i khri dang ldan pa/ rin po che dang / dar dang / me tog

85b1(1): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag nyid kyi snang bar yang bston du/ zla ba 'am pa lta bu'i dkyil 'khor yang bston da/ zla ba ma gyi po yang bston / yang kyi ro yang ston / zla ba'i dkyis 'kho yos
85b2(1): mu rgyas pa yang ston mun nag 'bas po thams cad rnam par sel/ pA dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang 'bru las sogs pa yang sim par byed do// kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
85b3(1): kyang sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa'i sems can rnams dang / khams sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dpyod pa mkhyend nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ston
85b4(1): skye ba yang stond/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang ston / rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / bud myed kyi bzhad gad dang / ku re dang / dri dang / phreng ba la dka' zhing rtse ba pa yang stond/ khyim nas byung ba dang

85b6(1): stond te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan/ las 'das kyang sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis ring srel mchod pa dang mchod rten dang gtsug lag khang dang / sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa
85b7(1): dang rab tu byung ba'i phyir khyim nas byung ba dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / dam pa'i chos bri ba dang / klag pa dngakha ton du byas pa la sro ba bskyed pa dag gis kyang sems can thams
85b8(1): cad tha dad par mdzad pa dang /  bslab pa 'dzind pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / sdom pa dang / nye bar gnas pa dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa rnams 'dzind du gzhug pa thabs mkhas pas kyang sems can rnams tha rad
85b9(1): pang badzad do// sems can byal ba dang / dung 'gro'i spyi gnas dang / gshin rje'i gangag rten dang / kyi 'om pa dang // ngan song dang / ngan 'gro ba mas cad pas yongs su ba rang bar mdzad nas/ chos nyanang bas ris
85b10(1): bar mdzad do// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bkod do// de nas de'i chen lha'i bu mo blo chung ba la cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
86a1(1): rje thags 'dod pa dang / srag bsngal pa dang / 'di kyi bde ba dang / 'jug pa rnams pas yongs su gad pa ya du / de/ de basbyin gshegs pa 'dis zung mams padang du ma kyi kyang
86a2(1): las 'da' ba la shi nad tu sngags shing brjod do// 'khor mang po bsdus nas/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa yas na/ de ci de bzhin gshegs pa 'di byu rad pa nyid du yongs su mya ngan
86a3(1): las 'da' bar bzhed pa lta snyam nas/ de dag yid myi dga' ste/ cang myi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa'i sems kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag pa 'di skad ces
86a4(1): spras so// lha'i bu dag de ltar ma sems yid myi dga' hA/ ma byed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ni mang /  ste/ thabs dang shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi dge
86a5(1): ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyi byin kyi bcabs kyis sems can da la pa sna tshogs dag ma chos sod te/ kwa'i bu dgangs sngon gyi nga ni gshenas pa rnams kyi babs ma'as pa'i dru 'phrul dang / nam pa/ 
86a6(1): 'phrul ba'i tshe 'phrul ji ltar mthong ba de ltar das shes pa las na// de bzhin gshegs pa mi sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i tshe 'phrul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mde' sde'i rgyal po 'chang bar bzhed pa dang / rgyas par
86a7(1): mdzad par bzhed par myi 'gyur ram/ yad lha'i bu dag se dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang myed/ sku me zad par
86a8(1): 'gyur ba lar byed do/  pa 'das bya ba byen tu byed pa na bad pa du byed pa'i ma mi du byed pa bani gshenas pa rnams ba po mas carnams pa sa sum+b+ha stsal
86a9(1): pa yang ston/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba yang ston to// pa/ sems can mya ngan las 'da' bas 'dul za dang / ring sres gyis 'dus pa snyigs ma'i rang bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad pa pra mA sti stang byed par gyi/ 
86b1(1): 'gyur ba'i sems can dag/ jig ji ltar mthong ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa yang byed/ gshegs pa yang byed do// gang gi mi sems can
86b2(1): rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyin par gyur da cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bar 'dod pa dang / mchod par 'os pa dang / chos nyand par 'dod pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'dod par gyur pa/ de'i
86b3(1): che lnga dang myi rnams kyis skye bo mang pos phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la 'de ba dang / bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsal par bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung mod kyi/ de bzhin
86b4(1): gshegs pa la skye ba myed de/ rga ba dang / 'chi ba yang myed do// rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/ me long gyi dkyil 'khor shinang tu legs par phyis pa la gzugs sna tshogs snang bar byas/ zhing myi snang bar yang
86b5(1): 'gyur mod kyi/ gzugs brnyan ni dir 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro bar/ snang ba yang byed do// sna'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul yang de ltar blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ smras
86b6(1): khyed pa legs par bslabs pa ni/ grong khyer dang rta babs dang bskyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / 'kho ba la bsgyur ba'i gzugs dang / dga' ba dang rtse ba sna tshogs bstand te/ 
86b7(1): myi snang bar byed kyang / de la 'pho ba yang myed/ 'ong ba yang myed/ 'gro ba yang byed do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang blta bar bya'o// yang lnga'i
86b8(1): zu dag sngon gyi smon lam gyis de bzhin gshegs mya ngan las 'das nas/ na po stong lon pa 'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal par lon pa 'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas/ bskal pa bye bar lon yang
86b9(1): sems can rnams myi mchod par bya ba dang / bkur bsti bya ba dang / ring bsrel gyi mchod rten byed du gzhug pa dang / sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzind pa dang / mched
86b10(1): pa byed pa'i sems can 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa rnams tha rad par mdzad de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / myi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / 
87a1(1): par byung ba thams ca dang / sdug bsngal bams cad pas yongs su padad par yang ba nas/ rim gyis tha byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du don par rdzogs par bang sa rgyas par brgyan pa
87a2(1): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon tu mye tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / drug pa dang / mabatha' dang / brgyanang rnams kyis mchod pas mchod pa lta smos kyang de dgos// gA'i bu dag gang sems can
87a3(1): las/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba lon nas kyang / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes mtshan nas lan bdun brjod nas nam mkha' la me tog
87a4(1): gtor na de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro// mye tog nam mkha' la gtor na lta zhog gi/ gang dag dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob pa la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mcho
87a5(1): ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa cig tsama'adzind tam/ nyin cig gam/ mtshan cig gam/ yud tsam/ zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yid la byed par brtson na
87a6(1): sdug bsngal las tha dad par byas nas/ rim gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyuraro// gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhad gang
87a7(1): dang / ku re dang / byis pa'i rgyal ka dang / rtsed mor kyang byed pa 'am/ 'ji ba las mchod rten byed pa 'am/ de dag thams cad sdug bsngal mthar byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
87a8(1): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur na/ gang gis ring bsrel gyi mchod rten nam/ ring bsrel gyi sku gzugs byas te sems can thams cad snying rje ba slob par shes nas/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal
87a9(1): las yongs su dgrol lo snyam ste bA na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ sna'i spos dang / phreng ba dang / drug pa dang / mye tog dang / si'i snyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
87a10(1): rnams kyis mchod pa lta smos kyang ni gos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / ma pa dang / 'chib dang /  bya ngan dang / lde sngags 'a yod pa dang
87b1(1): drug bsdul ba dang / yid kyi bde ba dang / 'jug pa rnams las yongs su pa dang par gyur te/ ji srid du blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubadu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur pa de srid kyi
87b2(1): bang du bde 'grong 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon ljonamams mkhas shing mthun pa yongs su dag pa yin no// de nas lnga'i bu dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te
87b3(1): kye ma'o 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu rad pa 'di ni shes rab kyi nu bo dang ldan no// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchog tu thabs mkhas pas ni legs ma gang 'jam dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das
87b4(1): nam/ bzhas pa bye ba du ma yin dang / bdeg rten gyi'ams dman bcugs su de/ babs mnyas pa sna tshogs kyis sems can nams mongs su skyes par mdzad do// zhes smras pa dede sa bu'

88a10(1): sa la gnas par gyur te/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bdun brgyas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob par gyur to// 'jam dpal gne nur gyur ra pa la/ rgyal po gas sa rgyal gyis

88b7(1): bzhugs te/ mchom pa zhes shing chom kyang stod pa mdang / 'jig rten gtsug phud can na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug zud can zhes bya ba pa // 'dzin
88b8(1): rten gyi khams dri ma myed pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma myed pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
89a1(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tun bdu ga nas byas yodan// 'di na sngu dan/ de bzhi gshenas pa gra ma pas dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rnas khyod drug
89a2(1): pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i bla ma na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje de bzhin gshes

89b7(1): 'phags pa yang lag brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/ zla ba yang gyi ches brgyad nas brtsams te/ ches bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs bya ne dag sa me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / zug pa dang /

90a1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen da lha'i snyan gyis ni gas nang / lnga'i stan gis ni gzigs shing / sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur gyis ngan 'gre
90a2(1): 'gro bar myi 'gyur ba dang / ke legs par bya ba byed kyis/ dam par bya ba myi byed par yongs su bsngo zhing de lta ngan song du skyes pa de dag pa ra par bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la

91a9(1): po me lnga bdun las byas pas gang bar byas te/ lha'i 'breng ba dang / byug par skye tog dang / yang me dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / sem snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba na rnams kyis po 'ibum du
91a10(1): bkur bsti byas te/ brjed cing mchod pa bas/ chos kyinam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / thog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan dan/

97a6(1): nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid/ sring ze den phyir ras khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// dring mi gzhan yang gzugs nang ngas phyi sod tam gnyig myed pa ram/ gzugs 'di ra

97b3(1): byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir sgyu ba mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid do// byang

97b5(1): gzhan yang phung po lnga ni skyil ma lta bu de/ shind tu mngon par ma grub bo/ !/ sring mo byang chub kyang myi lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas shind tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ sring mo dri'i phyir skyilas mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam
98a1(1): khyod la 'di skad ces khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni spyig sgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul dpa'i las kyis bskyed pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang spyig spu'i rang bzhin te/ sam gyi
98a2(1): rnam par smin pa myed pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir smyig sgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis sbyin sgyu mnyam pa nyid do// sprin sgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// 
98a3(1): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis smyig spu mnyam pa nyid do// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni gzugs brtan lta bu nye 'pho ba myed pa'o// sri
98a4(1): mo byang chub kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin te/ 'pho ba myed pa'o// skyes sring mo de'i phyir gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid do// sa phung po/  mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan
98a5(1): mnyam pa nyid do/ gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyamab nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan mnyam ba nyid do// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid/ 
98a6(1): byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni mying tsam he/ mying de g.yo ba myed pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang mying tsam he/ mying de yang g.yol ba myed pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir g.yo ba myed pa mnyam pa
98a7(1): nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo'i babyed pa mnyam pa nyid do// gsol ba skyed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis ga yong ba skyed pa mnyam pa
98a8(1): nyid do// sring po de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnapas sa byed pa po byed de/ ma byas pa'i don ni byang chuba'o// phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid byed pa'o ngan/ 
98a9(1): de byang chung 'o// spong ponams la 'byung ba byed des byung ba'i don ni byang chuba'i/ zung po rnams/  rtag pa nyid kyi rtag pa nyid na ni byang chung no// zung po rnamam sa bde nyid byed drug gams pa'i'adini krung
98b1(1): byed pa'o// zung ba lha'i de bzhin gang 'di de skye/ de banidu gshegs pas bugs sa chud pa jos pabs sad kyi pani dbyang na sas bya'o// zing ba duba'i rmi
98b2(1): byang dub kyi nga bzhin no// byang chub kyi ba gzhi nisem thams kyi'ang bzhin te/ bri mo phung po sa ni rang ba'i de gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi nga bzhin gang se pa sa mamams ca thams pa/ 
98b3(1): kyi rang bzhin te/ sring po de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin te/ phung po ma rtogs par byang chub kyang byed pa
98b4(1): byang chub ma rtogs par yang rtogs pa byed pas de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya'o/ bring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byung chub bo zhes smras so/ zing po rnam grangs 'dis khyed kyis
98b5(1): rkang rig par bya ste/ dri stang sems can pams par byang chub tu rtogs pa ltang de rtogs pa byed pa bstand pa de/ byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang drub bo zhes smras so// 
98b6(1): bring po gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di la sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / bye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / khams bzhi po de dag mngon par grub pa de la sring mo sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin sems can pa / 
99a1(1): srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang bag ma yin no// byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// de bzhin du mu'i
99a2(1): khams dang / kye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma
99a3(1): yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// shin tu nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir sa'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu myed pa'i phyir chu'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo/ 
99a4(1): shind tu myi g.yo ba'i phyir mye'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shi nad tu bsta nad tu myed pa'i phyir rlung gi khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// rdza sring mo sa'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas
99a5(1): 'khyend te/ mngon par rdzogs pa bathugs su chud do// srid/  so chu'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyend to// ge mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo ma
99a6(1): khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyend to// ngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// / sring mo rlung gi khams ga pa yin pa'i khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyend

99a8(1): phyir des khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo sa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dag par myi shes so// chu'i khams kyis mye'i khams yang dag par gyi 'phamam
99a9(1): rabra kyi shes so// me'i khams kyis rlung gi khams yang dag par myi shes so// sring mo de dag na khams kyi mying yongs su shes pa grang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya te/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod sa
99a10(1): 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang gang khyod kyis lus 'di la myig mngon par grub pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sA dang lce dang lus dang yid mngon par grub pa de la srib mo myan ni/ 
99b1(1): sbyo ba ste/ byin ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// rna ba ni stong bsten ba stob pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chuba'o// sna ni song ba te sna stong pa nyid kyi nga bzhi ni byang chu do// kye ni ga pa nye
99b2(1): stongapa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sras ni rtsi bas ste lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// yid ni song pa nye ying stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub po// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod pa 'di sa tu

99b5(1): so// sring mo myig ni gzugs kyi le nad te/ byang chub kyang gcu dgas kyi le nang to// rna ba mi sma myi len te/ byang chub kyang sgra kyi lend to// sA ni dri kyi le nang te// byang chub kyang dri myi len
99b6(1): sted dri myi len te/ byang chub kyang ro gyi min to//  sa ni rig tu gyi yin te/ byang chub kyang res bya myi yind to// 'di rnams kyiyin te/ byang chub kyang chos kyi yin / 
99b7(1): srid mi de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byig gzugs dang bral ba ni byang chub ste// yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du yang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring po de ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khabs gang yin pa de ni
99b8(1): gzugs kyi 'ams dpas tsams snang ba byed do// byig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'ams dang gzugs su bral ni byang chub bo// rna ba'i rnam pa shes pa'i 'ams gang yin pa de ni lnga'i 'ams da
99b9(1): sbyor ba byed de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang sna'i khams su byang chub bo// snga'i rnam par shes pa'i 'ams gang yin pa de ni dri'i khams dang mtshams sbyong ba myed de/ sna'i rnam pa
99b10(1): shes pa'i khams dang dri'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// sde'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni ro mi khams dang mtshams sbyod pa myed de// sde'i rnam par shes pa'i khapas dang ro thams su
100a1(1): bral ba ni byang chub bo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni reg bya'i khams dang / mtshams spyod pa myed de lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang reg bya'i khams su
100a2(1): bral ba ni byang chub bo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang chos kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub ste/

100a4(1): dang gzugs kyi khams de ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su dbyer myed do// byang chub dang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su myed de gnyis dbyer myed do// byang chub dang yid kyi khams de ni gnyis

100a6(1): su dbyer byed do// srid po de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyodanyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang myig/ rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang
100a7(1): lce dang lus dang yid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// myig gi rang bzhino ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo// de bzhim du rna ba dang / rna sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang
100a8(1): bzhin ni stong pa he rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo// sring mo myig gi rang bzhin ni ma chags myi snang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo/ rnapa
100a9(1): dang sna dang / kye dang / lu pa dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ma chags kyi snang ma rmongs te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo// sring mo myig ni bdag po myed pa
100a10(1): bdag gi myed pa yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po myed pa bdag gi myed pa yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag pa
100b1(1): myed pa'o// bdag gI myed pa yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa'o// bdag po myed pa bdag gi myed pa yongs su 'dzind pa myed pa'o// sring mo myig ni skyes pa'i chos dang dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma/

100b4(1): byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no/ bud myed kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo myi dag ni skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyang ma yin no// 
100b5(1): sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyang ma yi/ na no// sring mo yid kyi bar du yang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bu da myed kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa
100b6(1): yang ma yin bud dmyed kyang ma yin no// sring mo de ltar myig gi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do// de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub ze// yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du/ 
100b7(1): ya de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di khyod nyid byang chub po zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di ni bdag pa
100b8(1): ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin na/ gang zag ma yin/ shed les skyes ma yin/ shed bu ma yin/ byed pa po ma yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ shes pa po ma yin
100b9(1): mthong ba po ma yin/ nyan dpa po ma yin/ sdom pa po ma yin/ za ba po ma yin/ reg pa po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa po ma yin no// sring mo byang chub bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ 
100b10(1): srog ma yin/ gsol ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ bdag ma yin/ yongs su 'dzind pa ma yin/ byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ gzugs ma yin/ smra ma yin/ dri ma yin/ ro ma yin//

101a2(1): byed pa/ rtag pa myed pa he/ rma dang / shing dang / d+hi shing ljon dpa dang / rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang khyad par myed cing ma dad du dbyer myed pa/ sring po gang yang nang gi sa'i khams dang / phyi rol rgya
101a3(1): sa'i khams ni gnyis su myed cing gnyis su dbyer myed de/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig par de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang / ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par zhugs su chud de/ 
101a4(1): sring po de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub po zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i sems
101a5(1): drang ba nga rnam par shes pa'i rnam thang rig pa de ni sA la gnas pa ma yin/ phrul gnas pa ma yin/ shas dag pa gnas pa ma yin// rgyabags pa la gnas pa ma med/ gas gnas pa ma yin
101a6(1): khrag la gnas pa ma yin no// rus pa la ba la gnas pa ma yin/ chub la gnas pa ma yin/ rkang pa la gnas pa ma yin/ nang na gnas pa ma yin/ phyi ro yad na gnas pa ma yin/ gnyig myed
101a7(1): la gnas pa ma yin/ myig la gnas pa ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sA la gnas pa ma yin/ lce la gnas pa ma yin/ lus la gnas pa ma yin/ yid la gnas pa ma yin te/ gnas pa/ 
101a8(1): ma srin/ myi gnas pa ma yin/ rgyud chad pa ma yin/ yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bstan tu myed ga rnam par rig pa byed pa// gzung ba myed pa
101a9(1): 'dri ba myed pa// gzhi myed pa/ dag pa gtsang ba/ 'od gsal ba ste/ sems dang yid kyi rnam par rig pa myed pa nas nyon mongs pa myed pa rnam par byang ba ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing
101a10(1): 'od gsal la lus myed pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par dag pa myed do// sring po de ltar na phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung po dang
101b1(1): khams dang / skye ma ched rnams dang / sring ma khyod kyi sum 'di sa phung po das rnams dang skye ma ched gang dag mngon dang grug yang gi byang chub ste/ byang chub ni gzhin ma yin no// de ci'i cing zhen/ byang rgya
101b2(1): phung po dang / khams dang skye mched na 'am las gzhan pa ma yin te// de dag nyid byang chub yin pas sos khams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la
101b3(1): skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// / 'jam dpal gzho nur pas bskru nad pa 'di bshad pa na nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga 'bum gyis bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu som
101b4(1): po skyed do// gang smad 'tshong pa'i bu mo gseng mchog 'od/  dpal gyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / srog chags gnyis brgyas kyang thar myed pa yang dag tu
101b5(1): yabachim zhing mgu la yid dngas te rab tu dka' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas gajas dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyisal gtugs te/ sangs rgyas dang
101b6(1): chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su songonas/ lnga pa tshangs par spyad pa dang // bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sapas
101b7(1): bskyed nas 'di gad ces smras so// 'jas dpal khyod dag kyang khyod kyis su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying ge ba dang / snying rje bas sangs rgyas kyi gdung byi med pa dang / dge 'dun
101b8(1): gyi gdung gyi gcad pa'i slad du khyod kyis bstan pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub der sems bskyed par bgyi'o// de bzhin du chos rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can thams cad la chom
102a1(1): bstand par bgyi'o// nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du nongs pa la nongs par bshag par bgyi'o// gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma gtogs
102a2(1): kla/ nas tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa sngon tu 'gro ba dang phyi nad ci log gi dbang du mchis pa dang / rang gi lus la mngon par zhend pas 'dod chags kyis sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis chos
102a3(1): rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid ma rtogs so// 'jam dpal gyi de ltar lags mod kyi 'on kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyis sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ji 'dra ba de nyid
102a4(1): dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ldan pa'i chos 'di la slob cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs
102a5(1): pa rnams ni ji ltar mchis pa lags pa la kun brtags palas byung bar de ltar kun brtags pa yongs su rtogs na 'gag para'agyur bas gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal
102a6(1): cig la gcig cing 'ju ste chu'i chu bur 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni shind tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa ste rlung dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'dab pa ste/ 
102a7(1): nam ma kha'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du myi gnas pa'i chu'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug pa las byung ba ste/ no
102a8(1): sbyin dang 'byung po dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ma mchis pa phyi nad ci log tu mthong ba las byung ba ste// srin dang mar dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni kun brtags pa las byung ba he/ yang / 
102a9(1): dag pa ma lags pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngang 'dzind pas lhag par chags pa dang 'breld pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag ging 'dzind pas dngos po 'drin pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams
102b1(1): nI log pas bskyed pas blo bur du byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshogs las 'gyod pa'i tshul
102b2(1): gyis bskyed pa ste/ so sor myi rtog pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams sems dang rjes su mthun pas bskyed pa ste/ nges par myi sems pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan las 'dzin
102b3(1): bar zhe nad pa las byung ba ste yid ches par myi bgyi ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag le nad pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams rnams la ri mang por 'dzind pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnabs
102b4(1): ni ste mchen rnams stsogs pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni mying dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa dag myi rtogs pa'o// 'jam dpa
102b5(1): bon te/ nyon mongs pa rtogs pa nyid byang chub lags so// // nyen mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i gzhi lags so// de/ ci'i srang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis
102b6(1): byang chub ni nyin mongs pa rnams kyis myi byed pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams mthong ba ni byang chub ste/ byang chu ba ni yul thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar
102b7(1): na byang chub rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa/ de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ skyes nas 'jig cing 'grub pas myi gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni som/ 
102b8(1): can gyi sems kyi rang bzhin lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal sems ni chags pa 'am/ sdang ba 'am/ rmongs pa zhes sems kyi rang bzhin bstand par myi nus te/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
102b9(1): sems bstand par myi nus pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang yul na gnas pa 'am phyogs na gnas pa zhes nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin bstand par myi nus pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub dpa'
103a1(1): sems dpa chen thos de lta 'i ra nyon mdzes pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de de lta/ de 'dod cags pa spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs du spyod nga bgyis la skyo bar gyi 'gyuraro// na
103a2(1): spyod pa rnams la ma las/ gti mug sa snyed pa rnams la ma sags te/ mnyas pa la spyod pa'i sems can nams yongs su sbyin par dgyib la stobang kyi 'byung ngo // 'am nga padas ba tu ni
103a3(1): ska ba de bzhin du 'dod chags la lta bar bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi zhe sdang ji ba sa de bzhin du zhe sdang la 'apyod pa thams cad kyi zhe sdang la lta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi gti shug ji lta bde
103a4(1): bzhin du gti mug pa spyod pa thams cad kyi gti mug la lta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
103a5(1): pa la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di ste ste dper na/ myedanam+ba dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mye yang nyon
103a6(1): mongs pa'i rtswa dang ging thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal 'dis skye dperan/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khodzin /  mun pa shun dag thams cad dang lhan cig myi gnas po// 
103a7(1): 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung dmar ni shing ljond pa dang / ri thams cad la myi chags
103a8(1): so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i yul thams cad la myi chags so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam ma'i
103a9(1): khams ni bsregs pa'i bskald pa thams cad kyis tshig par myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes pa'i la 'apyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i bsreg pa'i bskul na/ 
103a10(1): pa thams cad kyis tshig par myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni rdul dang na mun dang sprin thams cad dang ldan cig phyi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab
103b1(1): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ldan cig myi gnas so// 'jas dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni sa'i khams dang lhan cig kyi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du
103b2(1): 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di ste ste khab yong ni lcags dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
103b3(1): du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri 'khor yug ni rlung thams cad kyis bskyod pa gyi nus so
103b4(1): bajam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la gyod pa'i byang chub sems yang dpa' yang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyod par myi nus so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper ni/ 'jam dpal 'ang lta lta dpar na/ 
103b5(1): dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bya dang ngang ba zhes bya ba pa ni 'o ma dang chab / 'dres pa las/ ngo ma nyid ni 'cha lad kyi cha ba ni ma lags so/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab spyod pa'i byang13tra
103b6(1): chum sems dpa' sang 'bags pa'i ges rab dang nyod mongs par dres dgal sa shes rab nyed mend kyi nyid mongs pa ma lags so// 'ad ma dpa pa 'dis sted per ma byang ni byisan gyi bring te 'u 'bresang pa'i
103b7(1): bu byed rnams la shing gi la g.yud par byi byed do// 'dam dpa 'a de bzhi du dadang po yongs su pa skyed pa'i semasapa narnamasas byung dub sems dpa'i byed pa dang / lags pa'i gapa nga / she
103b8(1): namasakyis po pa tes byang chu se ba ma //  'di ba men/  ngas sa du sa da/ gnas sa kyi rgyas
104a1(1): myi gos la chab kyi rtog pa thams cad kyang rab tu dang bar myi bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon 'ongs pa'i nad na gnas kyang nyon mongs
104a2(1): kA/ par gsher bar yang myi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang myi gos la nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// de ltar smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis bstand pa 'di
104a3(1): bshad pa dang / yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// sring mo byang
104a4(1): chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa mthong ngam/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes myi bya'o// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bru mar gyi sgron ma la mun pa mun nag
104a5(1): smang na de 'bru mar gyi sgron ma zhes myi bya'o// sring mo de bzhin du byang chubyung ba sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am/ 'gag par/ mthong na byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes
104a6(1): byi bya'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya ba ni mu gang tu kun nas/ nyon mongs pa yang myi mthong rnam par byang ba'ang myi mthong / mthong ba dang / myi mthong ba dang / sems dang yid dang rnam @##
104a7(1): par rig pa dang brab ba ni nyon mongs pa myed pa'o// sring mo gang dang gang du sems pa yid dang rnam par rig pa 'jug na tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems par yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o// 
104a8(1): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa myed pa la ni sems sam sems pa 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir te/ gang gis dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba dmyigs pa la sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o// 
104a9(1): gang mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa de ni 'khor ba'o// shang 'a'or ba de ni 'du byed pa'o// 'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/ sring po de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba yin no// sring mo nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni
104a10(1): sbyor ba ste/ byig dang gzugs su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang ro dang lus dang reg bya yid dang chos su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// tshul khrims la sbyor
104b1(1): ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o/ shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// rab tu dben pa la spyor bar sems
104b2(1): kha ni nyon mongs pa'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa myed pa/ zhes bya ba ni rgyu ba myed pas zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ni spros pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ni brtson pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas
104b3(1): de ni kun tu 'byung ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas te// sring mo grangs dang / grangs myed pa dang / bral ba ni nyon mongs pa myed pa nyid do// sring mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la yang nyon
104b4(1): mongs pa myed par gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu tha radad par byed cing shi nad tu brtson pa de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu tha rad par byed pa ni
104b5(1): byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par phul lo// bu mo/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par phul ba gang lags/ gang 'jam dpal gyis
104b6(1): smras pa/ stong pa nyid la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing lta ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mtshan ma mye byed pa sa sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing mtshan ma la spyod
104b7(1): sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / smond pa myed pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing smond pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa la sa sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'dug
104b8(1): cing mngon par 'du byed pa sa yod pa'i semamatshan rnamapa la snying rje ba dang / skye babyed ci 'chibo myed pa la mo ma rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug ci na pa dang shi bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams pa snying rje dang / skyong kye/ 
104b9(1): bral so so ston pa'i rjes su 'dug cing skye ba dang 'dzin par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / nyan thos bu nges bral po yar rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug ci nyan thos kyi 'bras bu 'os pa las lon pa dang / 
104b10(1): rang sangs rgyas su ngem tha la sa sar rtog pa'i rjes su 'dug pa rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa sa ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon byed pa la 'dug pa la po ma ma pa'i rjes su 'dug cing sems sa
104b11(1): pa la rin ser myos cig/  na ka rgyas 'odam pa phun rten gyi
105a1(1): kyi gas na do// bri zod bzhin nga pa nyid la mo stong rtog pa ni pa'i/ bas la mangs bcung dras par na// mtshan ma byed pa dang snod da pa byed pa dang ngon pa tu da babyed dang / 
105a2(1): pa dang / 'byung ba byed pa dang / nyan thas kyi skyon byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon skyed pa'i yang so sor rtogs bu ni na'i/ thabs sa da'as pa dang dras pas ldon pa dada'o// sros mo 'dis med pe na/ gsus
105a3(1): ngo chen por 'jug par ni sla'i/ ma smas ma nyams par rgald par dka'o// sring mo de bzhin du rnam par tha rad ba'i sgo gsum du yang 'jug par ni sla'i/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par mi da ka'o// 
105a4(1): myos smras// 'jam dpal thabs shes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/ darnam dpal gyis smras pa// snying mo thobs shes bya ba ni gang phyinades gnyis kyi stong ba ste/ 'di skar 'khor ba'i phyogs dang rgya
105a5(1): ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so// sring mo labs shes bya ba ni ste gnyis bskon par byed pani/ 'khor ba'i sgodang myang ngan sa sa 'das pa'i sgo dang stong ba nyid kyi rno dang / skab las rab tu
105a6(1): thar de pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma las rnam par tha da pa'i sgo dang // smond pa myed pa'i sgo dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa'i sgo dang / dge ba'i
105a7(1): mngon par 'du byed pa'i sgo dang / skye ba myed pa'i sgo dang / skye ba kun tu stond pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba myed pa'i sgo dang / phung po dang khams dang / skye mched kyi sgo dang / skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa'i sgo dang
105a8(1): skye ba dang 'byung ba'i sgo dang / dben pa'i sgo dang / sems can yongs su sbyind par bya ba'i sgo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad so sor srub pa'i sgo dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang / bya
105a9(1): nub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos myi brjed pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo byang chub sems dpa' sgo gnyis nye bar bstan kyang // sgo thams cad la yang chags pa
105b1(1): byed pa de ni babs la ya'as pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / zhe sdang 'i go dang / zhe sdang dang brel ba'i rdo dang / ti thun nam dang / gti brog dang rna
105b2(1): dang / nyon mengs pa'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang / 'grob thams cad kyi sgo dang / 'grob byed pam / ngas 'di ni byu chub sems dpa'i babs lamalas/ ma pa
105b3(1): bye bo bams ca kyi yo pam sgo dang / thotho ba dang kyi slob pa dang / na thos dang nga sangs rgyas dang / byang dub sems dpa mtshad pam skrag yin pa'i gnyis gshes pa dang spri pa 'di byang chub sem pa dang
105b4(1): la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i ngos kyi sman sdong zhig na/ zham 'bring byed pa'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu ring du 'chag pas/ 'chog cing

105b6(1): ci spang bas 'ad pa de'i de bzhi te na ma sa sen ma/  da sa ma ma zhes bya ba'i'i/ des songs su byas po'i 'dzon rten gyilalas 'di byas kyis go ba rgyam
105b7(1): cing legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra de gnyis kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par yang gyur pa nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / 
105b8(1): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / sto phye chen po dang / myi 'am myi ma yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jim rten spyong pa mang po dag legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskus nas/ bcom
105b9(1): ldan 'das gas ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ phyogs cig tu 'khod nas/ sna dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / byin dang / sna ma yin dang
105b10(1): nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / phyi 'am myi ma yin pa dang // brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol rto/ bcom ldan 'das
106a1(1): legs pa zhes 'bya ba'i skye gang nim myo ga su rgya gang chen po'i ririn rten gyi'ams tsas kyis go bar ma da pa de sa na 'das kyis sungs du/ sos ldan 'das da kyi
106a2(1): dag de ni 'jam dpas gzho nur gyur pa la'o// sna'i bu rnams kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa de da ltar gang na mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lang ba/ lha'i bu dag 'jam
106a3(1): dpal gzho nur gyur pa ni/ rgyal po'i khab kyi klong khyer chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang ldan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gis/ lha'i bu dag gang
106a4(1): dag chos nyan par 'dod pa dag kyang der deng shig/ de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyind dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ji dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi mA rnams dang / brgya

106a6(1): tog gi char rab tu pab te/ kye tog char des rgyal po'i 'ang kyi tshe khor yug tu mye tog cha lad par bkram par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyis kyang myi rnams mthong zhing gyi rnams kyis kyang lda nas
106a7(1): mthong zhing phan tshun smra bar myi 'dod do// de ltar rgyal po khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags brgya stong phrag mapa po dag mye tog de dge gis bskul da/ lnga'i lus rags pa de dag gis kyang bskul nas
106a8(1): 'jam dpal gno nur gyur da pa ga la ba der dong ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bud myed kyi tshogs rnams kyis bskor te/ dpung gyi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang ldan cig tu rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal no/ 
106a9(1): mthu'i chen pos/ 'jam dpal gzho nung byung nga dag la ba der song nas/ 'khor de dang rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / rgyal po ma blon po'i dri rnams dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gi bu rnams kyis smad 'dong ma'i bu
106a10(1): mo gser mchog 'od pal blo 'dod chags kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i kun nas/ ldang ba dang bral te/ dbang po dang pyod lam rab tu ni zhing dbang po myi g.yengs ngo cha shes pa dang / dpal phyis legs par brgyan par mthong ngo // 
106b1(1): yongs kyang de kyid na su yang 'ad ba'i rnam pa rlon pa kyi ste rgyu to// denas mad sug na rgya pa bye ba'i tshig chen po de tshus dang gyud na/ brad 'a pa'i thum gse mchag 'od ldan
106b2(1): la 'dis sem smras 'o// bum skye ba'i tshigs sems cad kyis myed pathong yang byid zhing chags pa byed/ khyod kyi nyin mongs pa de da tu ni/ buthos smras pa/ 'jam dpas sems can thams
106b3(1): mongs pa nams ni ye shes dang rnam par brim bu la gnas pa dang / chos kyi byings la gnas pan+de/ de dag kyi sa bskyed pa dang / ma bkag pa dang / ma sbyang ba de sang bdag nis na mo// nyin mangs pa'i
106b4(1): bzhin gang lags pa de yang bdag gis rtogs so// 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin no gang yin/ bu mom smras pa/ 'jam dpal rtogs pa ma mchis gang rnam par rtogs pa
106b5(1): mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so// tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs so// da pa'i rang bzhin lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni blo bung ste/
