106b7(1): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dug drag po ni sbrul gdug pa ni bltas pa tsam gyis skye bo gum par 'gyur ba ga la ba der myi zhig gis dug thams cad gzhil ba dang dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i sman gnod se lad ces
106b8(1): bgyi ba 'cham te/ mchis nas de skar sman de bstan dam thag tu sbrus gdug pa'i drug dem mchis par bgyid nas/ de la khye'u dang bu mo rnams la bze bas brtses shing khye'u dang bu mo de dag sprul gdug pa de dang ldan can
106b9(1): du che 'a brjid de/ bang bar len pa'i grol mi la phred btag sa// rgyanang du rjid kyang cig par bye byed/ 'bar myi bgyid/ sdug bsngal du gyi bgyid do// 'angam dpal de bzhin du bdas
106b10(1): ljon chos 'dug gam thos nas tshul banin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa/ rkyen ci lo nas nye bar gnas pa'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bsnyegs pa na 'dod dgas kyis rang gi sus la chags shing gzugs la
107a1(1): khabras bas 'a mchis bams pa dasum mchis par ma pa rtog par gyi cid de/ bdug kyang byun pa mun da nis bas gnadasas thun par ga zhan
107a2(1): bam bgyid pa la/ lam dpa' gang gi'i bdug gis khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i ga' / sa sa kyang gyis shing pos nas ca rnam pa te/ de du pa sa ldan na sa
107a3(1): byig gis sul yang sa par gyi byed do// de ci'i slang du zhen/  ma dpa de bzhin du 'dod chags dang tshul pa ni sus nyon rdzong pa rnam ses chags pa sa ma sa pa med dru// 
107a4(1): nas yang 'jas dpal gzho nur gyur pa sa/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu thon sa/  mchog 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces smras so// kye sa'i ma dpal snga'i 'khor dang phyi'i 'kho chen po 'dus kyis dang
107a5(1): lagris lnga dang myi 'di dag gis nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de dag rtogs nas se mas can rnams la snying rje bas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// de lta bu'i chos kyi bkal
107a6(1): mchid bgyi bar khyod spobs par mdzod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin mos par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni byang chub yin pa'i
107a7(1): phyir ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ma sbar ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su ma brtags pa 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper
107a8(1): name spang ba ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid yin no// 8/ sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su ma brtags na 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rgyu yod na 'bar ro// sring mo/ 
107b1(1): de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu myed na/ khams gsum du 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ mye ni rgyu myed na byi 'bar ro// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams
107b2(1): kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu myed na khams gsum du myi 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ lo stong du 'bar ba'i me la ni skye ba dang 'bri ba byed do// sring mo de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong du
107b3(1): ba'i nyon mongs pa yang skye ba dang 'bri ba myed do// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ mye shi ba la mye zhes myi gdags so// sring mo de bzhin du shes pa zhi ba la yang nyon mongs pa zhes gdags so// sring mo
107b4(1): lta he/ nam mkha' gang la mye 'bar yang nam mkha' ni mye des tshig myi nus so// sring mo de bzhin du gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la glo bur gyis nyon mongs pa 'byung yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni zla
107b5(1): bur gyi nyon mongs pa des kun nas nyon mongs par byed myi nus so// sring mo 'di ltar yang gzugs kyi lus la ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na mtsho bran gyi chab
107b6(1): kyi nang na du bya bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa / bu zar phung po rnams ri ltar blta bar bya/ bums smras pa/ 'jug dpal dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i srub pa
107b7(1): bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khams rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ 'am sa gsum bskal pa'i skyes bsregs par gyu pa bzhi na
107b8(1): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo skye mched rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i las mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpas
107b9(1): byis smras pa/ bu mo 'a'or 'di ji skar blta bar bya / bu sa smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ long ba gzugs la blta ba bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyim chos 'di dag bos pa
107b10(1): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ sgyu ma phrul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bus thos lags so/ 4/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ 
108a1(1): 5dpa pa byang chu sa yang 'dus kyi /  thum rgya ca
108a2(1): jam dpas bdag gis nyon mongs pa lamasan gtan tu yongs su bta bas spyad lags so// 'angs dpas kyis smras pa/ bu mo rgyad kyis kyi yo na gyi kyi sangs su rlonas par byas
108a3(1): sa rnam pa'i yongs su rdzogs pas yongs su rdzogs pa kyis //  / 
108a4(1): la/ 'jas dpa' semasasan 'gas byebs bas padang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa brnas pa nas so// @ / bo khyod kyi 'acod tu byin#
108a5(1): song du phyin pa la gnas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dang kha chos kyi dbyings gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshus gyis pad/ gnas lanapa mo// 'jam dpal gyis rnas
108a6(1): ma nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rolan tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byams ma/ bum pa smras pa/ 'jam dpas ldan can pa mchis par yongs su bgyis sanas so// 'jam dpal kyis smras
108a7(1): bu mo khyod kyis byams pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad la myi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
108a8(1): snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las bstsags par bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
108a9(1): gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma mchis khar gyud da na// byang chub sems dpa' dag par byang chub tu sems bskyed par myi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems
108b1(1): dpa' gang nas btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems las so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i btang stobs ci zhig byed
108b2(1): mos smrab pa/ 'jab dpal byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni sems can thams cad sa kyi sgru ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / chos thams cad la 'gas pa ma mchis par nye bar bgyid pa'o// 
108b3(1): 'dam dpas kyis smras pa/ bu mo 'gal ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag ma mchis pa'i slad du byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa dag no// 'jam dpas kyis spras pa/ de dag gang dang 'an
108b4(1): bu mos smras pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo phas kyi rgol ba gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag bzod pa'i rlom sems kyis gzhan sa rgol ba dag lags so// 
108b5(1): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ga las 'od/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyis 'bo 'tsham pa las mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ na tu
108b6(1): tsham mchis na bzod pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'jam dpalagang dag la sems can thams cad kyis the tsom bcad nas khrug par ma mchis shing gnod pa myi bgyid pa de bzod pa bsgom pa lamra
108b7(1): so/ ka 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis bskal pa brgyar pas bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnabs la gnod par bgyid pa de ni'ang khro ba
108b8(1): zhes bgyi'o// 'jam dpas kyis smras pa/ bu mo long khro ba byed pa zhes bya ba de ste bu min/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi sems sa zhe 'gras pa ma mchig shing lus pams padagadod par gyi
108b9(1): pa ze/ de ni bzod pa sags par rig par bgyi'o// 'dam dpas kyis smras pa bu mo ji ster na byang chub sems dpa' phul las rnam par rgyas ma na/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpas gang chos dmas
108b10(1): rbad la rnam par 'byed kyang phyi dmyigs pa lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol pa bcom pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang
109a1(1): nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jas dpas byang chub sems dpa' ni skyod dkyang phung po'i ni rnams pa rnyed ga kyi gnasangs 'jam dpas byang chub sems dpa ni nyon mongs pa rnams stod
109a2(1): kA kyang rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongs su sbyid par bgyi ba'i sladadu/ rga ba dang / 'thib ston kyang chom thams cad la 'chi 'gro ba dang / 'gros
109a3(1): sa kyis las tunas dang /  ma pas rgyang chub ses dang ni dra dan blon kyang dru do dang tshus sems thamasas da dang zlos pa'i slang du// 'das dpal kyis snus pa/ bum myong chus sems dpa sa
109a4(1): sems can yongs su sbyin par byed/ bu mes spras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang thabs yongs su bsgom pas sems can yongs su sbyin par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
109a5(1): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' di ska sems can thams cad kyi duganas par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang gi das dang shes pa yongs su bsgos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems can
109a6(1): na 'drug pa de'i na yin pa rnas pa ga pas rnas par shes pa 'dug pa 'ang nyad pa ma lanas so// 'artso pas kyis smras pa/ 
109a7(1): ya zhes bya na la dug sa su mas da kyis bu sa pa/ pa tsho'i
109a8(1): na pa sa/ ga na zhin rgyas pa pyid kyi nas dang / ga shes pa ma pa gas
109b1(1): bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis de la de ltar chos bsad pa na/ 'bod de las srog chags khrig gnyis gong gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te// / byang chub sems dpa'i be
109b2(1): ba pa sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sgra dang gyi lnga brgyan gyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ srog chags gsum khri gnyis song ni chos rnams le chos kyi myig drus byed pa'i dri dang bral ba rnam yang dag no// bu me
109b3(1): mang chos dang pa'i dga' ga dang mchog tu dgan pa'i chos rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa po tho par gyud to// des bzod pa yopo nas 'das dpas gno dung byung ba'i nang pa la gtugs te/ 'das dang sa lugs rtser gyi
109b4(1): bang dra bdag paN+Da brgyang dugs sang rtsal bani dus sanyas bkun paskyed du/ 'bags pa yus pa/ phags pa'i tshig la ma nyams par na pa'i de sa 'di mas ba du da ma du 'a zhes
109b5(1): ma na na pa bta // 'das dpas kyis rgyus/ phreng po 'dis she ma 'i hUM thegs pa dede d+ha chub semasadapa'i ba tu rnang ba ma yin no// dpo'i phyir zhed/  gas
110a1(1): bayin no// bdag yongs su mya ngan sngas 'da' ba'i skrag pa'i rnams pa gus pani rgya chub sems da 'i tu byung pan te/ sems can gzhan yos suca na lan pa'i rnam pa'i ma su
110a2(1): ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba yin no// bdag gi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba yin no// 
110a3(1): bdag gi sems rjes su srung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rjes su srung ba ni bya bachug sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba yin no// bu mo 'khor bas skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i
110a4(1): rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba las grol bar bya ba la dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba yin no// bu mo mya ngan las 'da' ba la dga' ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ 
110a5(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni byang chub semasadapa'i rab tu byung ba yin no// bu mo rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba de nisems can gzhan dag la snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas
110a6(1): so// bu mo rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba de ni bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo rab tu byung ba zhes bya kha de ni gzhan la gyi spod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dwags so// 
110a7(1): bu mo rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan sten zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gyi ltung ba myi gleng ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba de ni nyes pa
110a8(1): thams cad las byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ni gzhams rag las pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan la rag ma las pano// bu mos smras pa/ 'jas
110a9(1): dpel ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba gzhan lA rag las pa lags// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo rab tu byung ba ni tshul khrims la rag las pa yin te/ tshul khrims 'chasad pa la ni rab tu byung ba ni yang
110a10(1): byed do// bu mo rab tu byung ba ni ting nge 'dzin la nag yas pa yin te/ brjed ngas pas ni rab tu byung bani yang skyed do// bu mo rab tu byung ba ni ges rab la rag yas pa yin te/  shes rab 'am mad pa la ni rab tu byung ba skye/ 
110b1(1): do// bu mo rab tu byung ba ni rnam par grol ba la rag gas pa yin te/ sems ma grol ba la ni rab tu byung ba ni yang myed do// bu mo rab tu byung ba ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas rag las pa yin te/ rnam pa
110b2(1): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba myed pa sa ni rab tu byung ba ni yang myed do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba gzhan la rag las pa ma mchis pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
110b3(1): bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pas na gzhan la rag las pa myed pa ste/ rang gi kun shes pa'i ye shes kyis 'dis gang ci shes pa de dag gis kyang shes la/ 'di gang ci smras pa de bdag kyang smra'o// 
110b4(1): zhes gzhan dag gi ngor myi lta bas na/ gzhan la rag yas pa myed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa rab tu byung ba yin te// le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ legs par bshad pa'i phyir byang chub
110b5(1): sems dpa' lnga brgyas rang rang gi gos dang rgyan thams cad lus las phud/ de// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam
110b6(1): kyi rab tu byung ba legs par bshad de/ bdag cag rnams kyis kyang rab tu byung ba 'di bsgrub par bgyi// / de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu rang pas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad
110b7(1): ces smras po// bu mo khyod rta'i shing rta 'di la zhon pa tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byind la snying rtse ba'i phyir yongs su sbyin par gyis shig/ de nyid kyis khyod rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyend par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas
110b8(1): skye bo phal po che de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gnyis lhan cig gan su ji ltar rung snyam mo// de nas bu mo des skye bo bal po che de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes
110b9(1): nas ka skye bo bas po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs se dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang ldan cig gnas kyang khan ma thob myed la 'dod chags
110b10(1): dad bcas pa'i sems cad rnams kyang 'dul ba byed do// grogs se dag zhe sdang dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang / lan ma tho ba phyed la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i seMs
111a1(1): a/ can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs po gti mug dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang ldan cig gnas kyang la nam tho ba myed la/ gti thug dang bcas pa'i sa
111a2(1): can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs se dag nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba myed la/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/ 
111a3(1): sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs po dag 'di sa ste dper nas ni bu dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags pa byed do// grogs me dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams pad dang ldan cig gnas
111a4(1): kyang chags pa byed do// grogs se dag 'di sa sgo dper na bcings pa lngas bkrol ba'i phyi'i 'dod chags kyi kun tu pyod pa la myi yud do// grogs me dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang khams gsum pa thams cad 'a
111a5(1): ba dang / 'bos lta bur 'du shes pas chags pa myed do// de nas dad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal chos kyis 'babs stegs / da su ni zhugs/ gting ni rnyed/ thangs ni byin dam rig pa'i mun pa
111a6(1): ni pra te/ srid pa'i skyon gyi nyon mongs pa 'jigs par lta ba ni len par mthong nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nang pa'i nang pas man sa phyag 'tshal te/ san gsum bskor ba byas nas shis #
111a7(1): zhon kar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rang bzhin dag chags pas ma chags shing // rtag tu byams sems sdang bas sdang ba myed// shes rab snang shar gti mug rmongs bral ba/ nyon mongs
111a8(1): myed par shing rta zhon par bya// gang gis sngon chad bdag gis rgyal gyur da cig/ nor chags tshong dpon bu dang lhan cig tu// shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos tshal song ba// 'dod pa'i rnam rtog de dag gang tu song
111a9(1): ji ltar sprin chogs stug pos sa khebs na// nyi ma'i 'od zeng rnam med lha ne byin/ 'o nad kyang 'od zer de dag kar gyi 'gro// srin gyis pasgribs pas snang ba skyed du zad// de bzhin nyon mongs bsgris
111a10(1): bas byim pa kun// shes rab snad sa blo ste myed pa yang // shes rab sul gang gang gnas pa myed// nen ma dang yongs su shes pas shes rab snang // rten mongs gang nas 'ong ba 'ang ma yin zhing / 
111b1(1): yul gyi phyogs char 'gro ba 'ang ma yin te// tshul bzhin ma yin pa las nyon mongs 'byung // tshul bzhin gyis ni de dag 'byung myi 'gyur// bor ba myed cing blangs pa yang yod ma yin// skye ba myed cing bkan
111b2(1): pa 'ang yod ma yin// gzhan la ma byin 'phrogs pa 'ang ma yin te/ chos mnyam nyid kyis bdag kyang rnam par dag/ 'bru mar sgron ma mun par byung ba ni// mun pa phyogs su song ba myed pa ltar// 
111b3(1): shes kyis mun pa myed gyur da na// nyon mongs par gyurapa myed cing 'byung ba'ang byed// ji ltar nad pas spand pa gos pa na// de'i khams ni 'jig par myi byed kyang // nad rnams gzhan yang 'byung ba myed pa
111b4(1): ltar// de bzhin sma nad pa'i dam pa'i 'jam dbyangs kyis// rig pa'i tshul mkhyen du sbyor pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can nyon mongs nye bar zhi mdzad kyang // chos rnams rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa
111b5(1): myed// phung po 'di dang khams rnams 'di dag dang // phas skyemached 'di rnams gzhan du 'gyur ba myed// gang dag sngon chad nganyes ldan dug bcas pas// de dag nga ni dug myed do// de
111b6(1): nas spang 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis tshigs su btsud pa de dag smras pas yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyu pa'i rkang pa/ la mgo bos phyag byas te/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon
111b7(1): gyurd pa la bskor ba byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang lhan cig tu shing rta la zhon te/ de'i bu'i 'byor pa nyid kyis bskyed mos tshal gyi sar song ngo // 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pas kyang thams
111b8(1): da dang ldan pa'i 'khod de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par hand/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yangab dag par bzed med/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas so// yang dag par 'di nad tu bcug/ 
111b9(1): yang dag pa bzed btod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ des 'di sad ces smras so// grogs po dag gang dag chos nyan da par dag ba rnams dpang kyi dro'i du kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stan sngar des sa
111b10(1): de skad ces spros nas sa phyogs de nas yangs te/ rang gi gnas gal pa de logs su dong rje// de nas smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser ma rtog 'od dpas dang tsho ba dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis snyan cig tu skyed mos tshal du phyind pa dang / 
112a1(1): der mye tog chal par bkram ste bdug pas btugs/ bla re bres nas/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang la dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan te/ bza' ba dang btung ba'i 'byor pa dag kyang bshams nas
112a2(1): dga' ba'i med mo dang / rjes su mthun pa'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs le nad pa byed cing bskyed mos tshal na gnas par gyur to// de dag gis zos shing 'thungs nas rab tu myos par gyur pa dang / smad
112a3(1): tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gyi pad par sngas bcas te nyal lo// de nas bu mo des mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis rang gi lus rnyis par bstand nas des 'chi ba'i 'du shes bskyed de/ 
112a4(1): de'i lus thams cad myi sdug par gyur nas ro myags 'dra bar snang zhing de'i rtsu ba'i bu ga gnyis dang / myig gi dbang po dang / na sna'i nang nas myi gtsang ba'i dri myi zhim padag 'byung zhing byung nas kyang lus thams cad la khyab
112a5(1): par gyur to// de'i kha'i nang nas kyang dri mnam po dag byung ste/ dri ma/ denam po de dag gis bskyed mos chal de dag khyab par gyur to// de'i spu'i lung bu thams cad nas kyang khrag dang rnag mnam po dag 'dzag/ 
112a6(1): so/ lto ba dang lce'i dbus rdosad pa nas kyang cher po dang rgyum tham sa cad byung ngo // rkub dnga'adoms kyang bshang ci dag byung zhing 'dzan no// de'i spyi bo nas klad pa 'jug no// rga lag gi tshe
112a7(1): mo rnams la yang snang ma sngon po dag rgyu bar 'gyur ro// de nis tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gyis// bu mo de'i lus la de lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyu ra pa dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'jigs skrag ste/ tsha
112a8(1): cing skyabs myed rten myed dpung gnyen myed par gyudad nas sgrub pa tshol zhing 'jigs pa chen pos skrag par gyur nas 'dar zhing tshe nges 'debs par gyur to// de 'jigs pa chen po skyes pa'i spya ni gnyis te/ so so'i skye bo nyid
112a9(1): yin pa dang / 'jigs pa'i skyon de dag mthong ba'o// bdag re shig bu mo 'di'i le len gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgras sad par 'ong ngo snyam nas/ des bu mo de bang po nas bor ba dang / bros par brtsams nas yang ma
112a10(1): nus so// de'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jigs su rung ba'i 'jigs pa chen po de mthong nas bros par gyur to// de nas de gcig pu grogs myed par de nas shi nang tu 'jigs shing sngag nas/ bdag 'jigs
112b1(1): skrag pa chen po 'di las yongs su tha rad par byed pa'i// lnga'am/ klu 'am gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lA ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ myi 'am mi 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ myi 'am phyi ma yin
112b2(1): ba 'tsho/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze su yod pa snyam du sems shing 'dug go// tshong dpon gyi bu de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma sbyind pa 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pas bu mo de la chos bshad pa dag kyang me thos ma shes so/ 
112b3(1): de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur ba'i byin gyi brlabs kyis skyed mos tshal de'i shing ljond pa thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // 'jig rten thams cad yang dag byin// ci ltar sgyu ma mthong ba bzhin/ 
112b4(1): khye'u yis ni ji ltar ma 'ong gyur ba// chos rnams rang bzhin de yin no// sha dang khrag gis bsdus pa yin// byis pa rnams kyi 'khrul dpa ste/ yang dag byin der rnam btags nas/ phyi mu khas byi
112b5(1): ba chags par byed// ji ltar myi mkhas myi zhig ni// dri bswa tsa'i bum pa 'am/ phyi ro lad ri mo bris pa zhig/ mgo la khyer te song pa las// 'gro ba de'i de yang ni// de las ltung ste chags gyur da nas/ 
112b6(1): dring rdzam pa yod rdzus te// chags pa byed khron nga / der/  kyis bu mabyas pa// byis byed nas srid ce/  gzugs dang byibs rnamasas// 
112b7(1): des chags par byed// sras kyi rang bzhin gang yod pa// de khyod dag / togs shig/ dur khrod su ya pa'i dri la ni/ lam pa su zhig chags par 'gyur// yang dag phyin pa 'jig pa
112b8(1): myed kyis// khye'u khyod 'jigs par ma byed par// gang la khyod sngon rgyal gyur pa'i// chos rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ltos// chos kyi dam pa stond mdzad cing // 'jigs kyur nga 'jigs pa ka se yang mdzad pa/ 
112b9(1): shag kya seng ge zhes bya ba'i/ hond par yang dag byung ba yod do// 'dod pa myi rtag myi brtan pa// glog 'od snang 'ji bzhin te/ snang yang yang dag ma yin pas// mkhas pa de la chags pa byed// ji ltar/ 
112b10(1): chu ni 'khrugs pa las/ dbu ba rdobs pa 'byung ba yang // rgyu'i spyod las skyes pa ste// de la byed pa po yang myed// de bzhin mying dang gzugs rnams sdang // las kyi spyod las skyes pa ste/ rdzu las byung ba
113a1(1): yin pas na/ byed pa po ni gang yang myed// kha dog bzang po gang song zhing // gang gis khyod 'dir skrag pa'i// myi gtsang ba yang ga las 'ongs// khye 'u khyod de la mngon gsum gyis/ 
113a2(1): rnams yul la gyi gnas// de dag phyogs na 'ongs pa myed// 'ong ba myed cing 'gro myed kyang // de dag rang bzhin stond par byed// 'di la byed pa po myed cing // tshong ba po yang 'di la myed// byed myed tsho ba
113a3(1): po myed pa'i// chos rnams sku 'dra dngos po myed// rang gi sus la rtogs shig dang // de yang 'di dang 'dra bas na// khye'u khyod gzhan gyi lus kyis ni// 'dir yang skrag par ma byed cig// ji ltar rmyil
113a4(1): byis pa na/ med mo byed cing dga' ba ltar// de bzhin dga' ba'i rtsed mo kun// / rmyil ma zed mo byas dang 'dra// shag kyi seng ge'i dbyar sngar ni// khye'u khyod 'gro bar gyis shig dang // des mi khyod kyi
113a5(1): 'jigs dang skrag/ thad dang bcam te 'byin par 'gyur//  dem khyod kyis byas ma yin// mnga' shes pa la ga rnams kyang dbyin// de dag gis ni khyod por nas// ji ltar 'dod na
113a6(1): bzhin du 'ats+tsho// 'jigs gyu 'jigs pa byed mang cing / skyabs byed skyob pa'i sangs rgyas dang // chos dang tshogs mchog dge 'dun pa// der ni skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ 
113a7(1): dang drib gyi rnam pa sam// gang dag des skyabs mdzob/ 'dzi sa pa kun las pa ra bar 'gyur// bde 'gro rnyed par dgra bskyed// de nas tshod dpon gyi lce'u des tshigs su bcad pa de dag rdos
113a8(1): dag man 'di 'dzigs smras pa dran sa nas/ dan ya dang tshig tu dag bster te/ 'i dzumasas pa de bdon sa nams da denas dang // denam mam ldan 'das kyi chenas
113a9(1): kyibri de 'dus pa'i dab bying/ sa sa 'dos tu byung te/ 'di des yul pagatagams na ldang bas chub par byed te/ bre des de bzhin gshenas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzos pa'i sangs rgyas nyim
113a10(1): marba ba dang /  yi mas kyis 'ab la/ gan / yin// thun pa ni ba rgyu ga ba byed pa/ dam ma na bas pa// gas kyis na sas 'o// 
113b1(1): 'jar pa/ glang po cher dbang po dul zhing bsrungs pa/ mtsho ltar dang zhing rtog pa myed pa/ skyes bu chen po mtshan sum bcu cha gnyis brgyan pa/ nyad pos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas chos ston cing bathunas
113b2(1): khar rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // de'i lam bkra ba blta na sdug pa rin po che'i lam kan bres pa mye tog bkram pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang khye'u de'i mdun tu 'greng nas khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras
113b3(1): so// khye'u khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas sems rab tu dang bar gyur pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa yang khyod nyid la dgongs kyis khye'u khyod lam 'dir zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs
113b4(1): kha'i spyan sngar song shig dang // de nas khye'u de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khye'u de la khye'u khyod kyis mye tog 'di dag gis de bzhin
113b5(1): gshegs paM laM mngon par gtor dacig ces me tog ma na da ra ba gang ba byin/ no// de nas khye'u des me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// gtor de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhag
113b6(1): kha mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'din da ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong hAhA tra
113b7(1): gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yul gyi bzang mo rgyal pos thugs su chud pa
113b8(1): gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bgyi ba zhig dga' bar rtse ba'i slad du skyed mos tshal du khrid pa las/ bcom ldan 'das mdog yal zhing lus myags te/ nye du'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang spangs nas/ bdag kyang 'jigs pa chen
113b9(1): skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i le lan gyis bdag rgyal pos 'gum du myi mchi lags sam bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sas pad pa/ khye'u ma dogs shig/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba rnams la 'jigs
113b10(1): babyis kyi 'byung bas ngas khyod kyi 'jigs pas mgron du gnyer gyis 'jigs pa ma skyed cig khye'u de lta mod cigazhi gang las 'jigs pa dang skrag par 'gyur ba'i gzhi de yongs su spongs shig/ gsosod pa/ bcom ldan 'das
114a1(1): 'jigs pa dang skrag par gyur pa'i gzhi gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa/ la pa/ khye'u 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ni 'jigs pa dang skrag par 'gyur ba'i gzhi'o// nga'o snyam
114a2(1): ngargyal ni gzhi'o// lha bachi kun nas ldang ba ni gzhi'o// srid pas ldag par chags pa ni gzhi'o// ngang 'dzin pa dang / ngang yid 'dzin pa gzhi'o// dngos pos mngon par zhend pa ni gni'o// yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 
114a3(1): chod pa ni ga zhi'o// 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'ching ba ni gzhin// myi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa gzhi'o// gyi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o// bdag byed pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o// phung po rnams pa/ 
114a4(1): yongs su 'dzind pa'i 'du shes mi gzhi'o// khams rnams la so sor myi rtog pa ni gzhi'o// skye mched rnams yongs su myi shes pa ni gzhi'o// lus la skyon du myi lta ba ni gzhi'o// phrog sa mngon par dga' ni gzhi ste/ 
114a5(1): khye'u gzhi de dag las 'jigs pa dang skrag pa 'byung bas de dag spang bar bya'o// khye'u khyod kyis bu mo de'i lus rnam par zhig pa mthong ngam/  sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lags so// 
114a6(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sas lad pa/ khye'u 'dus byas thams/ cad ni de ltar myi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag myed pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos myi brtan pa zer thug pa ma yin/ byis
114a7(1): ba 'drid pa/ log pa las byung ba/ g.yo ba myed par rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ myed pa las snang ba lus sgyu ma lta bu'o// ro myong ba chung skyilam lta bu'o// 'khrug par snang bas smyig smra'o// gdod pa nas ma skyes pas
114a8(1): byig yor lta bu'o// las kyi rnam par sbyind pa chud myi za'i tshul gyis gzugs rnyan lta bu'o// 'pho ba myed pa'i tshul gyis chu zla lta bu'o// sgra myed pa las sgrar go bar byed pas brag cha lta bu'o// mngon par 'du byed pa myed de/ 
114a9(1): yin pas brib pa'i gzugs sa bu'o// rang bzhin gyis a ma r+tha yin pas chang ba stong pa lta bu'o// gzung du myed pas rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// btsun pa'o// gzhi byed pa'o/ gsen no// sgrib pa skyed pa'o// rdzogs pa myed pa'o/ 
114a10(1): khye'u de ltar na chos thams cad ni bdag po myed pa ste/ de la khyod mngon par zhend par myi bya'o// khye'u 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i rtog pa dang / dpyod pa gang yin pa de dag ji ltar mthong / khye'us gsol/ 
114b1(1): pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi 'dod chags ni kha dog dang dbyibs bzang po las yongs su brtags pas skye lags so// de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba'i myi gtsang ba las sogs par brtags pas
114b2(1): myi 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la myi rtog na 'dod chags kyi kun tu rtog pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sarbald pa/ khye'u legs so legs so// 'di lta ste/ myi rtog cing rnam
114b3(1): par myi rtog pa 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin yin no// khye'u khyod kyis bdag tu lta ba myed pa dang / gzhan du lta bar spro 'dogs pa myed par chos la tshul bzhin du sems par brtson par bya'o// khye'us gsol
114b4(1): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la tshul bzhin du sems par brtson pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saN+Dal dpa/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin gyis bya ba
114b5(1): chub yongs su tshol lo// khye'u de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang gi rang bzhin dang / gti mug gi dang bzhin dang / nyon mongos rab thams cad rang bzhin gyis byang chub yongs su tshol lo// bye
114b6(1): jisar 'dod chags dang / zhes pa dang / gti mug gi dngos po myed pa de ltar chos thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa 'dug no// / khye'u 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nas
114b7(1): nim pa byed pa ga sa pa/ ga'i bye sa/ byed pa po byed pa/ da ba po myod pa/ nad dang byo ba dben pa/ spong pa/ bdag dang / sem pan dang / thon dang / gapa' pa dang / skyes su / nga
114b8(1): dang / drab pa macanam byed pa/ mtshan ma rton pa dang / dras pa/ smodad pa myed pa/ mngon par dga' bskyed pa/ dga' 'a dang phred pa dang dral pa/ mngon par 'du byed pa byed pa/ rang bzhin skyed pa'o// 
114b9(1): khye 'ang mags pa zhe 'ang rjong / gti munadzis pa de bzhin rna chos thams padas byang chub sems dpa nas pa 'dun go// khye'u gzhan kyang num pa zhin du sems pa la ba yin pa'i byang chub
114b10(1): thems dpa'i sems bskyed pa thams cad ni byang chub yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems rtogs pa dang ni 'de ni stan pa byed pa/  pa byed pa dang / rnam par rime pa byed pa dang / sgra ma'i sa
115a1(1): bzhin lta bu dang / nad ma yin pa dang / phyi rol ma yin pa dang / gzhan dang ldan pa yin pas gzugs myed pa ste/ khye'u de nyid byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub yin te/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa
115a2(1): rang gi sems rtogs pa ma gtogs par khong du yang bya ba gzhan ci yang myed do// rang gi sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems can thams cad kyi sems rtogs pa yin no// rang gi sems dben pas sems can
115a3(1): thams cad kyi sems dben no// rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no// rang gi sems rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnam par dag go// rang gi
115a4(1): sems 'dod chags dang bral bas sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bral lo// rang gi sems la zhe sdang myed pas sems can thams cad kyi sems la zhe sdang myed do// rang gi sems la gti mug myed
115a5(1): pas sems can thams cad kyi sems la gti mug myed do// rang gi sem ngas la nyon mongs pa myed pas sems can thams cad kyi sems la na nyon mongs pa myed do// de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de thams
115a6(1): cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no// khye'u de ltar tshul bzhinal brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems la rang bzhin gyisakun nas nyon mongs pa myed par rab tu shes so// gang blo bur
115a7(1): gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs pas sems kyi sems kyi rgyu lan nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang byed la/ chos kyi rig pa'i chu bong gis de dag pa yongs su gdung ba myed de/ des byang chub sems dpa' de dag
115a8(1): gis blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams mthong bas ni kun nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur ro// bstand pa 'di bshad pa na tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin chos rnams pa rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa skyes par gyur to// de
115a9(1): nas spod 'tshong ba'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpas kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu de dul bar rig nas ke/ lha'i bu mo lnga brgya cam gyis yongs su gsod te/ sim snyan dang pes rdob pa dang / klur byang me lend pa dag byed cing
115a10(1): bcom ldan 'das rnas bder ma ni bye nas/ srog ldan 'das kyi zhibs sas gongs byag 'dus te/ ma ldan 'das lalan gsum banango byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha kyang 'drud do// den sa 'das/ 
115b1(1): dpal gzho nur gyudad pas tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin la 'di skad ces smras so// khye'u khyod kyis sring mo 'di shes sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'chal lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ji lta bur shes/ 8
115b2(1): nas khye'u des 'jam dpal gzho nur gyurd pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gzugs ni dbu' ba rdos pa 'dra// rtor ba ni chu'i chu bur bzhin// 'du shes smyig spu lta bu ste/ 'du byed rnams ni chu shing bzhin// rnam
115b3(1): shes sgyu ma lta bu ste// yongs su rtog pas kun tu bskyed// byis pas yang dag myin brtags par// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'chalang// 'di'i lus myi g.yo'i khams po he// zla dang rtsig pa lta bu lags// rnam/ 
115b4(1): shes bstand tu ma mchis te// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal// 'di la sems can bdag ma mchis// srog dang gang zag ma mchis te// lus 'dis gas pa tsam lags par// de ltar bdag gis yod
115b5(1): su 'tshald// 'di la 'dod chags ldang ma mchis// gti mug 'byung pa'ang ma mchis te// nyon mongs ma mchis bdag ma mchis// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal// tshul bzhin ma lags
115b6(1): spad ba 'di// byis pa rnams kyi 'khrul pa ste/ mkhas pa de la/ myi chags par/ de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshald// dper na 'di ni nags khrod nu// shi ba'i ro 'di mnam pa
115b7(1): bzhin// gzugs 'di dang bzhin de 'dra bar// de ltar nang bdag gis yongs su 'tsha leng// 'di ni sngon mthar ma skyes ste// da ltar byung ba ma mchis par// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal
115b8(1): 'di yis bdag ni rgyal ba las/ myi gtsang ba yis bkrol bas na// 'jam dbyangs rnam pa ji ltas kyang // 'di la lan glan rngo myi thog/ myi gum 'chi 'pho ma mchis kyang // sems can yongs sbyin brgya
115b9(1): blad du// bdag ni 'chi'ar stond pagyid many+dza// su zhig byang chub chos kyi bgyid// dI ltar bdag gis chag su sdang dang // nyon mongs thams cad tshul bzhin byin// sems can kun gyis mtshan de badra/ 'din/ 
115b10(1): chos rnams chos nyid pags/ de nas de'i sa bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa mdad do// 'doni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi rje 'dzum pa mngad pa de'i'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nas byini
116a1(1): nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang / dkar po dang btsod ka dang / shel dang rdul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ 'jig rten
116a2(1): gyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas nyan las
116a3(1): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga pa sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga khaM ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
116a4(1): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyend ni gang lags/ de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
116a5(1): gsol to// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhyend la ya mtshand myi mnga' bas/ bton pa rgyu ma mchis pas 'dzum pa myi mdzad na// 'di ltar khyod ni 'ardum pa mdzad par gyur pa'i// khyod kyi 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bdag cag
116a6(1): shi nad tu 'tshal da// rgyal ba'i zhas 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur pa mthong nas/ ni// sngar bcas 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom skyes par gyur// 9/ tsam gyurd pa rnams kyis som nyi bslad du// myi dbang 'dzul
116a7(1): ba mdzad pa'i rgyu ni baha nang du gso lang// gang gi pa di ring chos rnams la ni yi de bzhag gam// chos nyid du ni rgyal ba las las mthong gyurd tam/ sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa gang gis deng / bdag
116a8(1): cag de dag nyand par 'tshal lo mya'i gno// gang gis de ring bdud rnams bzhon dang bcas bcom 'am/ gang gis stond pa'i thugs de ring dgyes bgyis sam// gang gis de ring 'dus byas rnams kyi gting rtogs sam/ 
116a9(1): de dag nya dad par 'chas po the com yal ba tu gsosod// 'dren pa 'dus pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni nya dang spad du/ 'gro ba thams cad pas ma srung bar bgyis ste sdod// rkang gnyis rnams kyis gco ba zhugs rje bskyed mdzod la/ khe
116a10(1): cos gyur pa rnams kyi yid gnyis gsal tu gsol / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba mthong ngam/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das
116b1(1): mthongasags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' laya de/ kun dga' so myong snang tshong pa'i bu bo gser bachog 'ad papa 'di ni sngon 'jam dpas gan nur byung pas than byed pa
116b2(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu cug+sa ste/ 'dis desas thos nas chos rnams pa rjes su 'thun pa'i da pa 'od par gyur to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis chod pon gyi 'dzinas phyin zhes bya ba 'dis man
116b3(1): gsol dpa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' baN+Dal dpa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni ngas sngon bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag
116b4(1): par 'dzin tu bcug te/ 'dis kyang ngas chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// kun dga' bo smad tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di mi bskal pa 'bum phrag dgu btsu lnga gnyis 'das pa'i 'og tu
116b5(1): bskal pa rin cen 'byung zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin cen zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od
116b6(1): ces bya bar 'gyur ro// kuni dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can rnams kyi mngos spyod dang nye bar byed pa ni sum bcu rtsa gsum kyi sa rnams kyi mi 'dra ba de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de sa byangathacas
116b7(1): chub sems dpa' rin po che dag ma gtogs par rin po me gzhan 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog/ 
116b8(1): par sangs rgyas pa na/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin cen 'od ces bya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos mdzod 'dzind par byed do// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs
116b9(1): ba rin cen 'od yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin cen 'ad pa byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin cen 'od 'di ni nga'i 'og tu blun skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs
116b10(1): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'od 'phro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi gzhod pa yang nga'i ji 'dra bas
117a1(1): 'gyu'o// zhes su rtsod par 'gyur// 'di co ba'i bum gse chog 'a da dpapa dang / nga pod kyi du 'jig pa byid gnyis bung brtan papa tu/ de'i nas nga gsus gyig chen po
117a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing 'jig rten du snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// lung bstand pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags brgyad stong gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
117a3(1): bskyed par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ me dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsosod to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phying gyi sogs/ 'di ci skar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
117a4(1): 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bkod pa chen po'i'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ 'jam dpal rnam par rold pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ smad 'tshong
117a5(1): ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal btul pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sa lad nas// tshe dang / ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'o
117a6(1): dpal dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byind deng / 'jam dpal gno/ nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang / !
117a7(1): myi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yin rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rold pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
117a8(1): thogs so// oM badz+ra sa twAts+tsha/ oM badz+ra satwA dz+nyAHrgyagang gi mtshan po srin du pa dang /  chen gyi mcheb pa de le shes sdes gyus te gtan pa bapa/ da thas
117a9(1): hUM kyi/ rgya gang rnaM hU~M/ ma rgya man 'dri kri pa 'i brid dran na ma naM ya na suH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jas dpal gyim zhus pa zhes bya ba che
117a10(1): ba chen po'i dzi/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad phyag 'ams so// // 'di skad bdag shin thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodon/ kun nas mdzes pa'i khang pa'ang/ 
117b1(1): na dge slong stong gnyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / gdul bya 'bum phrag du ma dag dang thams cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom
117b2(1): ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la spu myi g.yo' bar bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstand las langs te/ bra gos phrag pa gcig tu bzang
117b3(1): nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar da pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolar to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen
117b4(1): po gang gis gdul bya byed pa khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos myu rang 'gram du 'gyur ba'i 'gyur ba'i bsod nams chen po ni ji lta bu lags tshad ni ji
117b5(1): chen po gang gis gdus bya bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bsam pa tho sa bu rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi su 'gras du bgyur ba'i mayod rnams chen po de ni shes rab 'as
117b6(1): byung ba/ snying rje chen thom yongs su bsgom pa/ thabs la mkhas pa chen po smon sam gyis bskyed pa/ tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gnod tu rnam par dag pa bsgoms pa'i khyad par zhim yang das pa drub
117b7(1): ba ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis kyi khyab pa yin no// 'angs dpa' 'jam bu'i blong na sems can ji skyed yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi blam dang ldan par
117b8(1): da pa sna bdan pa smrang ga na/ sa sa kyi /  la rdzun na sa
118a1(1): po rin po che dang / 'di bdun no// de la bu dpa' brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol kyi sde rab tu 'jom par byed pa/ stong yod do// 'jam dpal de ltar 'khor los/ 
118a2(1): sbyar ba'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu 'che ba yin no// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur/ 
118a3(1): sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid stong du sgyu da pas sna'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur te de ltar de'i dbang po brgya byin mi rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu'ache ba yin no// 
118a4(1): 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur da la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin
118a5(1): babasod nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bus brag du mar sbyar pas / gang 'dod pa'i khams su bstand pas go bar byed pa 'dod pa'o khams ni dbang phyug bdud du byung dete/ de ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi dang/ 
118a6(1): phyug bdud ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu' che ba ste/ dge ba'ikha chung ngus myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'a garten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdun
118a7(1): kyi lam da rnams kyi zang ze dang ldan par lda nas/ semam can de dag thams cad kyi sod nams kyi byung ze gang yin pa/ bdon mas kyi phung bre gang yin na/ bsad rnams kyi drang po nyid 'dus can su
118a8(1): bsku ba sa/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams stong byams pas khyab par byed pa stong gi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gi 'jin rten gyi 'ams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi ni 'du
118a9(1): bochongs pa'i bsod rnams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa/ bso nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag du mar gyur pas/ gang stong gnyis kyi
118a10(1): nyin gyi thams byam pas khyab par byed pa/ gong nyis kyi bdan po yang ba par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi lam ma na sems can ji snyed med pa de dag nyams pad pa nyis kyi bdas sto'o pa
118b1(1): ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung glang yin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid 'bum phrag du mang bsgyur dpas gang stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i rig rten/ 
118b2(1): gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed pa/ tshangs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po che bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sreg pa'i bskal na pa 'byung ba de'i che bar gyi bskald pa la nges
118b3(1): par char 'bab cing chu'i rigs pa rnams 'bab ste/ de dag gis stong gsum gyi hong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus gang bar byed do// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar chus gang bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i thigs pa de dag thams cad dbang
118b4(1): daphyug chen po che ba tshangs pa des myi shes pa myed de dbang phyug chen po che ba tshangs pa'i mthu la ltos/ de ltar ye shes chen po dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul ldan la mthu che ba yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus ni hong gsum gi stong chen po'i
118b5(1): bdag po dbang phyug chen po che ba tshangs par myi 'gyur ro// 'jamadapal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can deji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stong gsum gyi hong chen po'i bdag po tshangs
118b6(1): chen pa'i ba'i rnams kyi phung po dang ldan par byud pa semasasade de dag bams cad kyi bab nams kyi phung po gang yin pa dan nams kyi phung ba de nyid bye baphrag b+h+rin 'bus phrag dumar bskrun papa nyanatham
118b7(1): pos chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa cig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam pa dpal spyong sum gi slong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyan tho ma chen po'i bamed rnams kyi phung po dang ldan par dru / 
118b8(1): sa sems can de dag thams cad kyi sod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid bye ba 'brum phrag dum pa bsgyur pas rang sangs rgyas mthu chen po thob pa cig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum h+ya he ba chen po'i/ 
118b9(1): 'di nyen gyi khams ste shin zhonog ni/ 'jam dngas sangs rgyas kyi ning gi mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'dzin rten gyi lams na sems can ji srid yod pa de dag khams dar ba sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po 'otho ba'i bamadan
118b10(1): dang ldan pang gyu tu sems can de dag dmas cad kyi mdonamam kyi drung zag yin pa / ga'adon las kyi drung po de nyid bye thag khrig 'bum blag dupa dang byung pas byang chub sems dpa srid pa 'am pa gcig su 'gyur ro// 
119b1(1): skyes po dang / byig kyi bzang dang / nor sbyin dang / drang srong chen po dang / dpapa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / me dang / drung dang / babam dang / gsung drung 'khyil pa dang / kra shis dang / khri stan bzang po dang / me long dang / rnga yas
119b2(1): dang / sna rung ba dang / pu dro lA ga dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rnga dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / gang+gA gu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rnam gdung 'khodod dang / mo thub dang / nam 'byung 'drang can dang / me tog babang po dang / dang / 
119b3(1): thams gyi ni dang / 'khor lo'i rgyas kyi seng ge ste/ rimamo mtshon pa brgyad bcu po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs ma chis la byung ngo // 'jam dpa la mi mdzimatshon pa brgyad bcur gtogs pa'i ba don pas
119b4(1): kyi zung thog sa yin pa pa bdan mas kyi thung ba de nyid bya 'khrag ldan 'brum phrag du mang bskur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul skyes su zer po'i 'a na ga cig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du skyes pa'i mtshan gsum bcum gnyi

120a1(1): de'i sgra skad de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum bcu cha gnyis po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lathung ngo // 'jam dpal skul skyes bu chen po'i mnan gsum bcum gnyis su gtogs pa'i bsod nas/ 
120a2(1): kyi phung po gadra ba/ bsod rnams phung po de nyid blangs byed par bsgyur pa dang /  kyis kyi rgyan pa ba sna pa dang / dpag tu byed par baspyad pa dang / brjod du sted par bsdud pa dang / bdod myer pa'i
120a3(1): tu byed par bstan pa/ de bzhin gzhigs pa'i chos kyi chung 'grum bsgyu bya'i thams pa seMng rdzogs pa byed par ro// des gdus bya'i dbang kyi shems pa l+ri kyi
120a4(1): chad byed grangs myed pa gsung smras ge zang ba do// gsung sbras dri/  la bzhin du 'ong tus kyang de bzhin no// rdzus kyang de banan no// 'jam dang la de skar bsod nams chen po de ni shes rab chen pa de ni gis rab chen pa/

121a1(1): gshegs pa rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bke' a \u0f7f lad nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag

121a4(1): rgya gar skad du ma r+ya sa man+da ra pra ti bi d+hi lag dzo ba ne ya krAn ta na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ 9/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nas la kha'i mngo/ 
121a5(1): gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa'i zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sang du rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'itshom kya 'di skad bdag gis phos pa'i dus cig nag bcom ldan 'das byed pacan
121a6(1): na rnyog pa sel pa zhes bya ba'i byed can gyi grong khyer rdal du snang ba 'phel zhes bya ba'i ri la/ drang srong rta rlung zhes bya ba dka' thub la gnas pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phye dang bcu gsum dang dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub
121a7(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la chags pa myed pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sprusad pa tshad myed pa'i byams pa chen po byin gyis rlabs kyis stobs rjes su thob pa sa tshad myed pa'i snying rje chen pos
121a8(1): sems can gyi du bo kun tu rang bar rnam par spru pa rad byed pa'i dga' ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can thams cad bde ba'i dra ba'i chang rab tu 'bab pas kun tu dobs pa chad byed pa'i btang snyoms kyi ye shes kyis chos sa
121a9(1): bdan ma mkha' mnyam par 'jug pas ma'as pa chos kyi spri dang ldag ma'ong dang / rig pa dang ye shes kyi thos kyis ma rige pa'i mu pa'i mud pa chen po rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa bsdu ba rnam pa nas sems can rnams su 'a na/ 
121b1(1): stsu dang semasacan sas mazungs par bems pa byed bas padang/  thob byed pa na kyi ga sa kyi nga du smra
121b2(1): ba/ 'jig rten gyi mchog ni lam yang dag bar stonod pa sems can pa mo rnams pa dge ba'i chabs yongs su sbyin pa/ srid pa'i musgras zhing ye shes kyisas kyis pa' pa rab tu 'dug pa mngon pa shes pa cin po ye shes ma
121b3(1): bar ze ba mngon par shes pa thA ba sta bug/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mtshungs par shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par mgu pa'i phyir 'bas la 'khas pa 'phes pa yang dag pa gond pa nam mkha' dang rdungs pa'i khrus
121b4(1): kyis rang myed pa'i snod chos rin po ces yongs su bgang zhing byang chub sems dpa na spyod pa'i phyir skye po'i mas pa kyis nye b.ramachog/ 'phagos pa'i bden pa bzhis gang pa'i thugs chen pos chos kyi chub kyi malab po rje
121b5(1): zhugs pa'i chos kyis gzhan gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/ bstasnang pa brgya stong grangs skyed pa'i mthar byang chub sems dpa'i khyod pa'i thug pa skyed cing rgyun ma bcad pa'i yon tan thams cad byung ba/ drung dang batshungs par
121b6(1): chos kyis gzhan gyi nom pa thams cad 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyis legos pa myed pa pag chags thams cad kyi rjes su 'brel pa nyon mongs pa rab tu 'angs pa/ chad byed pa grangs byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin tham
121b7(1): dang gzul dang gzod pa pa rnam par che bas mkhas paganas 'dis ste/ byang chub sem sa dpa' dang / glang po kyidapa zhis bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' jis can tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / 
121b8(1): chub sem sa dpang drang sdig se ge'i zla 'byid ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpang no gyi 'ad rgya tshogs zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri sa ma ma shes bya ba nga/ byang chub zems rab smra sa
122a1(1): kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtogs pa 'dod ma bu po ce zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la de las thogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong brag bcu dang / thun bya / 
122a2(1): pa'i drang srod ta drung dang / drang srong stong brag pasum bcu dang / rna ldan brgya stong brag bco brgyad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa yo ngas su bskod nas ldan cig tu 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu rje/ 
122a3(1): ba legs par 'ongs pa la bka' saHla da pa/ legs par 'ongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams pa de la bdag 'dug ste/ nyan thos rnams la nyan thos kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
122a4(1): 'das de bzhin no zhes gsoyod pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs par phyir da nyand te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir pho brang bzlum po byas par gyur/ to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang
122a5(1): ldan pas rnam khar kun tu bltas te pho brang zlum par bshams pa nyid du ba zhugs te/ de nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang stan da las/ langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan
122a6(1): 'das gar ba de logs bu bal mo spyad te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsoyod to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'jig rten zhes bgyib/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'a
122a7(1): 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas brtags pa ni ji lta bu lags/ de skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bkra
122a8(1): mamad to// dge slong dag 'jig rten 'jig rten zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas brtags bcam zhes dge slong khyod de 'ang 'dri 'am/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no// de'i
122a9(1): phyir dge slong rgya legs par nyon ma gnid du zug shigi dang bshad do// btsun 'de bzhin na zhes gsosong to// dge slong de bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' ma yang
122a10(1): to// dge slong 'jig rten 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten nam gnyid te/ snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong de la snod kyi 'jig rten ni gang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ni ga bzhed
122b1(1): mchi'ams dang / rgyu'i lasus dang / me'i 'ams dang / rlung ni 'ams dang / sim pa ni spyo ces bya'o// dge slong de la na gis 'i mas med de/ dge slong des na shrIsa'i lasas dang zhen pa
122b2(1): gi sra ba'i sra ba nyid band pa ni 'di lta ste nus pa dang sen mo dang / sa'i bang du ste/ 'di dag ni ningagi sa'i 'ams zhes bya'o// des bya'i lad kyis gang nen/ dang lus kyi phyiro ba kyisa'i khams ni 'di
122b3(1): 'grom bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be du sh+ya dang / dung dang / rdo dang / byi n+ya dang / dngul dang / sa le snum dang / gram bu dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mdang / shing dang d+ha dang / sman dang h+yan
122b4(1): dang dang / 'di dag ni phyi ro yod kyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o// chu'i 'ams gang zhen phyi'i lad gyi chu'i khams kyang yod/ nang gi chu'i khams kyang yod de/ de la nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di sa chu dang chu'i 'jas

122b6(1): me ba kun tu mind pa 'di ni nanga'i chu'i khams zhes bya'o// des ge bye bang kyi bu'i 'ams gang zhen/ ga sus kyi bu ro 'o rkyena'i ma ni dzi ste/ chung 'gas kyi smras
122b7(1): dang / tsam dang / zho dang dang bdang / bru ma shing gi ro dang / chang dang / pa mo dang / buras chang dang / me tog ging dang / pus kyibya'i da kyi cu'i 'ams tsam bkun tu le nad pa 'don kyi mang

122b10(1): mas gdung ba dang / nor bu'i gdung ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / nib dang phra'i'adro ba dang / skye ba'i dro ba dang / byab dang dro ma dang / 'di dag ni phyi mo kyi me'i 'ams zhis bya'o// des ning gi spang na
123a1(1): !/ gang zhe na/ gang lus 'di la kye nang du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / thur du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / ma zhu ba'i rlung dang / mchis pa'i rlung dang / yan lag dang nyi lag dung gyu rad pa'i drung dang / 'di dag ni nang rlung rnam
123a2(1): shes bya'o// de la phyi rold kyi rlung gang zhe na/ gang phyi rold du yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / gyen du rgyu la dang / grang ba dang / dro ba'i mu rlung phyed po dang / sa 'dzind rlung dang / phyi rold
123a3(1): kyi rlung gi khams gang yang rung ba 'di ni phyi rol kyi rlung gi khams shes bya ste/ de ltar phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di ni snod kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// 'di gang gi snod ce na nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga'i snod
123a4(1): do// dge slong phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la/ gang mos pa 'am/ dga' ba 'am/ byams pa 'am/ chags pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ nga yir bya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o

123a6(1): 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de thams cad de bzhin du so sor bslab parabya'o// gang la la 'byung ba bzhi po de dag ni bdag gi ma yinas/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de yang bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang
123a7(1): dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// dge slong dag dge slong gapal la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis shinang tu brtand par byed do// shi na tu yid la byas pa'i

124b1(1): rnam rnams cad ni yig byed pa'o// glo nang pa byed pa'o// spros thams cad ni skye ba byed pa'o/ rnyerje pa'o chos thams nad mi thob pa'o// cig byed 'jug 'o// mos thams cad ni rtog pa dang spar 'a'o

124b7(1): ba dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni shi nad tu bsam gtan dang ldan pa / g.yo' ba dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni shi nad tu sgrib pa myed pa'o// shi na tu bral pa'o// chos thams cad ni/ 1nga? tra
124b8(1): nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o// stobs chung ba'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang ldan pa'o// thob pa myed pa'o// chos thams cad ni dbyangs dang bral ba'o// gzung du myed pa'o// chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
124b9(1): sdug pa'o// shes pa myed pa'o// chos thams cad ni tshor ba chags pa myed pa'o// smyig smra ba lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni 'du shes dang bral ba'o// brag cha lta bu'o/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid myed pa'o// gzugs
124b10(1): brnyan lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni rab tu snang ba'i 'od rnams par dag pa chu zla lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan dang bral ba'o// gzugs brnyan la rten pa'o// chos thams cad ni sprin myi dmyigs pa'o/ 
124b11(1): nam mkha' mnyam pa'o// ro sa mas cad ni gzugs brtan no// bstan du byed pa'o// dngos po skyed pa'o// dngos po dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid skyed pa nam mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mnyam
125a1(1): pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang mtshan nyid myed pa'i bar du'o// chos thams cad ni bdag myed pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag tu myi dmyigs pa'o// ngar sems pa myed pa'i rten byed
125a2(1): kA brjod du byed pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi ge myed pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma zad pa dang bral ba'o// zhes nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa myed par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa myed
125a3(1): kha spros pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di sa rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de'i dbang gis bzod pa bsgom pa na yang dag par spyod pa na tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba thob bo// 
125a4(1): bzod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skad cig ma cig dang yang dag par ldan pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shi nad tu phra ba rnyed las lhag par lus yongs su sprul to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shind
125a5(1): bu phra ba rnyed kyi phyogs bcu stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyadas kyi zhing du song ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang nus shin tu phra ba ste/ na gyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char gtong ba ni 'dis de/ zas kyi char
125a6(1): ram/ sbom gyi char rab/ gos sam sdu bsrung gyidri'am me tog nam/ rin po che sna tshogs kyang rab tu 'bab po// gang sems can zas dang skom de yongs su zos pas zang zing myed pa'i#
125a7(1): dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa'i sems can de/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ rna ba sdug bsngal ba bdag myed pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyi bcings pa thams cad dang 'drod pa'i yon tan

125a9(1): po de dag la myi bzad par mos shing brtson 'grus brtsol ba pa spro bar byed do// nye bar yi nad pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag myed par
125a10(1): yid la byed pa'o// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos nas rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i bar du yongs su spyod par byed do// de shes pas zang zing myed pa/ 
125b1(1): na gsu ga na sa sa das da byas sa sa pa / pa mam sa sa pam
125b2(1): dga' ba dang / bde' ba thob pa nas tshangs pa dang 'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar de bzhin du gang yang dag par pyod pa'i tshulanam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di
125b3(1): dag thob pa de sbyin pas me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba'i me tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ning rtul shin tu pra ba rnyed kyi gong pa dang rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis song ba'i me tog re re yang

125b5(1): ste chos thams cad dbyangs myed pa'o// bdud bzhi'i yul las 'da' ba'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lam mo// gnas yang dag par spong ba'o// yi ge myed pa'o// chos thams cad ni chags pa

125b9(1): bar du'o// rab tu zhi ba'o// myi snang ba thob pa'o// myi gnas pa'o// shi nad tu yul myed pa'o// shi nad tu cha ba myed pa'o// shi nang tu rang bzhin myed pa'o// gnyen po myed pa'o// kha zas myed pa'o// shi nang tu 'thor

126a4(1): grangs byed pa'i chos kyi ste mye tog de dag pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de yang chos kyi sgo de thos nas zang zing byed pa'o dga' ba dang bde 'a thob pa/ de'adu byed pa mas pad mi myi rtag pa/ zug
126a5(1): bsngal pa bdag byed pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrim/ khob bo// khyim bdag bcings pa thams cad dang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs te byung nam ri'i tshul dang / khye byed pa gang

126a8(1): lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// nye bar la nad pa'i phung po lnga la byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa bsgom pa de na/ myig myi dmyigs/ sems can myi dmyigs/ srog kyi
126a9(1): dmyigs/ rtogs pa myi dmyigs/ gang zag myi dmyigs/ gzugs myi dmyigs/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'ang ma yin/ myig myi dmyigs/ rna ba ma yin/ 
126b1(1): bla ma yin/ lce'angam yid/ lus kyang myi dmyigs/ yid kyang myi dmyigs so// gzugs myi dmyigs/ sgra myi dbyigs/ dri ni dbyigs/ ro byi dbyigs/ reg tu myi dmyigs/ chos phyir byin pa
126b2(1): myi dmyigs/ lus myi dmyigs/ tshig myi dmyigs/ sems myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid myi sa rtogs pa mtshan ma myed pa/ khams gsum gtong ba myed pa/ mngon par 'du myi byed pa/ ma skyes pa ma bsgo/ 
126b3(1): pa ma byung ba'i bzod pa 'di basmos so// ma byas pa bya ba myed pa de sngon gyi mtha' la byar myed pa/ phyi ma nya'i mtha' la 'das pa myed/ dbus kyi mtha' la yang dag par myed pa/ myi gnas pa myi dmyigs pa yid la myi byed pa'i
126b4(1): bzod pa bsgom pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mu dog gis 'dug pa zhes bya ba'i bzod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa 'di thob pas ji ltar bur gong du
126b5(1): bshad pa'i cha lad 'di 'dra ba bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub semasangs dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa 'di baha nad pa brjod pa na/ byad chub sems dpa' rnam par myi rtog pa zhes bya bas legs so zhes bya ba
126b6(1): byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag cang myi smra b.ragyur da nas bcom ldan 'das cang myi gsung bas zhal byisab zhes par gyur pa dang / de nas dge slong drug bcu tsam 'di snyam du sems
126b7(1): te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam par 'jig pa cis bsams te rnam par 'di lta bu'i sprub 'dra ba'i 'du byed thams cad ston / zhal te gzugs bdag myed pa'i phyi snang ba kun nas ldang ba myed pa yid la kyi byed pa myi rtog pa / 
126b8(1): rnam par gyi rtog pa/ dmyigs pa myed pa rgyu ba myed pa 'as/ 'od kyang 'di la ci sems can srog gam/ skye ba 'am/ ga so'o ga'am/ gang zag gas/ shed las skyes pa 'am/ shed can nam/ byed pa po 'am
126b9(1): tshor ba po 'am/ tshor gzhan nam/ skye ba 'am/ yang dag par skye ba 'am/ gang myi rga ba dang / myi 'byung ba myed par 'gyur ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang du byung / snying rje chen po na gang na/ chos 'chad pa ni su
126b10(1): zhig/ chos tu shes pa ni gang nig/ bslab pa sdog pa ni ga ngan gnas/ ga te lung por bya 'azlar da de ltar 'ams dang skye sa med nams kyang dag pa rnams kyi chos kyi 'bras sun pa par sbyin par gyi babyung na/ yin
127a1(1): bar byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni gang tu sbyind/ de bzhin// shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang tu byung / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / 
127a2(1): lnga dang byi rnams dang gang zhig sems can gyi lus skye mched drug gis bzung ba ni gang du byung // bdag ni bstan las langs te 'gro bar bya snyam so// de nas dge slong drug bcu tsam stan la ma langs te dong nas/ dge slo
127a3(1): gzhan dag kyang cang myi smra bar gyurd pa dang de nas nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa/ bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing myi spobs pa dang gnod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' la ka na mar
127a4(1): me la 'khodang de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces smras so// don gyi dbang gang mthong ba na 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang
127a5(1): dag par ston / rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo' sde gzhan la gang zag lnga rnams la chos kyi ka ta ma ngan pa dang / dad pa'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'ardungs pa la gtong ba'i gtam dang
127a6(1): gtam ngan pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / le lo la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'chalang pa'i shes rab la shes rab kyi gtam dang
127a7(1): katam ngan pa to// zhes 'di ltar gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo'i sde gzhan la ldan pa mtshams myed par byed pa rnams la stong pa'i gtam myi smra bar bya'o// ldog par lta ba'i lus
127a8(1): rnams la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa myi smra bar bya'o// rkam pa rnams sa tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa myi smra bar bya'o// nga rgyal dang dri gras pa dang kha zas pa chags pa rnams la sems dran pa nye bar
127a9(1): bzhag pa myi smra bar bya'o// ngo tsha ba'i chos kyi rtsa spong ba rnams la chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa myi smra bar bya'o// myi thob par 'dod pa rnams la lngar skye ba'i smon myi smra bar bya'o// 'dod pa khyod pa'i sngar
127a10(1): skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mdangs 'phrogs pa'i gnod sbyin du skye ba'i yon tan myi smra bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod pa'i lngar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa'i pyod pa'i lha dang dpal myi smra bar bya'o// 
127b1(1): gzugs myed pa'i khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams gzugs la pyod pa'i yon tan gyi smra bar bya'o// gzugs la pyod pa'i lngar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa pyod pa'i lha'i bden pa myi smra bar bya'o// 
127b2(1): nyan thos kyi reg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan myi smra bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la nyan thos kyi yon tan myi smra bar bya'o// theg
127b3(1): pa chen po la/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnams pa sangs rgyas kyi yon myi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par brtson pa bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi'i myi smra bar bya'o// byang chub
127b4(1): sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i myi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor du smra ba myed pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong
127b5(1): bad kyi tam spa' bya'i/ nyan tho ba dang dang bangs rgyas kyi thes pa pa'i 'a'od dums 'di lta bu'i smra ba dang bcas pa'i madrung tu ma drangs par myong pa'i dus nam mthas mdog gi 'drul pa'i bzod pa dag/

127b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me la legs zhes bya ba 'i tshig gis spro ba yang dag par bskyed do// legs so legasaso shes rab che// rnam par shes pas thabs mchog gcod/ 
127b8(1): mtshan nyid thabs dang chos rnams kyi// dus ni khyod kyis rab tu shes// 'khor da rnams shes pa ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i tshul du nyond pa byed// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa pa/ dza/ chos 'di brjod par myi byed
