127b10(1): ba myed cing gzungs myed pa/ shes rab pha rold phyi nang spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid myed/ bsasad pa grangs myed pa dag gi// 'das pa'i rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni// smra ba myed pa'i
128a1(1): byang chub sems dpa' ba // na ta rgya ma tshom par byed pa/ nang bskrun pa'i 'dun no// chom 'dis na satu du/ thas nam na na mas dgags
128a2(1): chos 'di rab tu bstand pas na// de nyid 'chang rgyar myi 'gyur ro// myi shes pas ni spros pa dang // mos pa myed par bskyed pas na// bsod nams mang po 'byung byed cing // ngan 'gror yang ni myur tu 'gro// ting 'dzid
128a3(1): bzod pa'i gzungs kyis na/ gal te de sus dbang byas te/ byang chubalams brtson par bya// phyir la la thabs dang bral bya// dkor nang gang zag rnams kyis kyang // sems kyis rtog par myi byed do// 'chas
128a4(1): pa'i shes rab sdod sbyin la/ stong pa'i zhi ba smra bar byed// de yang myurang tu spangs pas na// mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa dag/ gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcu la// myur du yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// dmyal/ 
128a5(1): pas dgas byob song du/  ma yin dang sum grub 'o// gnosbyin srin go tum po yang / yang dang yang ni di skye'o// byi dang byed thob padan// ga ge bang po ba dpang // snang pa gdos pa rnams/ 
128a6(1): dang ni// 'on pa long ba zhar ba dang // rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba// bskur pa 'debs shing mchod pa myed// zas dang skom dang bral ba ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur // pa dang ma la bkur bsti byed// nyes par spyad
128a7(1): brtag tu rtsod// sems can rnams sa nying byed// ngad 'gror yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ 'di ni rab tu gso ba yi// dge slong drug bcun sa 'di dag/ yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba// ngan 'gror yang na gyur tu 'a'o// sum dad
128a8(1): byas pa'i sems can 'di// gang gis bzod pa 'di bstand cing // 'bas la mngon gsum ma yin pa// des ni dge slong de song ngo // ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang // pha rol sems la lta ba'i phyir// 'jig rten pa ni sgron 'dzin pa/ 
128a9(1): sems can kun la phan par smra/ thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa// 2/ thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la// ci 'drar 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams la// de 'dra bar ni chos bshad do// de nas byang chub sems
128b1(1): dpar ban na rin po ches 'di ska ces sna pa/ rigs kyi bu nyad thos kyim bcom ldan 'das kyi sring de'i thibagasas ste/ nyan thos 'dru ba'i phyir smra bar 'byung ngo // zhes bdag nis yongs su shes par 'gyu ro// 
128b2(1): rigs kyi bu yang 'dis sngon ma thim pa yang dag par spyod pa'i rgyas nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan pan/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji sa bung bdags thugs rtse ba'i slad du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam ma
128b3(1): mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis dmyigs pa sbyor ba rgya chen pos bshad par bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing / bdag dang sems can gzhan sa yang thugs rtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur shAH/ 
128b4(1): so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la bab pa shes/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me stan las langs te/ 
128b5(1): bla gos phrag pa cig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs sung bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dka'
128b6(1): sana'o// le shes nyams pa'i 'grol smon pa 'did/ dang ngas khyod dang bar mdang // dus dang bras da 'di stod// rgyal ba nyis 'drim par me yadang / sems san/ #
128b7(1): ma la ni snang mdzad pa// lam rnams rab ston da la ni khyod ston pa// mchog gi chos kyi sgo 'di bstand par mdzad// nam mkha'i rang bzhi ni yongs su dag pa'i// thugs dam myi g.yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin
128b8(1): thub pa 'jig rten zla ba 'od 'dra ba// rgyal mdog bzod pa'i dka' ba 'di yang stond// snying rje gnas shing 'gro la mdzod mdzad pa// khyod kyi mchog shes pa ni mchog tu che// rga 'chi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa// brjod
128b9(1): tshan ni man tan 'di yang brtsod// grub pa seng she mu stegs 'jig par mad//  ba dga' mdza gal 'a ga nad/ mu stegs can gyi 'khor sangs nam 'dzig pa// ma me'i 'ayod pa 'di yang ba
128b10(1): bar mdzad/ rnas dang mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs// bde dang sdug bsngal reg sa khro myi mdzad// mthon po ma yin da sngar ma po byin pa// yongs su phyin la gzigs te bzod pa 'di yang gsungs// ye
129a1(1): ga se mchog gis pa'i ngargyal nis// rlung longs lta bu'i nyon mongs dag yang gtod// des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa// sem gyi me yis srid pa'i chu yang skams// khyod kyis k+ta bskyegs/ 
129a2(1): sred chu tshig/ klu lta bu ni chos kyi char gtong ba/ des ni 'khor 'di dka' bar 'gyur ba ste// yongs su smin la gzigs shing bzod 'di gsungs// sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan bskyed/ bzod pa
129a3(1): mchog gi yon tan 'di bstand cing // / gang gi bsam pa dri myed bzod 'gyur ba// de thob pa'i yon tan 'di mtha' yas// spyod yul nam mkha' mdog 'dul ba'i// thub pas 'das pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang // 
129a4(1): thugs rjer dgongs khyod bzod pa 'di yang gsungs/ bcom ldan 'dam kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin rten seg nas cad kyi gsung bas zhal gyis pa zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyidi snyam du dgongs te/ 
129a5(1): sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/ rgyas de gang na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mngon/ dgis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par dgongs so snyam/ lnga dran
129a6(1): kyi na pas kyi na 'ang ba'i 'on pa dag par rdzogs pa'i kyis bdod pa 'di bstan/ shis bu thos kyi 'du rjon gyi pa dag pa rdzanas pa'i sas rgyas kyi
129a7(1): rdzogs pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gi spu 'dul ba'i bzod pa bshad par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das byeng dag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jug go// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skad bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par
129a8(1): zhugs nas ting nge 'dzind des bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi rtul zhugs dang / spyod lam dang mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ste/ drang srong de yang rgan po dang / rgas bya dang 'khogs pa dang / kA Ni sme ring po ral pa chang ba dang
129a9(1): mag chos ring po dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba dang / gtsang ma 'dzind me'i sbyin bsregs chen po 'bang ba byed do// de las kyang 'od kyi phung po kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / kha dog rgya stong du ma dang / 
129a10(1): kha dog rgya chen po shi nad tu yongs su dag pa dri ma myed pa 'od 'byung ngo // de'i 'od snang bas phyogs bcu'i stong pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu myed pa'i skar ba dang rin po che dang / glog dang 'od dang lnga dang / klu dang / 
129b1(1): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin gyi 'od kyang myi mngon myi snang ngo // sems can dmyal ba dang byos so ba dang yi dgas kyi lta ba dang myi mngon gyi snang ngo // de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams kyi sgra dang brjod pa dang
129b2(1): dbyangs dang tshig dang yi ge dang chung ngu na sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi sgra yang myi grag go// de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis nga mtha' yas pa mu myed pa na/ sems can gang sa la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de
129b3(1): thams cad drang srong gi rtul shugs dang lus dang mtshan ma dang dbyibs kun tu snang ngo// yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par nyan thos sam/ rang rgyas ba'i theg pa pa ni kun tu myi snang ngo // 
129b4(1): yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa yang myi mthong ngo // de'i tshe na gang yang nyan thos 'khod der 'dug pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa myi mthong zhing de byang chub sems
129b5(1): dpa' bang ba dag brang kyim cing do// gang ya la 'alus pa 'am pa/ rdzus pa/ zha thung du sra gad gzugs snang ba pang sa dag su phyis mchong/ snang brgyatshor pos de ge rten byabams cad
129b6(1): khyab par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ kun shes ke'u di na la spras pa/ gnas gtan ke'u di na bcom/ ldan 'das gang na/ ke'u di nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar
129b7(1): gang na zhes bya ba de ni myi shes so// myi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ 'od srung chen po sa la smras pa/ sbyangs pa smra ba'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod/ mchog tu bstan dan bcom ldan 'das da ltar
129b8(1): gang ba som shig/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba myi shes so// myi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ gnas gtan sha ri'i bu
129b9(1): shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das ga nab som shig/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ me dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' myed pas bcom ldan 'das da ltar gangan zhes
129b10(1): bya ba myi shes so// myi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des me'u 'gal ya na la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal ya na rdzu 'phrus dang ldan pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan de na/ bcom
130a1(1): ldan 'das da kar gangan som shig/ me'u nyags ya nas spras pa/ gang gi tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos spras pa de nyid ra bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ 
130a2(1): rjes su shes kyibacom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhud ces bya ba ni myi mthong rje// myi shes so// de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa pa 'gags pa la spras pa/ lnga'i myig gi nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod
130a3(1): kyang mchog tu bstan dan/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang tu bzhud gang na gnas pyod ni ci 'dra/ ci 'dra bar spyod/ khyod kyi sna'i myig gis ltom// ma 'gags pas spras pa/ kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi phyig gis
130a4(1): mag+ha yas pa su myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par bltas nadabacom ldan 'das dkar gaban bzhugs gang tu bzhud ces bya ba bdas kyang byi shes so// myi mthong ngo // des smras pa yang ba dad par
130a5(1): shes pa thob pa'i nyan pos kyi ye shes gang la seng kyi 'dug no//  bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de la ni 'dunano// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang tu bzhud dgang na
130a6(1): bzhums/ shes byang chub sems dpa' 'dri snyam pa dang / de nas nyan lo mo chen po des byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yang dag par rjes suM myi mtho ngo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang / 
130a7(1): ldan pa 'di sa byigs kyi sku gzhan zhig gis phung por bshad par byas pa des ni dge slong drug bcu ma po// bstan las sangs de pas medang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das thugs kyi dgyes nas/ ta na thas shing 'ag
130a8(1): sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rigs kyi bu dang thabs cig tu byed do// bdag cag ni rang rang gi phyi lu por zhugs shing bsam gtan bya snyas ste/ de nas nyan thos chen po de rang dang ni phyin thong zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do// de nas de'i tshe ris
130a9(1): dus da phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed grangs myed pa na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can de bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na/ gang drang srong las
130a10(1): gning du khyan par dru ba gas pa de bdag cag gi mkhan por babyung ngo zhes bdag caganas gar ga bar bya'o snyam pa de thams cad rtog phran med pa zhes bya ba byed pa can ci gro rdzal na/ drang srong chen logag kya thub sa gas pa 'jogs pa gdun rlom
130b1(1): rnams me tog dang 'bras bu dang sman dang zas dang / skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mye la gtor ba thag myi ring bar myi mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong chen po 'di nus pa chen por mthu' chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo // 
130b2(1): drang srong chen po gang na ba de logs su nye bar 'gro zhing dang srong gi rtul zhugs dang spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du nye bar dong ngo // 
130b3(1): den byang chub sem pa dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa dang / gzungs dbang du byas pa de sems me gcig pa'i stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson pa de nyid kyitshe/ kyi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
130b4(1): 'dir lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ji dang / lho phye chen po dang / myi dang phyi ma yin pa la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ drang srong shag tu
130b5(1): thub pa'i thad du nye bar dong ngo // 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bur spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas de na yang dag par zhugs nga ba'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di ston pa'i phyir/ 
130b6(1): chos can gyi 'khor lo gnyis la yang 'jug par bzhed pa'i/ bcom ldan / 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so// bdag cag ni bcomaldan 'das kyi phyir lam brgyand pa sbyang bar bya zhing lam des drang srong gi
130b7(1): mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la nye bar 'gro bar bya'o// snyam he/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang / rgya mtsho dang nor mdog dang / 'jog po dang yid yod las sogs pa klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag drug bcu tsam
130b8(1): dang ldan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis lnga rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang / dngul dang bai dUr+ya dang shel dang / byi ru dang a sma gar ba dang / mu sa la gar ba dang / las sogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i 'phreng ba/ gser gyi shing la dngul
130b9(1): gyi lo ma dang / mye tog dang 'bras bu dngul gyi shing la gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu nas mu sa la gar ba'i shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi so ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgyand par 'khru lar to// shin
130b10(1): ta la'i 'phreng ba de la lha rdzas kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnams du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo // lha'i de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dka' thub kyi gnas nas spos dang ldang ba'i ri'i bar du lam gyi zheng dpag tshad bcu
131a1(1): ba spyangs so// lam gyi mu gas gnyis su lnga rdzas kyi gser nas mu su sa gar ba'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs pur sprular to// shing gser gyi shing ta la la t+pal gyi snying po srung ba nas mus la gas pa'i/ 
131a2(1): kA bar du smra bar bya'o// 'og logs su be du r+ya bzang po nas gong logs gi gnas su shel gyi bar du rgya chen pos smra bar bya'o// sprin gyi lha'i bu'i drang srong gi cha byad kyis las kyi mu gnyis su rnyog po myed pa rin po che sna bdun gyi tham/ 
131a3(1): skas can gyis rdzing de dag la gser gyi bye ma rdal pa/ rdzing de dag la yang lha rdzas kyi ud pa la dang pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka dang / a tig mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / mu tsu kun dang / man 'dzu sha
131a4(1): ka dang / ba ta li dang / ba ri shi ka 'gan d+ha nu pa ska ri dang / u ma dang / a ma mra dang 'dzam bu dang / mI na la dang / mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par sru lad to// sa zla gnam gyi gnod drang srong gi
131a5(1): cha byad kyis lam spyod par byed do// gzhan 'phrul gyi dbang byed kyi lha'i bu yang drang srong gyi cha byad kyis lam gyi mu gnyis la lnga rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mchog pachog 'dzind to// rgyal mtshan
131a6(1): na gyi mchog de dag la sA rdzas kyi gos dang drug dang / rgyanang rab tu 'phu 'o// 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu yang drang srong gis byad kyis lnga rjes drin po ma sna bdun gyi 'ang brtseg ma mngon par sdud to// yang
131a7(1): theg ma de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyis so// khang bu theg ma de la yang lha rdzas kyi du sha sna tshogs dang / gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / mngon par rab tu 'phreng ngo // mye tog snga rdzogs kyis kun tu
131a8(1): gton to// ngan rtson pades mardzas kyi nyis rgyachen no ma du 'o ba cwa chogs 'drang po// sangs rgya kyi rgyur byi mo stos b+ha dang cu'i zla bsngags pa des stong gsus byig chen po'i dri rted kyi mam 'di thams pa smras
131a9(1): bar gyur to// bu'i du mo tu dang brag drug su rtsa brgyad pa ma mdzes pas da bcom ldan 'das la mnod pa nisas kyi phyir drung rmong gi rkye du thams cad kyis brgyad nas rin po kyi tshogs kyi ra baba'o// ras padar gyi ga'i bu brgya / 
131a10(1): dug sang drang srong gicha byad kyis 'di lta ste/ snga rdzas kyi me tog man dang ba dang / smyan dar chen po dang / tsam pa ka dang / ba rim d+ha dang / 'dze shug chen po dang / ro tsa dang / cho cog chen po dang / bal la dang / khal la chen po dang / bkra sa
131b1(1): das tha chen po dang / 'od drim byed pa dang / 'dabs brgya pa 'dab ma stong pa/ kun nas kun nas dri/ kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri/ rtag tu me nyen thod sdang nga/ 'dog ma pa byed pa/ blta bar 'os pa/ byig gis mngon par dag ba ma
131b2(1): ba d+ma tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa'i las kyi phyi pa sa de mdzes par byas so// char ba'i sprin gyi sna'i zla brgya spyong dus dag kyang drang srong gis byad kyis chus pa skyes pa dang bang las skyes pa'i cha tu
131b3(1): 'bab bo// b+hu glang po brgya stong du maM yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis yang dag par gnas shing 'di lta ste/ mu tig sngon po'i cher dang / ko shir sha'i snying po'i las sogs te char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo// gang la la stong gsum gyi stong
131b4(1): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lnga 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ji dang
131b5(1): lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang sha za dang / grul bum dang / grul bum/ da kyi dbang po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng
131b6(1): ba sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / drug pa sna tshogs dang / rob mo ng+genyal ba sna tshogs dang / brdung ba dang / sku sna tshogs yongs su bzung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan gyi 'dus pa'i zhas sa rnam par nga/ 
131b7(1): mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de dag thams cad drang srong gis byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i lam kyi phyir rol mo brdung ba dang / bkrol ba dang / gru yongs su bzung ste/ dmar po dab dkar po dang / leb rgam
131b8(1): dang shel gi kha dog gis gos kyi char khad kyis rab tu bab bo// phyi 'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyi phyir brtson no// tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang
131b9(1): srong kyi cha byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed cing / myi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang bstod cing phyag 'tshal pa/ dri za'i dbang po du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rab tu gsal ba'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par blta'o// 
132a1(1): klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'bebs so// snga ma yin gyi dbang po du ma yang drang srong gi ma byad kyis phyogs bzhir rlung mchog
132a2(1): kA ka 'jam pas kun tu reg pas mchog tu dri zhim pa mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma dbang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi gdugs 'dzind to// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang
132a3(1): srong rgan por gyu rang nas gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzind cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du blta'o// thul bum brgya stong du ma 'ang drang srong
132a4(1): po'i cha byad kyis gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs chang zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du blta'o// nam mkha' lding ni dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong / gi
132a5(1): cha byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil du gser gyi 'phreng ba 'phyang bar gyur/ to// lnga'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog gi mu bo'i chang chen po mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// sru'i bu 'o 1ny+tsaH
132a6(1): brgya stong du ma yang drang srong kir byad kyis mu tig dmang po'i chang mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang slong gi sa byad kyis mu tig dkar po'i cher mngon par rab tu
132a7(1): 'bebs so// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo btu stong du ma yang drang srong gis byud kyis can dan gyi bye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// rnam yin/ gyi bu mo brgya stong du lnga yang drang srong gi sa byad kyis brgyad kyir

132a9(1): byad kyis nam mkha'i dkyil brgya nad par byed do// ba'i gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gis byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do// par snang gyi gnod sbyin brgya stong du ya yang drang srong gi ma byad kyis nam mkha'
132a10(1): la brgya na to// brgya stong du ma drang srong gi cha byad kyis sprang lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byind par 'jug go// drang srong lnga brgya stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i rtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dang drang srong stong
132b1(1): phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dag lnga rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba chen po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir rnyog pa skyes pa nas spos kyi rang ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams
132b2(1): spyo rang ba rab tu 'byind no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis me tog gi snying po kund tu gnond par 'gyur ro// lnga'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mye tog gi chu bo char mngon par/ 
132b3(1): rab tu 'bebs so// dri za bye ba khrag khrag brgya stong du ma yang drang srong kis rol mo dkrol bas drang srong thub pa'i sku la 'od zer bye ba brgya stong byung ngo // de nas lha yon tan can zhes bya ba spos kyi ngang ldang ba'i ri la gnas pa
132b4(1): phran brgya stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byadadza kyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar da te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'grin cig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di
132b5(1): dag gis mngon par bstod do// sems can myi srun grol byedarkang gnyis mchog/ mnyes dka' rgyal ba gzugs ngan 'dren mdzad cing // sdug bsngal gzir lel bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa/ 
132b6(1): phyab pa gang gnyis dam pa 'dir gshegs gas med// sred 'ab langs rnam par da na phul sonod cing / 'grol dus gsum da le shes kyis// bslangs pa gsum stonang dri ma gsum sngas
132b7(1): khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsomed// 'gro la phyind ci log bzhi rnam par 'grol// 'khor bzhi dag gi zhabs la bsnyen bkur cing // 'gro la 'phags pa'i seMn bden

132b9(1): ba lnga'i btson rab rnam par grol// dbang po drug ni gnas pa skyon myed cing // sred lus drug la shind tu rnam 'grol shes// gsum bcu rtsa drug drin ston de sems can mchog/ spos kyi ded ldang 'dir gshegs gson
132b10(1): rgyal ba mnyam bzhag rab tu dul ba'i thugs// shind bsgoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog/ ye shes sems can bye ba rab dul mdzad// kha po rab spyang spos dang ri 'dir spyod// rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab
133a1(1): snor dang // ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzod / khyod ni mun pas sgrigs la ye shes sonang // thub pa dgod pa'inanas 'dir gshegs su ga sos// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sangs rgyas byu /

133a4(1): cig lam ban pa// thub pa 'di ga shegs 'amed parab tu thod/ ldadan med ma po mag na dang// shes bdag gis yad kyi/ grasungs// 'di khyen pa ya 'dis zung ze // chos

133a6(1): pa 'am/ gang yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba 'am/ gdas la rgyu ba 'am gang chu la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po der thob po// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham 'di lag thil du
133a7(1): du skyes pa snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong ngo // myig gis gzugs la cung zad snang bar myi 'gyur ro// gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnam 'byor de dang ldan pa de yang ngo mtshar chen po zhib bo// 'di lta ste me'i rtul zhugs dang / 
133a8(1): zla ba'i tshul zhugs dang / nyi ma'i rdul zhugs can dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi rtul zhugs can dang / de las sogs pa sems can gang la la lta ba nyam nga ba rnam pa sna tshogs baM/ log pa la lta ba can de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas/ 
133a9(1): phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams su bltas so// ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyend kyis na rnam pa de lta bu'i sa g.yos pa'i 'di dang snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po'i spya rnyed na gang mye'i phung po chen po 'jug pa/ 
133b1(1): de yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul da te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang ma dag pa tshad myed pa grangs myed pa rnams su gtor to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang sangs rgyas bcom
133b2(1): ldan 'das dag bzhugs te/ mtsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar myer snang ba de mye tog man da ra ba chen por kun tu gnas par 'dug par gyur to// 'khor ci tsam pa 'dus pa dang / gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad
133b3(1): drang srong gi cha byad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chu bo gang 'ag gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/ de na rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya hrI
133b4(1): 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gyi rgyas mtshan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho'i skyong ba chos kyang stond to// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor da do las/ byang chub sems dpa'
133b5(1): sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po za shing ra ba'i dpal zhes bya de drang srong gi gzugs dang lus drang dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // gzhan yang thog pa chen po yang
133b6(1): dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gyi gzugs dang lus dang / dbyibs kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas de bzhin gshegs ba dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom
133b7(1): ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyend kyis na/ gang mye tog mer snang ba be du r+ya'i dbyig pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gyuradu/ theg pa rje na po 'di dag la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad
133b8(1): drang srong gi byad 'dzind par grub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis so// rigs kyi bu de dgra la 'di skad ces bka' mtshal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
133b9(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA kakya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dug cing rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten du 'jug pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge ston ma / 
133b10(1): 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos sond par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa ba ha nad par 'dod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma ldan pa zhes/ 
134a1(1): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par yul to// gsol dab bzod pa 'di thog ma 'am jis bu zhig/ bka' sa med pa bzod pa mu stegs can thams cad la 'jug pa'o// de ltar myi dren
134a2(1): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can chu bo bzhis khyer pa rnams las sgrol par byed pa'o// chu bo bzhi gang zhe na 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / lta ba'i chu bo dang / srid pa'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo 'di dag las sems can spros ba na
134a3(1): dad pa myi phyed pa bzhi yang dag par lend tu 'jug go 'jug par byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na sangs rgyas la dad pa myi phyed pa sems can rnams yang dag par le nad du 'jug pa 'dag par byed pa so sor 'god par byed pa'o// 
134a4(1): bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi la sems can rnams spyong par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi phung pos sems nas rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po sems can rnams lta ba'i chul po la
134a5(1): sgrol bar byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po sems can rnams/ lta ba'ichu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung pos sems canade rnams ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// rnam par grol/

134a7(1): rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// dge la 'dumed l-i dad la myi byed pas/ sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas sgro'i bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshul khrims kyis sa
134a8(1): so bams thor ba spyod par byed do// sbyi 'i sems ca nangs tsho rgyal chos sa sgo ba byed do// ga kyang sa pa rgyam chosas sbyo bar byed pado// dod bya sa sems ca nasas
134a9(1): nyon mongs pa'i rgyal mo las smos par byed pa'o// don 'thun pas sems cas rnams shes rab kyi don tu sgrol bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpal de dag gis gsosod pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la
134a10(1): myal bcu gsos / de bzhin gshenas gzhan tu thub pa la blta pa dang/ phyag 'ams pa dang / bsnyed bkur ba dang phyir bdag cas nye dam mchi'o// de bzhi gshenas pa dang drag rgyal macad gyu pa ma
134b1(1): yang rigs kyi bu gang gis dus la bab par shes na zhes bka' ya lad pa dang / de nas rigs kyi bu le shes dpal dang / bzal shing gi ra ba'i dpal de gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug bcu
134b2(1): lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gis rgyal mtshan dpal de la/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa gnyis dang spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas te 'khod do// skad cig sa gcig cam
134b3(1): kyi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das drang srong shig kya thub pa'i khyan sngar 'dug ste/ thal lo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to// de la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chad byed/ 
134b4(1): grangs myed pa rnams / drang srong gi cha byad kyis shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa tshad myed grangs myed pa 'dir skad cig ma gcig gis lhags so// de bzhin du g.yas phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
134b5(1): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang ga'i bye ma snyed las shinang tu 'das te/ de na ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyangastond to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' mngon
134b6(1): bar shes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi mchogaces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis drang srong gicha byad dang lus dang gzugs dang bdag mthong ngo // sngon ma byung
134b7(1): ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po de la yongs su zhus pa/ de bzhin du ji lta bur kong du bshad pa nas/ de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
134b8(1): 'di las shinang tu 'das pa'i bar du ste// de na 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho spyi bo la chos kyang bstond to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
134b9(1): sems dpa' chen po dod yod par mthong ba dang / ku mu da'i glab po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang 'ag gsum gyi bye ma snyed las
134b10(1): shin tu 'dam pa'i thang du ste/ de margyan cig ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams derang de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho skyong ba nos kyang stod to// de nas byang dub legs dpa 'a sems dpa' chen pa
135a1(1): rdub dang bral ba'i 'ad dang tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du 'gang po nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi dang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi chu 'ogs dga' cig gi bye ma las shi da tu'adas pa'i len
135a2(1): du ste/ de na me tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal mtshan chen po zhes khya ba bzhugs te mtsho skyong ba chos stond to// de na byang chub sems dpal ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub
135a3(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba'i gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu po gang dga' bdun gyi bye ma snyed nas shinab tu 'das pa'i bar du he/ de nas
135a4(1): 'od snang ba chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang bdag pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te chos skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi da
135a5(1): da thams cad dang ldan pa di sus tu rgyas/ zhi kun ba drang grong chen pogs kyi gru'i bkan pa de logs subal date/ byag 'as su 'dzud ro// gyi 'dod kyisangs rgyas kyi
135a6(1): 'dir garas rgyas kyi 'ang 'ad sa sems cad gang la la theg pa chen po la ya bdag par gyi zhugs pa ni drang srong gi sa byad kyis 'gyur pa'o// / rgyan de dag la nyan thos lam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am// ngarang sangs rgyas mam/ rang
135a7(1): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bas myi mthong na// sems can gzhan gyis mtho bar myi 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po b.rad de las bzhengs te/ thub pa dbang po'i 'gros pa// tshangs dbang po ni/ 
135a8(1): rtul ba'i 'gros dpa/ sgra ma yin bga' bar byed pa'i bgros dang / klu dul ba'i 'gros dang /  rgyal po'i nyon mongs pa'i 'gros dang / rnam par grol ba'i 'gros ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing / sangs
135b1(1): ti na ka tata sa shA sa ru ma ta dra dang sa shAN das da sa du ma sa us ya sa
135b2(1): rgya ba cher po rnam par 'bral ba'i 'gros dang / rgyarang chen po'i 'gros dang / sangs rgyas kyi byid kyi brlabs chen po'i 'gros su bcom ldan 'das spos kyi dad ldang ba'i lel me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'deg pa dang 'dod bas du
135b3(1): nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri kha byor to// dka' thub kyi gnas btsang ma'i dri tha dad pa myed cing dri ma myed pa'i phyogs su 'gro sa lad kyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na ba de na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ glang po'i rnam
135b4(1): bar blta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par bltas par gyu rad pa de'i dus na yang 'di brjod do// la lagang 'dir brtand dang ldan pa la// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems bskyed pa// bdag gis yang dag spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir// de dan/ 
135b5(1): thams cad bdag ni mdun tu 'ong // byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs phyed gang // dadung du yang 'khor ba'i 'de 'dod cing // chos la bdag byed rab tu rtsi shes pa// bdag ni de dag thams cad 'ab gyo dang // kun tu rlon
135b6(1): ba blangs byed dang / smra ma'i phu bltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing / rang thabs la mkhas par yang ni myi shes pa// de dag thams cad 'o nag ga nyond to// bzhon 'grus ldan pa bsod nams 'jod11
135b7(1): mangs po// thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dulazhing // shes rab pha rol phyind mchog rtag spyod pa// bzo// / da pa nyan phyir de dag thams cad 'ong // gang gis sangs rgyas du ma
135b8(1): sngon bsnyen bkur// 'dus byas thams cad 'di la brten pa myed/ chu lha lta bur rab tu lus nyond pa// rang bzhin rnam par 'jug pa'i rir yang 'ong // gang rnams/ thams cad yang dag spyod phyir zhugs/ 
135b9(1): thams cad dngos la sems pa rten myed cing / mtshan ma spangs la rtog par 'gyur myed pa// dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'ong // bdag gis bzod pa mchog 'dir rab bsta nad nas// ji ltar sdug bsngal kun la myi
135b10(1): gnas pa// chos kyi 'khon lo la yang khyod myur 'jug/ srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar da byed// phyogs bcur thub pa'i dbang po gang dag kyang // 'gro ba rnams la phan phyir 'khor lo bskor// da dung theg pa'i
135b11(1): dam la gang 'dod pa// bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' mthong // lan gnyis su yang 'khor lo bdagra skod te// phyir gyi ldog pa sems can bye bkod pa// rnam par thos pa'i blon mtshan rab thogs shing // bdag/ 
136a1(1): 'dzinams su ma gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ning nga thongs pa gang dag kyang /  ga ni khyod kyi gan pa nga / nyin thopar rnas // debs tha zhes
136a2(1): gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de yang / de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge dang don dang tshig tu brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
136a3(1): kyi zhing mtha' yas mu myed par song ngo // de na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag pur zhugs pa de thams cad nyand cing de phyogs bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro// bdag cag gis blta ba'i sems can
136a4(1): gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor da de ltar yid du 'ong ba de ltar dga' ba de ltar mngon par dga' ba/ de ltar zab cing sems can gyi dbugs 'byind pa/ de ltar tshim pa/ de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba/ don de/ 
136a5(1): dang / tshig dang yi ge brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin dan du smra bar bya ba ji lta ba der de phyas bzhi kun tu bltas te/ sangasargyas kyi mthus spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la drang srong thub pa dbang po zhi zhing
136a6(1): thugs zhi 'a/ dul ba dang zhi ba'i mgo thob pa/ gser gyi dru kha po ji ltar 'bar ba la drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang posalan gsum du phyag 'tshal te/ ha cang yang myi ring bar mthong ngo // 
136a7(1): mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong 'di ni mthu chen po drang srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhag snyam ste/ gal te snying rje chen ldan par 'gyur na de'i rjes su 'gro'o// 
136a8(1): drang srong gi cha byad dang lus dang dbyibs kyis bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cog kyang drang srong du 'gyur drang srong chen po des bsnyen bkur ba dang phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir
136a9(1): nye bar 'gro'o// de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad myed grangs myed pa las drang srong gi cha byad tshad myed grangs myed bsam gyis myi khyab/ mtshungs pa myed cing dpag tu myed pa chu bo gang
136a10(1): 'ga'i bye ma snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhags so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phral ba'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas/ drang srong thu'i
136b1(1): pa'i gang na ba de lo nas su zas mo sbyarang te/ phyag 'tshal nas bstod de 'khod do// la la smon las kyi dbang dang / la la mngon tu spyod pa'i rkyend kyis gang yang ni skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sathus drang ba ma/ 
136b2(1): bar thob nas drang srong gis byad kyis can tu 'khod do// drang po chen po thub pa'i dbang thog pa dan ri lags su ya bas mo snang te 'a'ado // de nas bya su ma sems dpa nosmos kyi rigs mapa' sas pa'i
136b3(1): sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te/ ga tu thug pa bathugs shing jig bung 'thor ya ngan par 'os pa yis dag par spyod pa'i dus nam pa'i mdog gis yul ba'i 'azod pa 'di ga ngan pa sod par 'gyur / 
136b4(1): nas de nyid kyis chen shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'i lam las khang pa rtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na brgya byin lnga'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa migs pa lta bu bye ba khrag
136b5(1): khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu ljags so// de nas byang chub se/ mas dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang pa rtsegs pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta
136b6(1): ste dper na tshangs pa myi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar spangs te/ drang srong thub pa gang na bzhugs ba der bdag bzod pa 'di bstand snyam pa dang / de nyid kyi chen lho phyogs na
136b7(1): nam mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa myi mjed kyi bdag po khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba lta bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu lhag
136b8(1): ba mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste dper na tshangs pa glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra bar brtson par sprul du te/ bcom
136b9(1): ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi min nub phyogs nas nam mkha'i lam las 'di lta ste dper na tshangs pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i lang pa brtsegs pa lta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gis
136b10(1): gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu lpags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste dper na tshangs pa'i
137a1(1): ri rab kyi 'on ces bya ba'i khang pa 'tshegs pa dor ba myed pa ldan pa de 'dra bar mngon par sprul lo snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi min byang phyogs nas nam mkha'i la ma las khang pa brtsegs pa bstan sdug parin po che sna bdun gyis
137a2(1): gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste tshangs pa chen por rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa ba rtsegs pa dor ba myed pa dang ldan pa khA ga khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu ljags so// de nas yang de'i chen khang ba batshegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nam mkha' la
137a3(1): 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir seng ge'i khri la rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das don gyi phyir seng ge'i khri bshams te'i khang pa brtseg
137a4(1): pa gang zhig snyam he/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub sems sa dpal gzi brjid dri ma myed pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag lpags/ su'i byin gyi brlabs/ byang
137a5(1): chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma myed pas// byang chub sems dpa' basmras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na chos kyi chos chags pa thamasacad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir dadung myi grub kyi/ 'di gnyis kyis 'khor ba'i
137a6(1): khyas pa'i phyir bsgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong 'o// 'di ga nyis ni byung ba dang 'jig pa zhes bya ste/ gang gyi skye myi 'byung ba de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes kyang myed do// de 'jig pa thams cad
137a7(1): spangs nas myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcad pa 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo'o// kapa 'gro ba dang 'ong bo zhes bya ba 'di ni nyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// rigs kyi bu gang bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa/ 
137a8(1): byed pa dang / srog dang gso' ba dang / gang zag dang shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa myed pa 'di ni gnyis su sbed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang skyes pa thams/ 
137a9(1): skyes par rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang 'byung ba dang 'gog par myi rtog cing 'gro ba dang 'ong bar myigs pa myed pa dag tha dad par bya ba myed pa dang / 'gyur ba byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa/ rigs kyi bu gnyis su
137a10(1): myed pa chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang / phung po skye ba dang 'jig pa dang mtshan nyid 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang phung po yongs su shes shing skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa rlom sems
137b1(1): thams cad bcom pa/  gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// 'gul ba dang rlom zhing sems sems par rig pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang chob pa 'bus myed
137b2(1): cing rlom sems myed pa g.yo ba myed cing yid la myi byed pa 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'onarigs kyi bu gang tshor bar shes pa dang / tshor bar kun 'byung bar shes pa dang / tshor ba'i 'gog par shes
137b3(1): pa dang / tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang tshor ba kun 'byung ba 'gog par myi shes pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po dang tshor ba'i phung po'i mi tshun nyid tha dad par myi shes pa dang
137b4(1): mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid myed pa dang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid mang por myi shes pa 'di yang / rigs kyi bu gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// yang
137b5(1): rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang khams dang skye mched la nyan thos dang rang chub 'ad/ da pa dang / bla na myed pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes 'dod pa nga 'di ni gnyis so// rigs kyi bu gang yang nyan thos dang rang ngas
137b6(1): rgyas kyi theg pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang phung po dang kham/ sa dang / skye mched la rten par myi shes pa dang / yi ge'i nig gis lam thams cad ni gnas myed pa yi ge myed pa/ smro
137b7(1): ba myed par rab tu shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang myi dge bar kun tu shes pa dang / pha rol dang tshu rold tu shes pa 'di ni
137b8(1): gnyis pa'o// rigs bu gang dge ba dang myi dge ba 'di yang mtshan ma myed pa/ kun nas ldang ba dang myi zad pa 'di ni rtog pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgrol 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
137b9(1): tshu rol ni zag pa'o// pha rol ni phyi nad ci log de gang / tshu ro lad dang pha rol la rtog pa dang 'dzind pa dang / bkrol ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang yang tshu ro la dang pha rol la 'dzind pa dang / bkrol ba myed pa dang / btang
137b10(1): ba myed pa 'di ni gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang phung po dang khams dang skye mched la zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa myed pa 'am/ zhes rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// 
138a1(1): gang yang 'ams dang ste mched pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes rtog pa myed pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i 'du shes bya ba'ang byed pa dang / 'du shes dang 'du shes byin tho ba'ang byed pa 'di yang gnyis su
138a2(1): skyed pa'i tshab kyi nas 'dug pa 'o// rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang kham se dang skye mched la 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang rtog pa 'di ri gnyis pa'o// dang sa de 'du byed skye med thams pa la gyi tog cing rnam
138a3(1): myi tod pa dang / chos thams cad nam pa'a' dang mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba 'di sang rigs kyi bu gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgol 'dug pa'o// rigs kani bu gang sang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'dun
138a4(1): pa'i chos la snyoms pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gangs 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la myi 'jug gyi 'gro rnam par myi rgal zhing 'gro ba 'ang byed/ rnam par 'gro ba myed pa 'di yang gnyis su byed pa'i chos
138a5(1): la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang las myid dang gzugasaskams phung po dang / khams dang skye mched 'byung bar rab tu shes pa 'di de ni gnyis pa'o// phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang mying dang / 
138a6(1): gzugs kyi byas pa la smra ma'i rang bzhin gyis lha ba kun tu 'gro zhing dun kyi 'gro/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su skyed pa'i chos kyi sgos 'dug pa'o// 
138a7(1): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang rnam par shes pa 'byung ba rab tu shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang yang 'byung ba myed pa skad cig ma dang skad cig ma yin pa lo 'dus byas thams cad du myu rang tu rab tu shes pa 'di yang gnyis su/ 
138a8(1): myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bdag gis bya ba dang rnam par shes pa yongs su shes pa dang / nga yir bya ba dang skye mched la chags pa 'di ni gnyis so// gang la sa bdag dang bral ba'i rnam par
138a9(1): shes pa thob bo// bdag gi rang bzhin lta ba gnyis dang bral pa/ skye mched nyams pa myed pa bdag gir bya ba dang / pa'i ra ba dang bral ba/ 'di yang gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// gang la la rig pa dang rnam par grol
138a10(1): par rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu ma rig pa ni rgyu ba myed cing // bdag myed pa'o// rigs pa ni glog gi rang bzhin can no// rnam par grol ba yang nam mkha'o// nam mkha' yang myi rtog pa rteni rtog par byed pa myed pa/ 
138b1(1): smos pa myed pa 'di yang gnyis su myed pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa dang gzugs kun tu spyod pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gzugs nyid kyang nam mkha' bzhin du song ste nam mkhara' yang 'jig pa byed do// 
138b2(1): gzugs 'jig pa stong pa nyid de gzugs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rgyu ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed kyang de bzhin no// rnam par shes pa rab tu rgyu ba myed pa ni/ nam 'kha' ji lta bur
138b3(1): sud pa myed cing snang ba myed pa rnam par shes pa 'ang de bzhin no// rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa stong pa ma yin te// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyang stong pa'o// de bzhin du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yang nam mkha'i rang
138b4(1): bzhin ltar stong ngo // nam mkha' ji lta bur 'dod chags myed zhe sdang myed/ gti mug myed/ phyi mthol myi dma' myi tog rnam par myi rtog/ mye 'gro rnam par myi 'gro bar de ltar sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa' di
138b5(1): bzhin du rab tu shes so// phung po dang khams dang skye mnad la yang 'dod/ nachags kyid de sar byed// gti mug skyed/ phye mgrol gyi par gyi tog rnam par gyi rtog/ kyi 'gro rnam par rgya 'gro zhes//  zang1ha
138b6(1): dang dang sangs rgyab dang // blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gyi tog rnam par gyi rtog/ gyi 'gronam par myi 'gro ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu byad dub sems dpa'i gnyis su byed pa'i chos rkyen
139a1(1): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dri lta bur bstan pa bzhin du gnyis su skyed pa'i sgo bstan par bya ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod ni chos kyi sgo 'di la lus dbang tu bcugs te/ de ltar khyod kyis ma byed
139a2(1): pa'i sems can rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod do// gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa rnams bcom
139a3(1): ldan 'das la mchod pa sna tshogs byas so// yang dag par dpyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// / de nas de'i che 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/ 
139a4(1): pa bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzad nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo spyard te/ phyag 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das la chos bsan pag sol pa'i phyir/ tshigs su bcad pa'i yon tan 'di dag gis
139a5(1): nyod do// rgyal ba nyi mnyam zhing mnges dag khyab pa/ nyon mongs dag bzhi 'di la mngon par gnas// thub pa shin turnam grol 'di bzhugs shing // khyod kyis 'gro la bzod pa'i mchog 'di
139a6(1): stonang // rab tu ni thugs cul zhugs yongs su dag/ thub pa mchog sbyin bgyis pa bzod dge gsungs// 'gro lo/ bde byin drang srong shes rab 'chang // gti mug 'jig mdzad 'di la
139a7(1): bdud ci 'chang // 'di la lhaklu sems can myi mang the// shin tu gsal yid myung tu zhing gang de// 'gro ba thams cad khyod nas lta zhing 'dug/ nyon mongs su yongs su spangs te dam chos gsungs
139a8(1): sngon dang rgyab bakhyod kyang bu spyod ltar// cig gnyis rkang pa lag pa sre byin zhing // grags pa mgo ldag par sag dpa 'dru dang / thang na zang bra dzin dan mi me nas yang byid// zas nom yang dang dran/ 
139a9(1): bran po byid// gnyen dang 'gro la sdug bsngal rtag yang byed// bas 'a ba rdzogs shing sems can dga' mdzad pa// khyod kyis mchod sbyin 'argya byin sems can byir// sangs rgyas mang po sngon chad dge mchod/ 
139a10(1): byam / byam sa sems rtad pas zer zun sbyin sa dga'// dub zhugs brtan pas rin pa bzhin 'dar/ 'gros pan phyi bzod pa 'di ba har gsol// ngan song gsum spangs sems can mtha ris
139b1(1): ljidi// khyod kyis brtan pa'i smon lam sngon rtag byas// 'gro ba byang chub sdug bsngal byang chub reg/ rgyal ba sngon chad ji bzhin byang chub de thob bo// snying rje dpal chub sa rnams ma sus gang // nyon mongs drig su
139b2(1): the tsom thams cad zhi// sam gang zhi bas 'gro ba byang chub ston// ji ltar chos rtogs 'di la khyod kyi du// shin tu bsgom yid 'gro la chos char phob// bdud rtsi'i ros pongs yang dag yon tan gsungs// lam/

143b6(1): spang ba yin gyi bzod pa bsgom pa ni ma yin gyi// 'gro'o zhes bya ba rgyud zad pa' mtshan nyid 'di dang / rnam par zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba brda dang tha snyad kyi tshig gis

143b8(1): bying ba 'di ni bzod pa la gti mug pa yin gyi/ bzod pa bsgom pa ni ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' shes pa dang myi shes pa rab tu spangs te/ rgya chen po nye bar zhing 'di ni bzod pa
143b9(1): lo noms zo zhes smram po// rigs kyi bu 'ong dezhes bya ba sus dang ngang deng yi nyud spyod pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'brog zhes bya ba bren pa'i 'du byed nye pa ni ba 'di ni bzod pa pa sgom ma'o// 
144a1(1): zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'dza zhes bya ba rnam par shes pa nye bar zhi ba dang / rnam par spyod pa chags paskyed pa tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni nazanapa pasgom pa yin no// 'gro la zhes bya ba rnas par shes
144a2(1): pa/ rnam par dmyigs pa dang / rnam par spyod pa nub pa 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// 'ong ngo zhes bya ba myed dang gzugs kun nas spang ba'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro
144a3(1): zhes mying dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa bsgos pa'o zhes smras so// 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'dul ba zhes kun nas ldang zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'grol zhes byab
144a4(1): dbang po drug zhes nye bar zhi zhing nub pa 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// 'gro'o zhes bya ba reg pa'i chu bo bsgom pa gzhan gyi tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsdom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba reg
144a5(1): ba'i chu bor nye bar 'gro ba 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// 'gro'o zhes bya ba tshor ba gsum gyi rgyun gcod pa 'di ni 'azod pa pa sgom pa'o zhes smras so// 'ong ngo zhes bya ba sred pa'inya rtsa
144a6(1): kun gzhi la 'jug pa 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro ba/ zhes bya ba sred pa gtong ba dang nub pa 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o/ zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba nye bar len
144a7(1): pa la 'jug pa'i tshig gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa la yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba nye bar yi nad pa semed pa 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// 'ong ngo zhes bya ba bsgom pa mngon par 'dug pa'i tshig
144a8(1): gi mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin/ 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'ong du chud pa chags pa'i lam 'di ni gzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba yang dang snying por 'dug pa'i tshig gi sam
144a9(1): nyi bzod pa bsgom tha ma yin no// 'azlas nas bya ba skyes zod pa 'dir babod pa pa rnam pa'o zhes skyem po// 'dza zhes bya ba sa dang bdan par 'drug pa'i tshig gi mtshar rnyi 'di nga pa pasgos bus
144a10(1): yin no// ban zhes bya ba nas named pa nga pa'i phyi mthod pa non pan zhem ldan pa// rigs kyi chu 'a dzi ni me cu 'dangs su 'i 'i rgyang chu'i chu bo bgyi gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni yod pa sgom sem
144b1(1): no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba shi ba'i chu bo las rga lad pa 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya mya ngan dang smre sngags 'dond pa dang yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'jug pa'i gnas kyi
144b2(1): mtshan nyid 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba sdug bsngal dang 'khrug pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal
144b3(1): thams cad skye ba dang / rga shi dang 'chi 'pho skye ba dang phrang ba dang bral ba'i skye ba'i gnas kyi mtshan nyid 'di mi bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin no// 'gro'o zhes bya ba 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba 'di ni bzod pa
144b4(1): bsgom pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'ong ngo zhes bya ni sdug bsngal thams cad skye zhing phyi nad ci log bzhi kun nas ldang ba'i rang bzhin no// dge ba thams cad bsgom pa la bsregs byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gro'o zhes bya
144b5(1): ba ni thams cad nyi bar zhiba'o// sug bsngal gyi phyi nad ci log gi gnye po rigs kyi bu de bas na 'ong ngo // zhes bya ba'i tshig ni nyan mongs med pa thams cad kunang tu 'dren pa'o// zhes smras pa yin no// 
144b6(1): sa can pa pa byed do// yi de'i chos kyi dbyis pa 'thug pa byed do// gzung ba byed pa dang / kun nas spangs byed pa dang / sus byed pa dang / 'ang ba byed pa dang / bu byid thams cad pa dbyigs pa'i rgyun cad pa dang / yod ma

148a9(1): ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// ji lta bur bsams pas sems can yongs su smi kun par byed pa dang / yang na ni zang zing bas ba'i sems can rnams zang zing gis yongs su smyind par byed pa dang / chos 'dod pa'i sems
148a10(1): can rnams la gzugs dang 'thun par chos bsta nad pas yongs su mgu bar byed cing yongs su smind par byed pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems cam yongs
148a11(1): su sminang pa mya zang zing gi sbyin pa yang byin pas me nad pa de dag la byams pa dang mthun par sems bskyed par bya ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smyind par byed no// rab tu dga' ba skye ba'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de
148a12(1): yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyid dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// snyoms can thams cad yongs su mgu bar bar bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i sems kyi go cha dang / sems can
148b1(1): nyid kyis de dag yongs su smind par byed do// snying rje ci bya'o// chog byed pa la brtson pa dge ba'i sems skye ba dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// btang snyoms shing sdig pa myi byed pa dge ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de dag yongs su smin par
148b2(1): byed do// ting nge 'dzind dang mthun pa dang sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smyin par byed do// donas rten pa bdag myed pa dang ldan pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smyi nod par 'gyur ro// de ya
148b3(1): sbyor ba byin pa le nad pa rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa la dang por byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de nyid kyis de dag yongs su smyind par byed do// la la le nad pa rnams la byang chub spyad pa spyod pa de dag skyo ba bskyed par byed pa de dag kyis de dag
148b4(1): yongs su sbyinang par byed do// sa la yang yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa rnams la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la spyod pa'i rgyun bcad cing bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs
148b5(1): gabu ma tha thams kyi rig pa dang / thug bskas pa dang / stong ba dang / bdud byed pa dang ldan pa lta bu'i chos son ci rab tu sono pa de nyid de da/ yongs su sbyin par byed do// mal yang byang chub sems
148b6(1): dpa' de dag srungs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams rgyun gyi bcad shing nyon mongs pa dang / rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du snying rje chen po bskyed pa de lta bu'i chos stonod cing rab tu ston pa de na smon lam byed do/ 
148b7(1): denas nan byed pa sa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang smrab tu'o nga batshad rtswa ning sa ba ngan pa dog pa'i sems narnams byed pa gsum pa sbyor ba byed do// yongs su byangan las 'das par byed // thab pa des sems can
148b8(1): bye thun sdig pa rgya 'ong mang ba myed par byed do// rigs kyi bu byang dub sems dpa' dag zhan pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos thos kyang sems can yongs su spyod par byed do// rigs kyi bu da gang byung chub sems dpa' dgas
148b9(1): ba'i phyog gis smra ba dang / cig ga na las dga' bar bya ba dang / ngag 'dam pas song ba po dang / chom nyad pa'i rnams snyan pa la sbyor bar byed do// sems can yongs su spyod pas sdig tshul sa phyir bzlog pa
149a1(1): 9byed do// sta bam song pa thams cad las phyir zlog par byed do// bral ba'i zhi'i sems can nam bzhi la 'god par byed do// bzhi gang zhe na tshul khrims dang bral ba'i sems can rnams ngag snyan pa dang
149a2(1): 'jam pas tshul khrims la dgod par byed pa dang sems can lta ba dang bral ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par byed pa dang / sems can bsam pa dang bral ba rnams bsam pa yongs su sbyang bar byed pa dang

149a6(1): kyi lam la yang dag par gzhog par byed do// tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag par bzhog par byed 'god par byed/ 'dud par byed do// sems can bdag bde bar 'dod pa/

150a1(1): nas nga sadas rgyas kyi gsas spyon par byed po nyid kyis de dang sangs su sbyin par byed do// gang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dang yo ta kyi mayod kyi na

150a3(1): tshul khrims pa spyong bar byed do// klu 'i kyi gri des 'phags pa byang chub sem pa dpa gzhan gyi nas kyi sra pa'i sems kyis gnas panas pa 'ol kyi chungs ca sem pa dang brgyan du rgyams kyi skye ba dun/

150a9(1): skyabs pa'i phyir sems can snying rje myed pa'i nang na 'dug pas byams pa yod par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa'i sems dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i zhum pa myed pa'i sems dang / bdag 'khrul pa'i phyir 'byin/

150b1(1): ba la bskur ba 'debs pa dang / le lo can dang / myi dge ba'i cha ba dang ldan cig tu 'phrogs pa'i nabar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs dang gzugs

150b3(1): phyir rtsol ba de dang de dag gi dge' ba'i rtsa ba la yang sems can sbyor bar byed pa de nyid kyis sems can yongs su smyind par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i
150b4(1): phyir/ brtson 'grus dang / tshul khrims kyi sems kyi go cha la brtson pa 'di yang 'jig rten pa'i ngag snyan pa'i dngos po gang gis go cha'i thabs la mkhas pas nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang

150b7(1): mongs pa dang / rtog pa sa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub ste sa dpa' ba rob tu phyin pa drug sad pa spyod cing snying de chen po dang ldan pa do dag byang chub mi tshos dpa' zhes bya bar de gang rig par bya'o// cang

150b9(1): can yongs su sbyin pa dang don bya ba'i bsku ba'i dngos po gang zhed// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa snga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa'i snying rje chen pos gcings pa dang / bdag ni rtsoms
150b10(1): gyi khyad pa bgyis bcings pa 'di sa ste dper na/ phyugs shing la btags pa ltar sdug bsngal myong bas na/ sems can bsam pa la 'jigs pa 'am/ sbag pa 'am yongs su sdigs pa skye bar myi 'gyur ro// de chung ngur
151a1(1): sems kyi skad cig ma gcig gis kyang sems can yongs su smind par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po 'di bsgom pa ni de ltar bslab bo// de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di gang / sems can 'di myi cas
151a2(1): zhig dam/ sems can 'di phyi nad ci log tsam zhig kam/ gti mug tsam 'am tha snyad tsam 'am/ thog mar dag pa 'di sems can zhes bya ba 'am/ yang dag par ma yin par gti mug pa gtogs par shi nad tu mngon par
151a3(1): myi 'grub pa dang / 'du byed sna tshogs kyi phyi nang ni log kun nas sdang ba rnams mngon par 'du byed pa na sdug bsngal dang yid myi bde'i ba myong ba dang / 'du byas thams cad kyi dngos po gar mkhan gi mtshon 'dra ba dang / rmyi
151a4(1): lam lta bu dang / rang bzhin gyi spyig sgyu lta bu dang / 'khor ba la chags pa rnams bde bar 'dod cing mngon par 'du bya ba des sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du myi

151b5(1): pa'i tshul khrims yang dang yang sdug bsngal gyi zil kyis non cing 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas pa nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba la rten pa dag byang chub kyi lam rab tu myi shes so// de bzhin du

151b7(1): gshed can gi gnas myed pa dang / gzugs kyi gnas myed dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas myed pa dang / sa'i khams kyi gnas myed pa dang / chu dang drung dang mye dang / myig dang gzugs kyi mtshan ma la

152a1(1): 'gru /  kyigs pa dang thun pas kyi dang / rgyan pas kyi sdig pa rnams kyi rgya kyi me pa kyisas ma da na/

152a3(1): su byed pa nas bdu dpyod pa dang / ye shes gnyis su myed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / nas 'byor nga gnyis su myed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa gnyis su byed/ 
152a4(1): par rnam par dpyod pa dang / lam gnyis su myed pa rnam par dpyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa 'drend pa gnyis su myed pa rnam par dpyod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu rnam pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas rigs kyi bu chos dang zang
152a5(1): mo'i babod pa thob bo// thob pa skyed pa'i stong pa nyid rar du byed pa'i yeshes la mkhas par 'gyur ro// shes rab pa snang bas byang chung gyidesam rnam par dpyod par byed do// 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ca
