152a7(1): 'gyur ro// shes kyi stobs skyes pas yul thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro// 'dod chags kyi 'khor bas ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 
152a8(1): dngos po nga dam pagyid pa thams rtso mam parnya rnas par byang yongs thugs pa dang / gas pa ma cad dpas yang dge pa na dus dang /  'a 'grob kyi su du 'ang rgyu
152a9(1): mang ba'i sa ngas 'a par mtho // dben pa'i spyod rtsang chu'ang 'gyur zhing tu 'jimamasas du ma mngon par chags par yapa yang dag pa marjo / thasas gtan tu spyod su du'ang 'gyu zhi rdzun ma ma
152a10(1): du yang yang dag par mthong ngo // mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur zhing 'du byed thams cad kyi yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo // a skyes pa'i spyod yul du yang 'gyur zhing bdud pa ni'i khyod yul du'ang yang dag par
152b1(1): mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul du 'ang 'gyur zhing 'phags pa'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin par yang yang dag par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi yul las yang dag par shin tu 'das par yang 'gyur zhing
152b2(1): 'jig rten thams cad kyi yul gyi spyod yul du'ang yang dag par mthong ngo // ye shes kyi spyod yul du yang 'gyur zhing byis pa'i yul du yang yang dag par mthong ngo // yang dag pa'i mtha' yul mngon gsum zhing nyan
152b3(1): bos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul spyod pa la yang dag par dga' bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yul la spyad pa spyod do// yul thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa'i spyod yul la shes rab kyi pha rol pa skyob par byed/ myod pa dang / 
152b4(1): mtshan nyid dang / dpe' byang dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par gzhol ba'i rnam par shes pa la brtson pas bdud bzhi las yul dbye' bar 'jug pa shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang
152b5(1): rim bro bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la ba tshon par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ha nad pa 'ang byed do// sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad
152b6(1): yongs su rdzogs par byed cing thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi yul la 'jug pa byed do// dmyigs pa thams cad kyi dge ba spyod pal sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// nyon mongs 1
152b7(1): ba'i rirnam par phye mar byed do// spros pa sems cad skyed par byed do// lta ba thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par dgod par byed do// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs
152b8(1): ba dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ sems cad byi dge ba'i cha ba dang ldan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams kyi nang na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa de lta bus pa ros tu phyin pa drug khyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa des
152b9(1): bu'i dor bya ba bsdu ba'i dngos po sems can rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed/ dkod par byed do// yon tan gyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tamangon bya ba la sems can rnams dgod par
152b10(1): byed pa 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyes bu chen po'i khur to// sems can gyi bsdu ba'o// sems can gyi tshogs so// sems can yongs su sbyin par gang sems can shining tu dbul po las du
153a1(1): yongs su tha dad par byed pa'o// rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo gsum la dgod par byed pa'o// ji lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par ma dag par byang chub sems dpa' la la rnam pa de lta bu'i chal byed cing byang chub sems
153a2(1): dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi don bya bas sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i don mthun pa sems can yongs su smyind par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
153a3(1): chub sems dpa'i don 'thun pa sems can yongs su sbyind pa'i tshul chen po gang zhe na// rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyind pa drug spyad pa pyod par
153a4(1): gang gi ni bdan bzod par 'gyur ba yangan ni sbyin pa'i ma rol tu phying pa yang na ni tshus khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bamam gtan dang / shes rab kyis rolang tu byid pa la bzod 'grus 'byur ba de dang
153a5(1): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan bston pa de la sbyor bar byed do// // gang gi mi byang chub sems dpa' srog gcod pa spangs shing sems du rnams la snying rjebs de de ltar srog gcod pa zlog par byed/ 
153a6(1): sems cas thams bdas snying rje bar sbyor bar byed do// 'jig rtenas pa 'das pa'i tshul khrims la dgod par byed pa nas yang dag par lta ba'i bar du smra bar phyog/ ji ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
153a7(1): ba'i yod ta dang span bar 'gyung ba dang / banas nyan pa'i phyir bzod pa pa sgom par byed pa nas kyi skye banimam kyi mthod 'byor pa'i ba du sa sem seMnas pa spyor ba byes kyi snying mag kyi mthod pa'i bar du 'dod ba phyis
153a8(1): ji ltang byang chub bam mo dpa' bdan brtson 'brus brtsams nam sems can yongs du phyin par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i chus kyis sa byid kyis 'arnams pa dang / dge ba'i gagi las dang mi kyilas byin kyis brlabs panas/ dge 'a
153a9(1): rgyar 'dushes pa dang / ni ba dang stong rje da bye'i drung bdus byas rnams rnam par gyi song ba des sem sacan nams sbyor bar byed dadod par byed do// ris bur byang chub sems dpa' byan thob dang rang rgyal pa 'ang ba'i phyir/ nyan yog rab sa
153b1(1): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas te bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyan thos dang nga rgyal dang bral ba'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed do// byang chub
153b2(1): sems dpa' bdag myed pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed pa nas 'khyild pa dang / ldog pa'i bsam gtan thob pa'i bar du de la sems can rnams de dang de dag gi yon tan la spyod bar byed dgod par byed do// ji lta bur byang chub sems
153b3(1): dpa' bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par brtson pa na thabs sna tshogs kyis shes rab kun 'byung bar byed do// ji ltar na bdag mngon gsum du 'gyur ba de ltar sems can rnams sbyor bar byed do// ji lta bur chos
153b4(1): thams cad la ye shes thob cing pha rol da ma yin pa'i rkyen mngon par shes pa de ltar sems kyi rgyu'i phyir chos 'di dag byung ba 'di ni/ sems can yongs su smyind par sbyor ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes te gang gi las kyis sos
153b5(1): pa'o// gang byang chub sems dpa' chos dang sems dpang byed par rab tu shes shing skad cig mar 'jig pa'i mtshan ma nyid la rtog pa dang / sems can la snying rje chen po rnam par myi spong ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la
153b6(1): mkhas pas sems can yongs su sbyin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// gang byang chub sems dpa' sems can stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid sa spyod pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid du dmyigs pa yang myed cing sems can rnams
153b7(1): theg pa gsum la sbyor bar byed po dang/ sems can yongs su sbyind par spyod ba'i spyan ma bcad pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs sa mkhas pas sems can yongs su sbyind pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// yang byang chub sem
153b8(1): dpa' lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed pa dag myed pa dang ldan pas chos stond pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / nyar pa dang sgra dang dbyangs la dmyigs myed pa dang / las kyi 'bras bu rnam par sbyin dpa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / sems
154a1(1): can rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir yang sems can phyin ci log la yang dag par 'du 'dzi byed pa dang rnams la sems can gyi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'brel pa stond pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la
154a2(1): mkhas pas sems can yongs su sbyang ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rang gyis 'du byed par myi dmyigs shing / gtong bar yang myi dmyigs pa dang / lend pa dang rnam par smyind pa'i 'bras bu
154a3(1): yab ma yin la/ sems can la snying rje ba'i phyir sbyin pa byin par 'gyur la/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par sbyin par yang stond par byed pa dang / sbyin pa bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sbyin par bye
154a4(1): pa 'di yang de byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smyind pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can gyi lus spyod pa myed pa dang / 'gyur ba myed pa
154a5(1): dang / kyi gcang ba'i gzugs pacan bung rab tu shes pa dang / sathugasas drA tag pa dang / 'dra byed snya ma'i rirang bzhis ska pa sa/ shes pa dang / semams can yas nyid rje chen poms ca
154a6(1): sbyor ba rnam par myi spong ba dang / sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed la sbyor bar byed pa dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag pas stond par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas
154a7(1): pas sems cad yongs su sbyin par mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// yang byang chub sems dpa' di lta bur bdag byed cing mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i tshul khrims la rtog par byed pa dang / spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes pa dang
154a8(1): 'di la sems can gyi btang snyoms su rab tu sbyor bar myi 'gyur ba dang / sems can yongs su smyind pa rnams yang phung po gsum la sbyor bar byed pa'i sdug pa'i tshul khrims su slob pa dang / lhag pa'i sems dang ldan
154a9(1): 'ishes rabs spyon par byed pa 'arjes rgyang chub tham par pa thabs pa mkhas pa sems pan yongs su sbyin pa bsgrubs pa'o// yang byang drum sems dpa'adi nyi sa dang da na gyi du
154a10(1): ba'i mtshan nyid du zhes te/ 'dus ma byas kyi rganapa dang bral ba yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / sems can rnams pa ting nge 'dzid dang 'thod pa'i sgra dang 'bras bu mchungs par stod pa de la sems can na mas sbyor bar byed pa
154b1(1): sa bya chub me sa pa'i thams pa'asapas sem can yongs su phyid pa don par sprul la'o// byang chub sem pa dang drisang sa nga babyed pa dang / sa byed pa'i du byed pa rgyu
154b2(1): yang rtog pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba dang 'gog par dmyigs pa dang / rgyu dang rkyend kyi 'bras bu rnam par rab tu byi shes pa dang sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sbyin gyi gcod pa dang
154b3(1): yang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa dang / phung po yongs su shes pa dang / ye shes mngon gsum du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / rgyu'i 'bras bu bstond par byed pa dang / sems can se lo
154b4(1): can rnams brtson 'grus la dmyigs pa'i sdug bsngal 'dzind pa la sbyor ba 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smyind par bsgrubs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar yang
154b5(1): bsam gtan du byed cing / 'du byed thams cad myi rtag par yang dag par na rjes su mthong ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag byed pa dang / nga myong ba myed pa dang / byas pa myed pa dang / bya ba myed pa dang / kun
154b6(1): nas ldang ba myed pa dang / skad cig tu zad pa myed pa'i ye shes la mkhas kha'i 'du byed rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / sems can rnams la yang phung po la rten pa'i bsam gtan tshangs par
154b7(1): spyod pa mngon par shes pa thob pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu stond pa dang / bsam gtan gyis nyon mongs pa spang bar byos shig ces de ltar las gzhanam yin pas/ sems can rnams bsam gtan la sbyor bar byed/ 
154b8(1): ba dang / thob pa chen po thob par byos shig ces bsam gtan la sbyor bar byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs sa mkhas pas sems can yongs su sbyind par bsgrubs pa'o//  yang byang chub sems dpa'
154b9(1): ji ltar blang ba myed cing dor ba byed pa dang chags pa dang khong khro ba gnyi ga dang bral bas thams cad btang snyoms thob pa dang / nam tan dang bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / phyi skye ba'i chos kyi babod pa dang / ngabasam gtan gyi dbang ma
154b10(1): kha yid kyi 'du byed rnams tog par myi byed rnam par rtog pa myi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rab tu sbyor ba yongs su 'grub pa rab tu myi spong ba dang / shes rab bsgom pa la brtson pas sems can rnams
155a1(1): 'khor ba'i btson ra las tha dad par stond pa dang / sems can rnams thos pa dang brtson zhing tshol bsgom pa la sbyor ba byed pa dang / yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta ji lta bur dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par khong du
155a2(1): chud pas 'khor ba'i 'dam las rgald par gyur pas de lta de lta bur sems can rnams chos de dang de dag la yang dag par gzhog par byed sbyor bar byed dgod par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi thabs la
155a3(1): mkhas pas sems can yongs su smyind par bya ba'i don 'thun pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po mngon par bsgrubs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i ba spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can yongs su smin pa don
155a4(1): 'thun pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po gzhan yang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song gsum dang ngan du spyod pa'i nyes pa dang / sems can nyon mongs pa dang tshe dang lta ba dang / bskal pa'i rnyog pa dang / byang/ 
155a5(1): chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dil ni dan las kyi rgyan gyi gda'i sangs rgyas kyini gyi son ta rtogs sasas dro bar kyi 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ni yongs su gapar ston pas kyi
155a6(1): kyi byed do// yang nyon mongs pa dang rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du la rolang phyind pa drug gis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na// sems can mtshams byed par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 
155a7(1): 'phags pa la bskur pa 'debs pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams pa'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smind par bskyed par byed do// theg pa gsum la
155a8(1): sbyor bar byed do// pha rolang tu phyind pa drug la dgod par byed do// de yang 'dir de tsam gyi byang chub kyi spyad pa pyod pa'i sems can yongs su sbyind par byed do// 'dir yang 'dul ba 'dzind pa nas bla na myed pa yang dag pa
155a9(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i bar du'o// byang chub thob pas na yang sems can mtshams myed par byed pa nas myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa'i bar du yongs su smismyind par 'gro zhing / 
155a10(1): sems can rnams theg pa gsum la yongs su smyind par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i lta ba thams cad las yongs su tha dad par byed pa 'di'ang / rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub
155b1(1): pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rmi dro le 'u gsum pa'o// rigs kyi bu des byang chub semasu dpa' rnams kyi sang sa rgyas kyi zhing gi yodan tan gyi tshogs dang zhen/ rigs kyi bu nyon mongs pa dang / don du
155b2(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bar dpa' ci zhig tu skyes pa na/ sems can mtshams myed par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa rnams la
155b3(1): bskur dpa 'debs pa dang myi dge ba'i rtsa dang lhan cig 'grogs pa/ sa rnams yongs su smyind par byed/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor/ bar byed/ nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i bag chags thams cad las yongs su
155b4(1): sbyind par byed cing sems can gyi don gyi phyir bskal pa'i sdug pa sAl mang po bzod pa nas/ sems can de 'khor ba'i 'dam las sgrol pa dang / sangs rgyas cig gis tha dad du phul ba nas sangs rgyas bye ba
155b5(1): khrag khrig rgya stong gi thad kyi bar du phul lo// gang gi tshe sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan par 'gyur ba de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya ba byas pa dang / rnam par ros pa mngon par shes pa ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs kyi pha rol/ 
155b6(1): thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang 'ga'i bye ma snyed du rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nye bar 'gro ba nus par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur to// de nas sang me rgyas kyi zhing gyi yon tan gyi chog
155b7(1): nye bar rtogs so// de nas yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs chen po yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // de na yang rigs kyi bu de'i shinang du sred pa dang ldan pa skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de yad de bzhin gshegs pa de
155b8(1): dag la yongs su zhus pa las cis na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / chos nyand pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bas bral ba myed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / 
156a1(1): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas 'dres pa skyed pa'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis 'dres pa byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs thams cad kyis bral ba byed par 'gyur ro// yang nyon mongs pa dang rtog pa lnga'i mangs rgyas kyi zhing
156a2(1): du phyi skye ba'i ji tsam pa bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'chang kyi rgya'o// byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni rgya che zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan gyi tshogs kyis rgyas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' then
156a3(1): ba chen po dag pa la yang dag par zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par gyur to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
156a4(1): gis rigs kyi bu de la ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa las gang dang spyod pa dang nan tan gang gis yon tan de dag gis thob par 'gyur ba de yang rigs kyi bu tshe tshe rabs rabs su yon tan pyod pa'i nan tan la brtson par 'gyur ba nas der skye bar
156a5(1): 'gyur ba'i bar du'o// yon tan ji tsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po rnam sa cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du khyab par 'gyur ro// gang rigs kyi bu blan
156a6(1): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba denyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas rnam par spangs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa'i gtam smra bar
156a7(1): byed kyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ni ma yin no// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mang po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad
156a8(1): myed pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams la chos stond par byed do// gang dag la chos stond pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yongs su dag par skye bar bya ba'i phyir nyo nad kyi yongs su ma dag par ma yin no// pha
156a9(1): rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyod pa bsngags par myi byed do// sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag dang 'grogs shing brten
156a10(1): ba dang / sdom pa la dgod pa dang yon tan spyod pa bsngags par byed kyi yongs su ma ma dag pa ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
156b1(1): rdugapa pams sa papa'i lungs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sa dag pang ponapa sa pon bskyed sa par byed pasanan kyang chub tumam sa brgya'o//

156b3(1): la theg blo yang dag pa'i gtam smra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis sngon nyon mongs pa dang rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thog ma sa bon bskyed nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems/

156b5(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi tshogs tshad bzung ba dang brtagang ba der phyi nad chad kyang skye bar smon lam byas pas der bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// yang
156b6(1): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par phyis bla na// myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang ba'i/ de dag thams cad kyis rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag
156b7(1): par thams cad kyi 'og mar dge sa bon bskyed nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub bo// gang gi tshe sems bskyed pas mngon she swa pa thob pa ni sa rab tu dga' ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
156b8(1): bla na byed par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' dag da ltar chos kyi sgra sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs pa sna
156b9(1): tshogs dang bral zhing chos zab ma'i tshul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dang / phyir gyi ljon pa dang / gang yang chos 'as pa'i 'azod pa thob pas dka' ba bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dgar khyod pag sangs rgyas
156b10(1): kyi zhing yongs su dag pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myi mjed kyi rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lpags pa khyed cag thams cad kyis sngon thams cad kyi thog mar nyon mongs pa dang / 
157a1(1): ba shes pa ga nas kyis phyogs bcu'i yang sa rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag ga gzhan du 'gro ba'i mngon pa shes pa thob par 'gyur to// gang dasangs rgyas kyi 'di ni son kyi tshigs can tu shes shi rtogs pade
157a2(1): pa mngon pa shes pa'i rtsom pas thas pas dpa de nyid kyi shAng tan gyis rnas pas pas bya bdi rnyed pa yongs pa ston 'o//  kyi mangs su na sa rgyas pan
157a3(1): kyi gyig gin cung zad tsam rab tu zhi bar byed do// zhi bar shes nas de da/ cigs cig smras pa/ bdag cag gis gzugs kyi snang ba la hrI/ khartsams te/ bdag cag sprin mar gyur pa'i sman pa'i khyi
157a4(1): 'di nas 'byung ba 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas phyir 'ong ga yang byed pa mang po de dag kyang sman pa'i khyim de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji lta bur nand 'di ra tu'i bamyed pa de dag byig gin yun ri mong mnar ba bltas nas yang 'ong ngo // 
157a5(1): de dag kyang rgyan pa'i khyim de gnas par 'gyu 'o// de dag yun gyi ring sa kyang dang thams pad yongs su grom gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin drugang byang chub sems dpa tsun mongs pa dang rtog pa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
157a6(1): cu gang la 'dod chags dang ne sdang dang // gti mug dang / brgyal dang / rgyags pa dang lta ba ngan pas rtag tu gce ba'i sems can rnams de la/ rnas la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ji sar yon tan
157a7(1): khong du chug pa de ltar rtog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de las 'byol bar 'dod do// gang yad de las 'das su brlangs rnams 'du byed kyi rtag par rab tu sbyor bu dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams su sbyangs pa rnams 'du byed thams ca
157b1(1): thug par rab tu sbyor ba dang / thams gtan la dga' ba dang de ba ngas su ldangs pa rnamam tham thams cad 'dag byed pa rab tu rgyun dang / 'khod pa'i drug bsngal 'dod padasas na las 'dal ba ni tha ma turna
157b2(1): dang / gzhan yang lam ngan pa yongs su spangs pa rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi las rab tu lta ba med ga rab tu zhi bar byed do// mam yid du 'ong ba'i skye ba mdzes su spangs pa rnams kyi mnges par rab tu sbyor ba dang / gzugs pa
157b3(1): chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams spyod pa dang / reg pa la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams mabyung ba dang / bad par rab tu sbyor ba dang / dril chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams drung du rtog par rab tu myong pa dang / 
157b4(1): chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams myi mdzes pa sna tshogs rab tu sbyor pa dang / reg pa la chags pa yongs su spangs pa rnams myi gtsang ba'i yan lag sum bcu rtsa drug rab tu spyod pa dang / snying rje myed pa myed pa rnams byams
157b5(1): pa la rab tu sbyor ba dang / gtong ba byed pa rnams sbyin pa chen po lnga'i rab tu sbyor ba dang / gti mug gis bsgribs pa rnams la bton pa dang sbyor ba dang / 'dul ba rnams 'phags pa'i rigs la dga'/ 
157b6(1): bar rab tu sbyor ba dang / sdug bsngal 'dul ba rnams rim gyis sems cig tu 'dus par rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'du byed thams cad kyis nador bar spros pa rnams rim gyis sems cig tu 'dus par
157b7(1): rab tu sbyor ba dang / 'du byed thams cad kyis mngon par spros rnams spya ma lta bu ro rab tu sbyor bas nyon mongs pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mi mas can lnga dang phyir skye bar bsam pa rnams las dge ba bcu'i
157b8(1): las yongs su dag par spyor bar byed do// nyan thos kyi theg par bsam pa rnams la 'phags pa'i bdedar pa bzhi dang ldan pang yid la byed pa sbyor bar byed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par bsam pa rnams pashen kyi
157b9(1): 'brel dbar smra ba yid la byed pa spyod par byed do// sems can theg pa chen po sa yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la snga ros tu phyind pa drug sbyor bar byed do// thog ma sems bskyed pa rnams sa lhag pa'i thamangs pa phyir/ 
157b10(1): gyi rnyog pa'i sems spyod par byed do// sems can ma rol tu phyinang badrud yod pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams snying rje chen po sa yongs su kyi skyob se sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar byed do// 
158a1(1): rgya byin na yongs su na pa spyod bang byed pa'i dag na pa na du shes pas rnam par 'o// ngin gyi ni pa ma su shAn 'i mangs rgyas kyi
158a2(1): tshogs bangon par 'dod pa de dag de'i 'og tu mngon par shes pa rnam par ze bde la skye bar 'dod pa ji snyed pa der byer// yang sangs rgyas kyi ni nyo mongs pa rnam thar gyi khyod cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'i yon tan gyi tshogs
158a3(1): yongs su dag pa 'dod pa yang skyed pa de phye 'ar 'dod pa de sa bder skye'o// yang nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba myi 'dod pa la blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya ba'i ba
158a4(1): 'o// rton pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi nyizhing du semasanas bdon paspyod dang / pa babyed pa byed pa ngamam pong 'das 'phags pas bskru pa sa pa dang / phyi ga pa
158a5(1): dang ldan cig tu 'grogs pa'i rnams rgyun gcod do// sangs rgyas kyi ning/ yongs su dag lan sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnam sa sangs rgyas kyi byam byed cing byang chub sems dpa' mangs
158a6(1): rgyas kyi mos chad byed grang sa myed pa rnams la 'dug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa rnams chom sto dad par byed do// sang byang chub sems dpa' rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rnam pa de lta bu'i yul byed kyang ga
158a7(1): byang chub sems dpa' la la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnamapa de lta bu'i chal byed kyi nus so// yang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can cig nim 'dod kyi
158a8(1): pagong drag nyi shum gcig rab tu shes pa de ltang thabs ra tu gyur ba tod bras nyi shun gcig nis 'dod nags chus tu zhi bar byed pa dang / gang sems can can mi zhe sdang stong drag nyi shu ca gcig rab tu zhes pa de ltar thobs
158a9(1): pa tod thag nyi su mag nas ni sa ni bar byed pa nga/ she byang chu sems dpa'i rnam na shin nim nyan da dang mas par byed pa stod cag kyi tham shi shes pa de bzhin tha sam
158b1(1): stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ni zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / bya bachub sems dpa' gang gis sems can gcig gi skal ba dang bcas par spyod pa nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar byang chub sems dang
158b2(1): tshal chen po byed do// gang sems can cig gi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu spyod pa'i stong phrag brgya bcu cha bzhi rab tu shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de yang sems can gcig gi dgos pas brtson 'grus brtan pa la mos shing ba
158b3(1): rol gnon pa na/ thabs la mkhas pa stong phrag brgya bcu cha bzhi rab tu sbyor ba pha rol gnon pas gzi rad pa rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chal chen po 'di la ltos shig/ ji ltar sems can cig gi nyon mongs
158b4(1): pa rab tu zhi bar nus pa de ltar gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi nas gling cig sems can yongs su chad pa re re'i dgos pas nyon mongs pa'i khyod pa'i mtshan nyid stong phrag nyi shu cu cha bzhi rab tu zhi bar byed cing / gling gnyis
158b5(1): dam rnyog pa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'azod pa thob pa zhes bya'o// sa yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can ri byo mo pa'i dang po pyod pa thong zag rgya brnam pa ni 'gyu
159a1(1): can nyon mongs pa dam pos bcings pa las yongs su tha dad par nus so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can yongs su smyind par byed
159a2(1): do// byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa rnams snying rje chen po rgyan gyi gcod cing yongs su sbyi nad par bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' stsal chen po'o// yang byas
159a3(1): byang chub sems dpa' dgra rnam par 'grel pas 'di snyan pa bston dgan/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing chud myed par byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par lhags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang kar
159a4(1): gsum cu'i phyim snyed kyi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chu bo gang sha'i bye ma skyed kyis dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pashag kya ba pa
159a5(1): napong gro ga sa phyug bas pa nga/  ma' des dod kyi yid pa dang / bad gan 'ong sems can nams / sangs rgyas 'i ma sa byed 'gyu ba/ 
159a6(1): yongs zhing du bdag ga sad pa byed// themasan nyin mongs dam pa sa tho byed// nang 'dod gas ne nga sa dregs// gti zugs sa por 'ag par ba byed pa// rigs sa pangs das pa'i bdun
159a7(1): sangs rgyas zhing byang chub myong/  kyis kyi zhing masus pa byan pa'i shAshA sa dang ldan 'de na megs pa zhis bya ba byed te/ byes bu dam pa legs par spobs shing mchog su rgyam badzim po
159b1(1): chub kyi spong 'bo te/ rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi ning du pyod pa sa btsun na// sems can margyams byed par byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos song ba dang / 'phags pas bsrung ba 'debs pa dang / bram gyi pa po
159b2(1): she ba ma dadang na 'phrogs pa rnam mo mongs su sbyind par bya phyin zhing rje den pa byud/ nyi marlos pa pang sa rgyas kyi ning thur byed pa'i ngas gyu kyi zhing du s+ho s+ho// sdes byed pa cu po
159b3(1): tond to// tshig cam gyis skyes bu de dag bcom par 'gyur ba de dag la gang lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas mchod pa mchog tu rgya chen po byed na de dag gi brtan pa'i brtson 'grus pa rol gnon pa 'di 'acom pa lnga'i rdzo te
159b4(1): ji lung cig gi ba ma sa pa des dgos pa bams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas de nyid kyi mi ming bzhi gshesas pashas tu thub pas legs so zhes bya ba byed te/ de
159b5(1): nyon mongs dang rtom pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi shing durnam pa de lta bu'i di dag gis mas chen po bya bar 'gyur ba / 'i thos te/ mchas sa byed par byed pa nas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang sa nacin tu 'phrogs pa'i ba dunas pa de lta du'i
159b6(1): sbyin bstan sa/ sa 'an sa kyis ci sa / na sus kyan po'i ma kyis na pa / 
159b7(1): ngas rab tu za po/ mdzas byis mo yang btu 'thol to// dang dri mi dang rtsi'i 'a'od bams cad dang drad pa de dag kyang can 'amad+ma 'breb dpa drang / byang dub sems dpa' du cog na phyim rnyed pa dag pa mngon pa
160a1(1): rgya pa ra na pa 'as // rgyal thod kyi da masad yang ldan/  / 
160a2(1): kyis ni 'di la tshogs rnams sa// sngon gyi'i ska kyis 'khor / tho na gi shin chagapa na/ 'di shes panyid brtan namam// ba byed tshangs bsdad pa swA hA
160a3(1): bya// semasasan dma' 'a thugs pa rtse drug sa rje mas// thub pa 'di ni stong ba nyis 'dun// byung dadang nas 'gros 'disanis// dpa' sa bya can tu byin rnams pa// gos pa sa gzigs song ba nyid
160a4(1): gsungs// sdig pa bcom zhing nyes pa'i dri ma myed// 'dir ni 'gro ba theg pa ngan pa spangs// dge ba'i mtshan nyid khyod yul rab nyams pas// kye ma 'ong ltar stong ba nyid zhi gsungs// rma bya dang pa ne co steg dbyangs pa'i
160a5(1): nyams pa'i// phyogs can gyi ni dgra rnams 'dzin// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nam/ snga rdzas kyi me tog sung pa pa dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da rigs mngon par gto // 
160a6(1): 'bugs pa pa dag par spyod pa'i rgyal nam pa bdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa shes bya ba zhen pachen pa ni don me na na mar/ 
160b1(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das jitsam du khang pa brtsegs pa na myi bzhugs pa de tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don du slad du lha rdzas kyi be dur+ya sdodan po smras mngon par
160b2(1): smras te/ nas de dag gi ngos gnyis la bram ze'i byis pa che lo gsum lu pa lta bu tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dbyig pa dang / gdugs 'dzin pa/ tshangs pa'i khyod lam dang / cing phrag brgya bcu chu bani
160b3(1): mngon par thular to// de nas bram ze'i byis pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gan ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par btod do// khyod ni rabarton
160b4(1): nyon mongs pa sngon thugs bskyed// nyon mongs thegs byang chub phan pa'i rgyu/ nyon mongs zhi phyir rgyal ba'i bsnyen kyang bkur// nyon mongs thabs 'dzin rgyal ba 'dir gshegs gsol// nyon mongs spyod ma thasas
160b5(1): cad khyod kyis spangs// sems can nyon mongs la ni rtag tu gnyen/  khyod ni nyon mongs las las 'gro ba zlog// nyon mongs rgal ba'i ra rgyus ni rtag tu mos// nyon mongs ma tshungs khyod kyis rab tu zhi// 
160b6(1): bdag gi thos ni nyon mongs dra ba bcad// 'gro ba rtag ta nyon mongs su spros// nyon mongs sun 'byin dargyal ba 'dir gshegs gso// nyon mongs zhing dubyang chub dam pa reg/ ye shes smon 'am
160b7(1): 'tho shes nyams pa'i// sems can thams cadal thar daston pa// nyon mongs ston slongs zhi phyir 'di dag slos// ye shes 'od zer gyis ni nas pas gyud// khyod thugs bsdebs 'an shes zhums
160b8(1): khyab// ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba myig ldan byas// rgyal ba'i ye shes nyis 'dir gsheg su gso'o// mkhyend pas sgra dang kyi ma pa ba dad par mdzad // khyod kyis ye shes smon dang gang pag byed// thub pa ye shes dpa sa
160b9(1): 'dis 'dun// nyon mongs pas sbyin mdzod dran pa gsungs// nyi ma tha ba mchog tu madres pa'i kun// rgyal ba sems can pas mo skyems gsung sa// thub pa byang chub mchog phyir bgan dug so'o// 'a
160b10(1): 'thub pa 'dis 'dug pa gsungs// rgyas 'byang drub rgyu na 'dzes gzigs pa// phyogs pa ni 'dir ni ya dag ldags sang smra// stong pa nyid dang brjod su gis 'gyur gsungs// byam ze'i byis pa de dag gis
161a1(1): a / bcom ldaran 'das kyi yon tan 'di smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ de nas drang srong thub pa bad na de las bzhengs pa dang / de nyid kyi chen thams rlung ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
161a2(1): chen po 'di lan drug tu g.yos so// / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / snga ma yin dang / myi 'am rdzi dang lho phye chen po du mas kyang myi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par sna rdzas kyi me tog gi char mngon par 'phab bo// rma b+hA rdzas
161a3(1): kyi ma gau ru dang / ta ga ra dang / dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan dang / char rab tu khyab bo// lha rdzas kyi gos dang rgyan dang yid bzhin gyi gos dang / nor bu dang mu tig me mod dang / rin po che'i char mngon par phab bo// lnga rdzas kyi rol
161a4(1): mo rdung ba mngon par dkrol to// dbyangs kyis spyad lhung ldegs kyi smra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag sngon ma stond pa'i chos nyand par bgyi'o// bdud kyi yul las yang dag par shi na tu 'da' bar bgyi'o// 
161a5(1): nyon mongs pa gzhom par bgyi'o// ye shes kyi yul khong du churked par bgyi'o// zab mo stong pa nyid kyis ma khong du chud par bgyi'o// zhes gsoyod pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das khang pazegs pa de dag
161a6(1): la 'jigs te/ seng de'i khri bshams pa de nyid la 'azhug rdo nas/ gyi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa dang / nam mkhas khyas pa'i 'khor kun cad kyi smra bar gyur dmas/ bal mo
161a7(1): sbyarar te sems che gcig tu drang srong thub pa la lta bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa/ ma ljon par sa deng nam mkhas khyab pa'i 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas/ de'i
161a8(1): chigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// sems can ji snyed 'di dag kun lpags pa// byang chub 'dod rnams yongs su chos tshol nas// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa rab baha nad gyis// de dag thams cad che gcig
161a9(1): sems su nyon// sems can la la gti mug sred pas bsgrubs// phung po dag la'ang lta ba rnam myi spong // de dag da rung byang chub mchog sa brtson// gang yang 'di la yon tan cung zad stod// dbang po drug la tong pa myis
161a10(1): te// mtshan ma myed pa'i 'dzind pa bdag sa bzung // byang chub phyir ni cung zad brtson myin gyi// shes rab yon tan thams cad spyod pa myed// ji ltar mye 'dod khyim gyi nang na ni// brtsal pas kyang mi me dag rnyed ma gyur du// 
161b1(1): de ltar sems can la la byang chub 'dod// stong pa sa bsgoms shes rab thob pa myed// de bas gang byang chub phrug 'dod pa// phung po khams dang skye mched mtshan ma dag// rmyi la smig sgra thams can ltos// 'di
161b2(1): ni byang chub dam pa mchog gi sam// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzang ston da la bka' sanas dpa/ rigs kyi bu yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di la
161b3(1): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par shi nang tu 'das te nga yir bya ba dang / bdag gir bya ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i bag la nyal ba dang / mtshan ma byed pa ding ma rig par lta ba thams cad
161b4(1): baspangs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dres pa myed pa dang / sems can gyi go cha dang / sems sgyu ma lta bu dang / rlob du ba dang / rdul dang / nam mkha' dang / sprin sa bur rab tu shes so// mtsham
161b5(1): ma dang mtshan nyid thams cad nam mkha' spros pa dang bral ba lta bur rab tu shes so// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las 'das par 'gyur ro// las yongs su zad cing sems can nye bar mtsho bar 'gyur ro// 
161b6(1): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma skyed pa'i gnyen lta bur 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams can la sgrib pa myed par stond par 'gyur/ ro// pha rold kyi rgol ba thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par thul ba
161b7(1): myed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rgyas pa seng ge lta bu dang / rgya mtsho chen po lta bu chos chen po'i char gyi chu bar rab gtong ba dang / 'khruld pa myed pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / chags pa
161b8(1): byed pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / btod pa dang rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu bzod pa 'di bsgoms pa nas lus dbang du bcugs pa'i bar du 'di la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis kyi khyab pa'i 'gyur
161b9(1): ro// rigs kyi bu de ngas bzod pa 'di na ma gnyis te yang dag par spyod pa'i chus kyis bzod pa dam pa mkha'i mngon nis 'dul ba'i bzod bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi su de la yang dag par spyod pa'i rgyub kyis bzod pa gang
161b10(1): sa pa tha pa ga da/  gzhags dang /  dang/ 'a shes dang / 'byed pa mal sa zhes kyin//  kyi thas
162a1(1): bzhin 'as pa nyid do// gnas par 'dzin pa'i ba'i na kyi/ da da sa
162a2(1): byon mongs pa rgyud sa pa'o// nam mkha'adi skar thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin du gyi rtag pa dang / kun bldas pa dang / dag byed pa dang / grong nyid dang ldan pa'i ba pa pa sgom par byed do// 'di'i byang chu/ 
162a3(1): sems dpa'i sems can yongs su sbyind pa nye bar gang tho ba'i bzod pa lta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan ya gzugs de 'byung ba chen po bzhi te/ rigs bu 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag nang ngam/ phyi ro lad kyi 'am/ 
162a4(1): me ba 'am phra ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ kal d+he/ de ring ba 'am/ gas te nye ba de dag thams cad myi 'gro rnam par gyi'agro/ myi skye myi 'thung / bdag byed/ bdag gi myed par brtag par bya'o// 
162a5(1): zad pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang / rtonamad myed pa dang // smon pa myed pa'i tshul dang / 'byung ba myed pa mtshan ma byed pa'i tshul gyis brtag pa'o// ji ltar nul shi nad tu phra ba kun
162a6(1): 'byung ba'i phyi na gI sa'i khams sra bar brtag par bya'o// shind tu phra ba'i rtul po gcig po des ji ltar ldag mthong phra mos brtag/ rtul bla mo gcig po de la ji ltar mtshan nyid myed pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod la
162a7(1): du gyu da par rab tu shes pas bdag byed pa dang rnam par bral bar bu shes/ dngos po myed pa dang / tshig gi las dang / dras pa dang / dbyigs pa myed pa dang / smra dbyangs thams cad dang bral bar rngub tu shes/ bdag myed pa dang dra
162a8(1): rje ba dang bdud kyi mtshan nyid rab tu shes/ yi ge myed pa dang rgyu rkyen dang bral bar rab tu shes/ dngos po myed par rgyu dang rkyend dang bral bar rab tu shes mtshan ma myed pa las shi nad tu phra bar rab tu shes/ ji ltar 'du byed thams cad
162a9(1): rab tu zhi ba la rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis rtul shi nang tu phra mo gcig tu brtag go// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang de bzhin du gsum pa nas nang gi lus thams cad kyi bar du gcig la yang so sor rnam par rig pa brgyad po de dag gis
162b1(1): tshul shi rid tu ma lo gcig tu brtan go// nang gi sus jin pa de bzhin du phyi ros kyisa'i khams kyang rnam pa brgyad po 'di dgags po gang nus shin dum par brtan go// mtshan nyid byed pa nas maca ma byed pa'i byang
162b2(1): sa'i khams thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// nang gi 'am/ phyi rol kyi 'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba de dag thams cad bad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // 
162b3(1): gang zad pa 'di ni myi rtag pa'o// gang myi rtag pa 'di yang sdug bsngal ba'o// gang myi 'byung ba de bdag byed pa'o// gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste/ ji ltar phyi dang nad gyi sa'i
162b4(1): khams ji lta ba bzhin/ sems can nye bar mcho ba'i bzod pa lta bar bya'o// yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo' sde

167b2(1): bya ba chags par bya ba'i don tu skad cigs gnyis la 'byung ba ni ma yin no// de bzhin dun pa dang / swA dang / sde dang / lus dang / yid kyang brjod par bya'o// byig gi rnam pa shes pa'i sbyin kyang gzugs kyi 'dus te reg thos kyis
167b3(1): pa la yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin du chags par bya ba'i phyir skad cig ma gnyis la 'byung ba ni ma yin/ de ni gnyis ka yang dngos po myed pa ste nam mkha' la brtag pa lta bu'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nas
167b4(1): dang / rnam par shes pa yang brjod par bya'o// myig gi myig gis gnyis su myed de gnyis ka yang dngos po myed pa'i phyir ro// myig ni myig gi rnam par shes pas gnyis su myed de/ gnyis ka yang dngos po myed pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa
167b5(1): shes pa yang yul gyi 'dus te reg pa dang gnyis su myed do// de bzhin bang du gnas pa'i bya ba yang chags pa gnyis su myed dngos po myed de/ nam da mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu'i phyir ro// dngos po 'di dag ni mtshan
167b6(1): nyid myed par brtags te/ b+ha ba myed pa chags pa myed pa'i mcha na nyid 'and pa byed pa'o// dus gsum khams gsum de dag thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par myi rtog nges par sems pa shes Ta tu
167b7(1): ba myed pa sbyor ba las rnam par bzlog pa/ dka' ba byed pa byis pa sems can ji lta ba bzhin du mying myed pa/ rkyend myed pa/ kha dog dang mtshan ma myed pa/ gnas pa myed pa rnam par dmyigs pa myed pa/ brjod du myed pa
167b8(1): yin na/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu la chos kyi dbyings tha dad du byed do// rang gi rgyud kyi yongs su rtog pas chos kyi dbyings gcig la stong par rab tu shes pa/ de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
167b9(1): nam mkha' ji ltar 'du shes myed cing tshor ba myed pa de bzhin du sa'i khams kyang 'du shes myed cing tshor ba myed pa dang / myi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag myed pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa bsgom pa 'di
167b10(1): yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa nye bar mtsho ba'i bzod pa blta'i bar myo'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang lus 'di gsher ba'i mtshan nyid ni chu nye/ chu'i mtshan nyid phran tshegs su na spa'i me'i ma'i cha shas
168a1(1): chas kyi nang gi sus kyi chu'i khams thams cad mo yor thigs pa tsam du lpag mchog gi tshus kyis brtag go// che ba 'am zla ba'am/ dma' ba'am/ bde ba'i mtshan nyid myed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba
168a2(1): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas mtshan ma myed pa'i bar du de dag thigs pa tsam du 'du byed thams cad nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes pa ji lta bur thigs pa cigs rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis ji lta bu bzhin du brtag go// de bzhin
168a3(1): du gnyis pa dang de bzhin du gsum pa nas nang gi lus kyi sa'i khams thams cad rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis so so re re sa thigs pa phra ba ji lta ba bzhin du brtag go// mtshan nyid myed pa nas mtshan ma myed pa'i bar du nang gi
168a4(1): chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du phyi rold kyi lus kyi chu'i khams che ba 'am phra ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/ bde ba 'am gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // gang zad pa'i
168a5(1): chos de yang myi rtag pa'o// de'ang rtog pa myed pa'o// gang rtog pa myed pa de 'ang sdug bsngal ba'o// gang 'byung ba myed pa de'ang bdag myedang pa'o// gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de yang stong pa ste/ 
168a6(1): ji ltar nang phyi rol kyi chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par shes/ kha de ltar rab dbring ba ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur/ nam mang/ ji ltar gnas pa byed cing spros pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chu'i khams kyang snam
168a7(1): ma byed cing gnas pa skyed pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang bar gyi mthar yang dag pa'i 'byung ba byed pas/ gzugs kyimatshan nyid gang tu yang rnam par brtags pa'i gnas su snang ba dang khyod paban
168a8(1): bar gyi nus te/ des na rnam par shes pa ni stong pa'o// yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyend kyis bying dang gzugs pa rtog par byed de/ gan cig sa cigs rnam par shes pa skyes shing 'gags nas mying dang gzug sa bya'o// kying yang rdzom
168a9(1): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag no// phung po yang rdzas myed pa'i don te gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / dbyibs kyi snang ba la gyi 'dug pas de dag kying zhes bya'o// 
168a10(1): gzugs bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gzugs shes bya'o// gzugs myed pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag kyang dngos po myed pa gnas myed pa/ rdzas myed pa mtshan nyid myed pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba te/ tshor ba'i rnam par sbyin pa'i
168b1(1): mtshan nyid rab tu myi shes pa'i rgyu dang rkyen la dmyigs pa dang / 'bras bu 'grub pa rab tu myi shes pa'o// chos 'di dag ni phan tshun nas 'du ba dang gnas rnam par dbye ba rab tu myi shes pa'o// 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i
168b2(1): rnam par sbyind pa nas/ rnam par dbye pa rab tu kyi shes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di dan thams cad ni khams gsum las grol ba/ dus gsum las gnang tu 'das pa/ mnyam pa byed pa yongs su 'dzin pa byed pa/ khra zab myed pa/ 
168b3(1): dngos po byed pa/ chags shing rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ spra sred pa 'byung ba byed pa/ gnyis su myed pa/ rtsub myed pa/ kun gzhi myed pa/ dbang du gyur pa skyed pa/ 'chi 'pho ba myed pa/ rkyen myed pa/ mtshan nyid myed pa/ byas pa byed pa
168b4(1): rgyu myed pa bdag gi myed pa/ brjod pa myed pa/ chad pa myed pa/ rtag pa myed pa/ bya ba myed pa/ mying myed pa'o// gnas myed pas gzugs myed pa'o// yid myed pa'o// rnam par rtog pa myed pa'o// rnam par sbyinang pa myed pa'o//  rnam pa
168b5(1): shes par bya ba myed pa'o// gzhal ba myed pa'o// mngon par 'grub pa myed pa'o// dus gsum dang / khams gsum thams cad kyi gzugs mye/ dad pa'i phung po bzhi po dag ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// mtshan nyid myed pa'o
168b6(1): mun pa myed pa'o// sdang ba myed pa'o// rang bzhin myed pa'o// ngo bo nyid kyis rtsa ba myed pa'o// yi ge myed pa'o// de dag ni gang tu bsgom pa dang ma skyes pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang 'gro ba dang sa la pa myed pa'o// khams gsum thams
168b7(1): cad na gtam gyi dngos por btags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa myed pa'o// blang ba myed pa'o// dor ba myed pa'o// gzugs med pa'o// phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni mtshan nyid kyi 'dug pa skyed pa'o// phung po 'di dag ni myig gi gnas
168b8(1): kyi dbyings su pa nas lus kyi nas par gyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin no// sus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas ste sad pa'i brda dang mtshan ma rnam par
168b9(1): bzhag par gzhug par ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas kyang / gzugs myed pa'i phung po 'di dag ni gzugs kyi phung po'i gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin no// khams gsum
169a1(1): log byed pan// gathunam byed pa'i phre ma zin po 'di dan ni song ba'i mtshan nyid gyis gan tu ga ga gis 'dzin pa zer thug pa pa'i ro// gnas kyi dbyigs bams canam byed pa'o// ga sa kyi
169a2(1): nod pa skyed pa no// 'gog pa byed pas chags pa byed pa dang / rtsi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / stong pa dang / gdag byed pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i 'thod pa pa sgom par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems rna ba'i semam na sacom / 
169a3(1): sbyin pa nye bur mthob ste/ sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dris pa de bzhin du me'i khams dang rlung gi khams rgya chen pos bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gzugs ni the tsom kyi rgya la bu nye nang gi 'a
169a4(1): phyi rol gyi 'am/ che ba 'am/ bre ba 'am/ dma' ba 'am/  bde ba 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba de dag thams cad dngos po shang skyed cing gzugs brtan sta bu dang / drug gi skye mched dbang du gyur rapa
169a5(1): bdag myed par dmyigs pa tshig gi lam myed pa dang / rnam par myi 'gro ba dang ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba dang bdag myed pa dang / bdag gi myed pa dang / zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul dang / rtog pa myed cing smon pa myed pa dang / 
169a6(1): mtshan ma byed pa'i tshul dang / ldag mthong kyi tshul gyis brtag par bya'o// mtshan nyid myed pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / bdag snyed pa dang / yid kyi 'du byed dang bral ba dang / yi ge byed pa dang / rgyu dang rkyend dang / 
169a7(1): bral bar rab tu shes so// dngos po myed pa shinang tu skad cig ma dang bral bar rab tu shes so// 'du byed thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / yul rgyun chad pa myed par rab tu shes so// 'du byed thams cad gnas myed cing nye bar rab tu
169a8(1): shes so// rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs dngos po byed pa dbu' bag phung po ltar brtan do// mtshan nyid myed pa nas mtshan ma myed pa'i bar du de da 'a thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // gang bad pa'i
169b1(1): chos de mi tam pa'o/ sa kyi nyes pa de rtog paskyed pan/ gang rtog pabyed pa de'ang thug pasdus pa'o// gang 'byung babyed pade'ang bdag byed pa'o// kang 'a byed pam sa dkyis pa dang bras pa de 'a nacan// den
169b2(1): nad phyi rol gyi gzugs ngog lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dngos po myed cing gzugs brnyan lta bur 'du byed myed cing 'gyur ba byed pa dang / tshor ba byed pa dang / gyi rtag pa dang / sdug bsdus pa dang / bdag myed pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan dang
169b3(1): bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su sbyind pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod pa blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gzugs ni phyi rol dang nang ginas gang nye bar bar du rang bzhin gyis
169b4(1): gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rgyu 'dra ba'i mngon par myi grub pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sus mngon pa'i mngon par mtshan nyid du brtag go// gzugs ni ni la 'dra chags pa myed/ snyems pa 'ang myed/ blang ba dang dor ba myed par shes te/ 
169b5(1): te/ gzugs ni gnyi su myi byed do// chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar shes pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi/ 'i gzugs thams cad ni cung zad kyang dbyer myed do// tshig gi lam thams
169b6(1): cad kanas myed par yang dag par shes so// bzugs ni gzha na ni song ba 'ang myed cing yul myed pa dang / glo bar gyi sdug bsngal dang rgyun gcad pa'i bdud gnyis dang bral ba dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang gnas
169b7(1): byed par rtag go// gzugs thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni lbu ba'i phung po lta bur dmyigs pa myed pa dang / kun 'byung ba myed pa dang / shi nad tu rang bzhin myed brtag no// 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni rnam par myi rtog pa kyi
169b8(1): 'byung ba mngon par myi grub pa/ chos thams cad spros pa rgyun bcad du zhugs pa myed par rtag go// 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs kyi phung po'i mtshan nyid ni snyems pa myed pa dang / gtong ba myed pa dang / mun pa myed pa dang / 
169b9(1): sdang ba myed pa dang / yid la myi byed pa dang / gnyis su myed pa dang / sogs pa byed pa dang / smos pa myed pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur dbyer byed pa dang / dngos po myed par brtag go// gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi lani shin
169b10(1): tun ma par gyi rtog pa dang / bad pa dang chu 'dra bar ga'o// rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs la dadog po byed pa du gzugs brtas du bur gtag go// mtshan nyid sbed pa nas su can ma byed pa'i bar du 'du byed pa mas la dbad pa'i mam
170a1(1): su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // gang zad pa'i chos de myi rtag pa'o// gang kyi rtag pa de rtog pa byed pa'o// gang rtog pa byed pa de'ang zug bsdus pa'o// gang 'byung ba myed pa de'ang bdag myed par/ 
170a2(1): gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste/ ji ltar phyi dang nang gzugs dbu' ba 'dra ba stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'ang nye bar 'byung ngo // nam mkha' ji
170a3(1): ltar zad pa myed cing gzugs myed pa dang rtag tu myed pa de bzhin du zad pa myed cing mtshan nyid myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa dang / bstanang du byed pa dang / lbu ba lta bur gyi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / stong pa'i maH/ 
170a4(1): ma la dmyigs pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom par byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smyind pa nye bar mche ba blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i mtshan nyid
170a5(1): nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gang smras pa de'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang / myigayor lta bu dang grib ma lta bu dang / lbu ba lta bu gnas myed pa/ nam mkhalta bu chags pa myed pa dang / brjod du myed pa dang sogs pa myed pa
170a6(1): nas/ khams gsum gyi 'khor ba bdag byed lta bu dang / dus gsum gyis na nyid thob pa dang / dmyigs pa byed pa dang / yi ge myed pa dang / dus gsum du myed pa'i mtha' dang / rtag pa'i mtha' dang / gzung ba
170a7(1): mtha' dang / zad pa byed par yod pa'i mtha' dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa'i mtha' dang / yul myed pa'i mtha' dang / rab tu rtsub myed pa'i mtha' dang / smra ba skyed pa'i mtha' dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes pa/ 
170a8(1): 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams kyi gzugs snang ba nam mkha' lta bur brtag go// myig yor gyi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur dngos por dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ nam mkha' ji lta bus gzung du myed pa kun nas nga
170a9(1): be myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa de ltar de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang myig yor lta bu dngag rol bral ba'i gnas myed pa'o// gzugs kyi mtshan nyid mi mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / swA brnyan sta bu dang / dbu' ba'i phung
170a10(1): gos bu dang / chos kyi byings dang / nam mal rnams kyi sna brnyan ni 'ams byed pa dang / yadad ba byed pa dang / batshungs pa byed pa dang 'khrug pa skyed pa'o// de gar de bzhin du chos 'di da kyang nam mnga' ma bu'o// bzus
170b1(1): kyi spang ba de'ang gzung du myed pa dang / bsags pa byed pa dang / skye ba byed pa dang / gso ba byed pa dang / 'gyur ba skyed pa dang / 'chib po myed pa dang / gyi gnas pa dang / bdag dang gnan gyis kyi me dang pa dang / sangs su byirten
170b2(1): ba dang / chags pa myed pa dang / 'byung ba byed pa dang / byas pa thams cad gzugs kyi snang ba'o// de ltar de bzhin du 'du byed thams cad kyi lam las shind tu 'das shing myig gi rnam par shes pa'i lam kun nas ldang ba lbu ba'i thu
170b3(1): po lta bu'i gzugs kyi snang ba'i myig gi rnam par shes pas/ stong pa de yang myig 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyu'o// bdag myed pa'i phyir 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang stong pa ste/ ji ltar gong du bshad pa bzhin du bdag
170b4(1): dmyigs pa 'ang myed do// myig gnyis ni 'bru tsam ste/ myig re re la yang tshad myed pa'i rdul shi nad tu phra ba'o// rdul shi nad tu phra ba la yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi sogs so// 'byung ba chen po bzhi re re la yang bdag tu myi dmyigs shing
170b5(1): sems can du myi dmyigs na/ de ltar rnam par shes pa'i gnas sam/ kun nas ldang ba 'am/ lam du shes pa 'am/ lta ci smos/ rdul shin tu phra ba de dang de dag la ji lta ba de bzhin du myig 'byung ba
170b6(1): chen po bsags pa dang / dgun 'bru tsam du yongs su rton no// song sa su brtag pa des de la myig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang / lam yang myed do// des yang dag par yongs su ma brtags
170b7(1): bas sems can myig yongs su brtag par 'gyur ro// gang myig gi rnam par shes pa stong par ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa de dag 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gro 'o// ji ltar yang myig gi rnam par shes pa stong ba ji lta ba bzhin
170b8(1): rurab tu shes pa de bzhin du khabs gsum gyi phyag gi rnam pa spong ba ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o// de ltar yang rtsig gis gzugs kyi snang bkru ba'i phung po lta bum phyi dang dang gyi gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba nas nye ba'i
170b9(1): bar du de dag thams sa ba'i phung po gzugs kyi 'byung ba chen po nam mkha' sa myi rten par 'gyur ro// nam mal di sar dngos po byed cing mtshar nyid myed pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis spang pa ltar gzugs kyim pan nyid spang
170b10(1): ma/ sa gzu nan byes mam du bying pa ma ma da mam yang mo rje ma
171a1(1): mi rtsod pa'o// di kar cig byig gi rnam par shes pa stod pa de bzhin su pa dang bla dang nyi dang sum dang didi byirnam par shes pas gong ngo // 'dod pa'i khams dang gzun pa kyi 'ams bams pa kyirgyu
171a2(1): kyang myig dang myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so// 
171a3(1): 'byung ba chen po lU ba lta bu myi rtog rnam par myi rtog cing myi dbyigs/ yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // snyems can dang srog dang gsor ba dang / gang zag dang shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang byed pa po dang / byed du/ 
171a4(1): 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar 'jug pa dang / skye ba dang / kun tu skye ba dang / kun nas ldang ba yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'i mtshan ma la mtshan mas mtshan
171a5(1): ma la dmyigs pa'ang myed do// sems kyi gzung ba dang / btang ba mngon/ de gsum bya ba dang // khro chung pa dang gnas dang kun nas ldang ba'i ga dang / yid la byed pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba
171a6(1): dbyigs pa byed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid lta ba bzhin du rab tu n+d+heso// gzugs kyi phung po dang nam mkha' dang sems kyi rnam par shes pa tha dad par rab tu kyi shes so// khams
171a7(1): gsum thams cad stong pa nyid kyis thong par rab tu shes so// gang phyi ro yod dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'i mtsham rmad lbu ba'i phung po lta bur stong pa nyid dang zad pa'i chub dang zhigams
171a8(1): 'i cha ba myed pa'i chub dang / nang dang byoro sad kyi 'du byed nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs rtog pa skyed pa'i tshul dang / myi ste ba dang kyi 'gog pa dang / 'brang ba skyed pa dang / mtshan ma byed pa'i tshus kyim nyan do// 
171a9(1): ma pa'i na 'ded paskong pa dang / 'jug brgyad chan pa ji stsa pa bzhin dung ba tu shes so// gang gzugs kyi ma tshan nyid thamam pa bad pa'i chos de 'ang byinag pa'o// gang rtog pa skyed pa de 'ang thug pa ba ma
171b1(1): gang 'byung babyed pa 'ang bdag byed pa'o// gang 'du byed pams cad gyi ga gis can nyid kyis ma dang bras pa de'ang stong ba ste/ gang phyi dang nang ginas nye ba'i bar du gzugs pacan nyid sdang ba thams dang lta ba bzhin
171b2(1): tu rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring dang bla ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun gcod par byed pa'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar rlung byed pa de bzhin du bka
171b3(1): la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar 'gyur ba myed pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba myed pa'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar bstsags pa myed cing gnod pa myed pa de bzhin du sems dang
171b4(1): nas par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa la brtsegs pa byed cing gnod pa myed pa'i bzed 'a'o// nam mkha' byug la nyas thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin du tshig gi sam thams cad pag lanyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o// 
171b5(1): nam mkha' ji ltar ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du mtshan nyid thams cad snang ba ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du mtshan nyid thams cad ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa bsgrubs pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar smos pa/ 
171b6(1): byed pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi bag la nyas pa thams cad spros pa myedapa'i bzod pa'o// nam mkha' ji ltar khams gsum par gtogs/ pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi snang ba khams gsum pa gtogs pa
171b7(1): yang gyi snyan pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag byed bye dang / mi tshan nyid dmyigs pa byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bu'i bzod pa bsgom pa byed pa 'di 'ang byang dub sems dpa'i dul sna tshogs kyis de
171b8(1): lur ba dang du byed do// bying dang rkyen dang / 'dog dang 'chanam dang dbyibs su 'dogs sa/ 'dod pa'i man tan sde ni skyo ba byed pa spang ba byed pa mtshan nyid byed pa rnam par bzhag pa byed pa'o// rnam par zer

172a5(1): cad seld pa skad cig gis 'jig pa/ nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa brjod du myed pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'o// gang gzugs la ro myang zhing reg pa'i skye mched drug dang 'dod pa'i yon tan/

172a7(1): reg pa'i skye mched drug la rtag pa 'am/ myi rtag pa zhes rnam par dpyod panub pa kun tu spong ba'i mtshan nyid yid sa myir byed pa de'i chags pa thams cad yongs su gcod pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa brjod
172a8(1): du byed pa khong du chud ba'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang yang rnam par shes pa dang // rnyog pa 'di skye mched drug la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i ro lnga'i ro myang bar gyi
172a9(1): byed cing / mun pa yang myed snang ba yang myed de/ nam mkha' ltar gnyis la bur bya ba ma yin pa 'di yang 'jig rte na/ ngas 'das pa brjod du byed pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par sbyong ba'o// chos 'di dag ni 'du shes dang /

172a11(1): 'di dag ni skad cig ma dang po sa skyes nas skad cig ma 'di nyid la 'jig pa ste/ skad cig ma gnyis la gnas pa ma yin no// de 'gags te reg pa'i skye mched drug dang / 'du shes dang sems pa 'jig pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la tshor ba skye'o// 
172b1(1): pa'i ga kyigam na/ tshon pa gsus ni ba de pa'i tshor ba dang blag pa sa kyi tshor ba dang / bde ba yang byed thug sasas yang byed pa tshor ba bye/ dras gsung du/ 'am gsamams na kyi yin pa'i gyi chen du/ 
172b2(1): nas pa gsum pa stong ba mang du chud par bya ste/ ngi sar shA btun pa bzhin no// snangs la dag 'di da ces rig pa'i bye mchen drugasas sbyor ba nasagasu skye te/ smras pa mnyam pa'i phung po la rnam par byed pa sa /

172b5(1): par bya ba'i gzugs dang / bskyed par myi bya ba'i gzugs kyi glog gis sA bar byed pa/ lus kyi nang du ni snang bar myi byed/ glog ni gzugasakyi rkyen las skyes pa ma yin/ gzugs rnam par dmyigs pa ma 6
172b6(1): yin/ gzugs kyi gnas ma yin/ gzugs kyi ro myang bar byed pa ma yin/ glog ni gzugs phan tshun 'jug pa ma yin/ gzugs mtshan mar 'dzin pa ma yin/ gzugs spang nas sdang bar byed pa ma yin/ glog ni gzug/

172b9(1): tshor ba bsgrub pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no// tshor ba 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// tshor ba'i ro myang ba'i phyir ma yin no// tshor ba mtshan mar 'dzind pa'i phyir ma yin no// tshor ba la kun tu dmyigs pa'i

173a5(1): dang dus gsum dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad 'byung ba myed pa dang / gyod pa myed pa brjod du byed pa stong ba'o// me tog gi glog gis brgya rang ba 'di ni rgya mtsho phyag rgya zad kyi

173a8(1): nam mkha'i bzhin no// gzugs la yongs su myi rtog pa'i tshor ba klog dang nam mkha' bzhin no// 'du shes ni rlung dang nam mkha' bzhin no// 'du byed nams mi sprin byed pa'i nam mkha' bzhin no// rnam par shes pa ni sbyin
173a9(1): smra ba dang nam mkha' bzhin do// gzugs sa yongs su myi rtog pa theg zug tu mo pa te/ phyi nag pa nyid du yongs su rtog pa 'di ni sred pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gzugs pa sdug bsnga du yongs su su nyim pa dang / spangang /

173b2(1): 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis so sor rtag par byas te/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs ni nang dang 'god pa'i mtshan nyid do// gang rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid de ni myi rtag pa ste/ ji ltar 'byung ba chen po yongs su

173b8(1): de bzhin du khams gsum dag dang chas pa'i ro'i yon tan dang stong par khong du chud par bya'o// ji ltar bum ba gang yang nam mkha' 'dres par sbubs pa myed de/ ji ltan nam mkha' sa ma yin/ nam mkha' dang bum pa phan tshun
173b9(1): du reg pa dang brag pa sems byed pa de bzhin du lams gsum gyi rig pa la bstod par 'ong du rud bar bya'o// 'dod pa'i yan tan lngas gti mug gis 'a los bung du me tog gi dri la chags pa bzhin du gang yang 'dod pa'i/

174a2(1): mkhas kyang chung la ma zhing gnyi ga yang brjod du byed/ yi ge byed pa de bzhin du stong par khong du chud par bya'o// gan tshun dngos po byed par grub cing ldan pa ste/ phan tshun mdod pa dang sbyin pa dang / 'dre ba dang / chag pa pa dang /

176b6(1): kyi bu 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta ba gang yang rung ste lend pa dang bcas pa/ gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pa'i rkyend kyis brjod/
